NEIGHBORHOOD * Many traditional restaurants & Bars * Metro *Historical and cultural area APARTMENT * Wi-Fi *Fully equipped kitchen *Living room with sofa bed and cable TV *Bathroom with bath, hand and face towels *1 bedroom with queen-size bed *High quality bed sheets and mattresses *Highly clean flat

NEIGHBORHOOD * Many traditional restaurants & Bars * Metro *Historical and cultural area APARTMENT * Wi-Fi *Fully equipped kitchen *Living room with sofa bed and cable TV *Bathroom with bath, hand and face towels *1 bedroom with queen-size bed *High quality bed sheets and mattresses *Highly clean flat

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
The room is tidy, beautiful and everything was equipped. Peaceful park view. Host replied super quick everytime. Right next to the bus stop and near to metro. If you love music, it’s right next to casa da musica so u can enjoy the musical concert. There was 5 stairs before the elevator but Adriano helped us to carry our luggage. 

사진보다 더 아늑하고 아름다운 집이에요! 조명도 예쁘고 세심하게 꾸민 티가 납니다. 어라운드 잡지컷이나 인스타 감성샷 찍기 좋을 듯,,

The apartment is amazing! The balcony faces Rotunda da Boavista but no noises from the outside because they put a double door on the balcony. The flat has been recently renovated, well equipped, big bathroom, comfortable bedroom. You'll find 2 heaters that are more than enough to get the space warm. Metro station, supermarket, bar nearby. Highly recommended, would definitley go back there!

Hi Guys  -  Great house and a very welcoming check-in (the free wine was a great touch!).  We had everything we needed and loved our stay in Porto! :-)

Gavin
Prestation de qualité.

We stayed in the apartment for one week. The apartment is located opposite to Casa da Musica. Although just beside the main road, the rooms are quiet as the windows have two layers of glasses. (Can hear the a bit of sound, but the noise level really manageable) The apartment is newly furnished with full amenities. Bed is comfortable. Vodafone shop is just downstairs. The nearest supermarket is 2-3 min away. Train station maybe 5min walking distance. (3 to 4 stops to the historic places in Porto.) Direct bus to the beach. Quite a few good restaurants around. Not to mention, the host communicate promptly and give very useful tips. Highly recommend, particularly if you plan for longer stay in Porto.

name: Charming Private Studio in LES
summary: This beautiful studio is ideal for a single traveler or couple. Nestled in the heart of the Lower East Side, you won't have to go far to find countless restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. Enjoy the city in this clean, comfortable private studio!
description: This beautiful studio is ideal for a single traveler or couple. Nestled in the heart of the Lower East Side, you won't have to go far to find countless restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. Enjoy the city in this clean, comfortable private studio!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Medical student living in New York City.

reviews.comments: We had a great stay in Julia's apartment. It is very small (as expected with NYC studios) but has everything you need and is in a fantastic location in the heart of LES. Julia was lovely to deal with and made the whole process of moving in and out very easy.

The Lower East Side apartment was in a great location with a busy street life both day and night. Traveling alone in all hours of the day I never once felt unsafe in the neighbourhood. The apartment itself was well furnished, small and cosy - Great for someone traveling alone or as a couple.
Julia was a great host, very quick and nice to respond to any questions and problems I had during my stay. I would recommend a stay at this apartment.
Julia was great, key pickup and checkout were easy. The place was comfortable and was in a good location. Effortless stay.

The apartment was just as shown in the pictures. It's small but has everything we needed and in a perfect location for visiting NYC. Julia was also an amazing and responsive host (even at some inconvenient hours)! Great experience overall.

Great location and cosy apartment for one. Close to subway and lots of places to eat. Be aware will need to walk up three flights of stairs but this is expected with NYC apartments. Julia was a great host. Always responsive. Check in and check out was easy. I was able to stay until my late night flight which was very helpful.

Julia was very friendly and quick and efficient with communication.  The location was convenient to walk to everything in the East Village and Lower East Side, so that was a major plus for us.  However, the studio itself was pretty funky.  EVERYTHING needs a good cleaning.  We are not that picky when it comes to accommodations usually, but the place should at the very least be clean.  Scrub the toilet, buy a new shower curtain, clean the mirrors, buy a new shower mat, dust and vacuum, clean out the fridge (their was something rotten in there)...pretty basic stuff if you are putting your place on Airbnb.  The place could be a great stay if it gets a thorough cleaning.

So I prefer backpackers only.

name: Pulitzer Extra- Read all about our experiences!
space: One day a guest said to us, “The Pulitzer is a happening place. I love it!” And that is exactly what it is. Far from being a collection of rooms, the Pulitzer is a place with a pulse, where there are always things happening, where every day is different. It is decidedly ‘cool’: a destination in its own right. The Pulitzer is a boutique hotel located right in the heart of Barcelona, a stone’s throw from Plaza Catalunya. Its unforgettable location is one of its main points of appeal as it is surrounded by the best cultural attractions, the most exclusive shopping, the most important business centres and is at the hub of the entire urban transport network.

Far from being a collection of rooms, the Pulitzer is a place with a pulse, where there are always things happening, where every day is different. Afternoon news: The Greenhouse could be an actual greenhouse with
neighborhood_overview: In the heart of the city. From here you can get to everywhere easily! Tourism for dummies guaranteed!
notes: Indulge yourself and have fun in our cocktail bar and sunny musical terrace!
transit: How to get there? You will find Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona in Bergara street number 8, right in the heart of the city of Barcelona. You will be able to find us a few steps away from Las Ramblas and the well-known Paseo de Gracia. The perfect location to discover the city or to stay while doing business. FROM “EL PRAT DE BARCELONA” AIRPORT AEROBUS: It is a shuttle bus which goes directly from the airport to Plaça Catalunya. It is a 25 minutes long ride. A single ticket costs 5.90€ and a return ticket 10.20€. It is everyday available every 15 minutes. It leaves from Plaça Catalunya between 5:30h to 00:30h, and from the airport between 6:00h to 1:00h.The Aerobus stop is located only 3 minutes walk from the hotel. TRAIN: Every 30 minutes from 6:00h to 23:40h, there is a train which goes from the airport to “Sants” train station. Once having arrived to “Sants”, you will have to take the L3 metro line which stops in Plaça Catalunya. It is a 30 minutes ride and costs 2.20€.Please note that this
access: Breaking news! Morning news: Our Lobby Bar is a space open to everyone, whether it be local citizens of any other kind of visitor. It is thanks to the cosy atmosphere of our local and its privileged central location that Lobby Bar has become a meeting point in our city.  Afternoon news: The Greenhouse could be an actual greenhouse with a terrace in the midst of the city, but in fact this is the name of our restaurant: a plant-filled oasis of calm right in the heart of Barcelona. It is a bright Mediterranean-style space serving a lunch menu with just the right degree of sophistication and an idyllic atmosphere. The food on offer at The Greenhouse gives centre stage to seasonal vegetables, locally sourced meat, fish brought daily from the fish market and 100% home-made desserts. Evening news: Rooftop lovers! We keep on with our #BuenasTardesPulitzer sessions along spring and summer season. During autumn and winter, try our vermut and tapas listening the best Dj local sessions.
interaction: Our team will assist you 24h.
house_rules: Non smoking.

You will have coffee, tea, bread, honey, cheese and some fruits for breakfast every morning. Me, Coco and Mu will do our best so u can feel like home!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Landed in Montreal at -20 C, it was really comfortable to arrive at such cozy, warm and clean apartment. In addition the roommates have been really nice since the beginning and Max is always available for anything you could need. It is located in a cool part of the city and well connected by bus with the city center.

summary: The perfect home base for exploring the highlands of the Big Island. This large 3 bedroom home also  has a loft and is just minutes from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, situated amidst the magical rainforest. Fully equipped with everything you need!

host.host_about: Avid travelers, I live with my husband in Santa Cruz at the moment. We own a rental in Coronado California and a vacation rental in Volcano on the Big Island.

reviews.comments:
Becky's home is exactly as described. There's a lot of space, plenty of towels and kitchenware and it's really clean. Prior to arrival, Becky sent us a very detailed email with information on how to get there and some recommendations around the area.
This house is very close to the Volcanoes National Park and in the middle of the rainforest, however the house has everything you might need as well as WiFi.
Recommended!

We had a great stay. Becky, our host, was very good with communications and was flexible. Due to a hurricane, we asked if we can check in a few hours early and Becky was very nice to accommodate our request. The description of the listing is accurate and Becky is very responsive. I would stay again if I am in that area. This location is really like a rainforest. Thanks.

Becky's house is a delight. We thoroughly enjoyed our two nights and would recommend the house to holiday makers, families, groups and anyone who needs a base for exploring the wonderful Volcano National Park. 

The rooms were spacious, the beds comfortable and the house fully equipped with everything we needed for our stay. The kitchen in particular is very well equipped (although we were out most of the time as the Volcano park is so fascinating).

Definitely recommended.

My husband and I and 3 adult friends really enjoyed our stay at Ohana House in Volcano Village.  It is  a lovely home with spacious, well appointed bedrooms and bathrooms.  The great room is large, beautiful and has a cozy warm feeling at the same time. The big windows and high ceiling give plenty of light and lovely view into the rain forest garden.  We had everything we needed for a base to explore the Volcanoes National Park.

We had a great stay in this charming place. It's very spacious & clean and has all of the comforts you would want with really close access to the park. Becky is very thoughtful and puts a lot of care in the way the house is setup for guests (lots of towels, etc). I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

The Ohana House was comfortable, welcoming, and well appointed.  The website photos and information represented the property accurately.  The rain forest setting was very lush and beautiful.  Living in Honolulu, we could not get over the peace and quiet that the property setting offered.  We didn't hear a sound at night and except for an occasional neighbor walking a dog, we did not see anyone during the day.  This truly was a private retreat and a close base for  hiking trips and visits to Volcano National Park.  We look forward to returning.
A wonderful home, very close to volcano national park. A bit chilly when we arrived but quickly warmed up. Really a wonderful house. We have no complaints.

'Ohana House' is really 'Ohana Home'. It is an oasis. Our family of four had more than enough room in this beautiful yellow house. We felt very much in tune with the surrounding natural environment, and we enjoyed all the modern amenities. We were completely enchanted by the rainforest, the active caldera, and the petroglyphs on the lava field. And we  really felt so at home. Thank you Becky for creating such a comfortable, beautiful space.   Our experience exceeded our expectations.

This tranquil island home was a perfect spot for my family to explore Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. It was a beautiful setting and the house has more than enough room for us to sleep comfortably, hang out, cook and play games. Becky was friendly and responsive and provided more helpful advice on activities and local attractions than we could even take advantage of! Highly recommend.

Charming, spacious and comfortable describe this lovely home! My family of five plus my mother in law greatly enjoyed coming home to an inviting setting after our big island adventures. We would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to our friends! Thank you!

The Ohana House was comfortable and well appointed. The website photos and information represented the house accurately. The rainforest setting was very dense, and initially slightly foreboding.  Those impressions faded as we got into the place.
The kitchen was very well appointed in terms of appliances and cooking equipment and certainly gave the impression that Becky had taken the time to think through what is needed to relax.

The proximity to the  Volcano National Park was excellent as it allows you to return to areas that may have been foggy or rainy when you first visit.  We may need to visit again when the lava is flowing!

The local food shopping is essentially limited to bread and milk.  Ensure you bring all your food from Hilo or Kona to avoid a long trip for groceries.  I highly recommend the little eatery next to the general store - probably the best meal we had on the island (and they were all pretty good).

We had a lovely stay at this Volcano house! The house was large and spacious and the kitchen well equipped. It was a really good location close to the Volcanoes National Park. I would highly recommend staying here. Our host was extremely responsive to all our questions prior to arrival and this was very much appreciated. Easy to find even in the dark in the rain! Thank you for a wonderful stay! We really loved the gas stove especially!

Becky's house was wonderful! Best beds ever! We all slept like babies with the chilly volcano weather and great beds. Kitchen had everything you could need. The fireplace is perfect, and we spent many hours in front of it playing the provided games.

Our family had a great visit to Volcano NP and Becky's home was a perfect perch for the few days we were there.  The house is simple, clean and spacious.  Becky is an attentive host.  Although she was not on location, she responded to our questions immediately and was very helpful.  The house has a stove to warm the cottage on cool nights.  The neighborhood is very quiet and conveniently located to the park entrance and restaurants.  To our surprise and delight, we had the best dinner of our entire 3-week visit to the Big Island just down the road- local ingredients and friendly faces.  Also loved the farmer's market on Sunday morning.

Wow. What a beautiful property!  Everything was exactly as advertised, if not better. Becky gave us detailed information concerning the amenities of the house, the National Park and recommended spots for dining and entertainment. Thank you Becky. You helped make our vacation.

Close to the volcano, go up at night and see the red glow.

The house is very comfortable. We had only 3 people, but there are real beds for 8 in 3 BRs and a nice loft. 

Take a little walk in the trail through the ferns and forest in the back. One expects a velociraptor to appear. 

Good internet and TV service. Nice gas fireplace that starts with one button to warm things up. Kitchen has everything one would need, though we found restaurants close by. Light switches labelled:)

We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful rainforest home. Great location - close to the volcano and a quick drive to town. Seeing the volcano at night for the 4th of July really offered up great "fireworks"! House was set up well for visitors - well equipped kitchen and rooms as described (my 8-year-old loves having her own room in the loft). 

Becky was a phenomenal host. She provided good directions ahead of our visit, so it was easy to find the house and easy to let ourselves in. She also provided a list of things to do around Volcano and Hilo, and we spent a good deal of time working through her lost.

We did have an issue when we arrived - a miscommunication between Becky and the local property manager about the timing of our arrival. I was impressed with how responsive and apologetic both of them were. Jo, the property manager, came over to personally apologize and we resolved it to my complete satisfaction. Sometimes you learn a lot about how well a property is managed when things go wrong, and these folks are great. Would not hesitate to stay there again!

Great experience arriving in the evening to Becky's house with the sounds of a hawaiian rainforest. The house itself is quiet and comfortable. It's the perfect forest retreat to relax and enjoy nature and close the State volcano park. We loved the local farmers market where we discovered the community (vegetables/fruit/bread/meat, prepared food, artists and local organizations) that live in and around volcano village. There is also the Volcano Village Arts Center on the way to the State park, they had interesting exhibits and a very dedicated team.
We had a great time. The house is large and comfortable. The location is very convenient to explore the volcanos national Park. Thanks for a great stay.

this is my first time to use bnb and it is a family trip. The house is really nice cozy and comfortable. The outside view is special as well. The inside decoration is warm and new. Cooking instrument is well equipped and I can cook myself. Really unforgetable staying experience there.
Fantastic location to visit the National Park.   Becky sent helpful tips and site info that helped plan our visit.  Beautiful, clean and secluded home.  The best!

Its a very cozy place. You can stay here like a local. This house has a plenty of rooms for a big group. The town is small and many places closed early. Make sure you make a reservation if you want to eat at the restaurant or buy groceries in Hilo or Kona.
This place has a gas fireplace, heaters, dehumidifiers, washer, dryer, and full kitchen.

This is a very comfortable place to stay. The dehumidifiers are key as the location is in the rainforest and humidity is definitely there - the carpets can have a damp feel at times but this should be expected. 
The condiments in the fridge and cupboard were very handy as we used the outdoor propane grill one night. The gas fireplace was handy - it does get cool in the evenings even in the summer. We loved the washer/dryer as it was a good size (not like those tiny ones you see stacked in a closet in other rental units).
We arrived after sun down so the road was a bit dark as is the whole neighborhood. Don't expect much in the form of street lights or visible street signs. Thank goodness for GPS and smart phone maps. The free wifi was handy as our cell phone carrier signals were weak. 
The proximity to the entrance to Volcanoes National Park cannot be beat. It gave us an early start into the park and gave us a great place to stay the night after a full day there (including watching sunset from the Jagger Museum lookout).
We were very happy with our stay thanks to Becky and her accommodation. Thank you!

Incredible place right in the rain forest. Hawai'i Volcanoes NP and Hilo.
Highly recommended

This house was perfectly situated close to Volcano National Park, which was the purpose of our visit, and comfortably accommodated our group of 5.  There was a good supply of games and moves for our downtime - and a great living room area to convene in - and the condiments and spices available in the kitchen made cooking a breeze without having to buy lots of ingredients that would ultimately go to waste.

The house was a little musty when we walked in - to be expected in a wet environment - but we turned the dehumidifiers up just a little and it was great.

Ohana House is warm and welcoming. Rooms are clean and well stocked. Lots of great amenities like TV with DVDs, board games, great kitchen stuff and washer/ dryer. It's so convenient to Volcano National Park, but located in a quiet residential street in a safe neighborhood.
Nice place to stay near volcano and Becky provided a crib for the baby we were traveling with
Lovely home with everything you need.
Great location wish we stayed longer!

This place has a great layout for several people to stay. It’s both spacious and cozy and so welcoming. Becky was very helpful before our arrival. Close to the National Park and charming and clean and comfortable. The backyard has a little path to walk. The kitchen was nicely stocked. We were very pleased in every way.
Stay was great, thanks!

Casa bellissima immersa nel foresta pluviale. La casa è curata in tutti i dettagli, con uno stile in linea con la natura circostante. Becky è stata molto di aiuto nel preparare il nostro arrivo dandoci le necessarie informazioni legate alla situazione dell’eruzione del vulcano. La casa è lontana dalla zona colpita, quindi nessun problema. La casa è perfetta per 6 persone, benché abbia solo due bagni e coloro che dormono nel sottotetto devono scendere delle scale per andare in bagno. Ci sono tutte le comodità per rendere piacevolissimo il soggiorno immersi nella foresta.

Beckys place is awesome, perfect for families! So much light and the vaulted ceilings made the home very roomy. We stayed here for a extended period, becky had the home cleaned every week. All the amenities you can want and more. Very nice to have appliances.
It gets cold at night so the gas heater was perfect. Located at the back of the subdivision the location is private, the roads were very peaceful. My kids loved the walks around the block each day. 
There is 3 convenience/mini grocery (2 with gas) stores within 5 minutes and foodland is 30 minute drive. We loved our stay.
Cozy house in the rainforest! Great for families!
Really cool house. The fireplace was awesome.  Loved the view into the rainforest backyard. 5 min from Volcano National Park. Everything we needed was provided.

The location is wonderful for exploring Volcanoes National Park and the east side of the island in general. It rained nightly (and a few days) while my family stayed which was lovely. It was very clean and fun to eat at the dinning room table while viewing the beautiful rainforest through the huge window.

If you have 3-4days to stay in Eastern big island, it is the best house to recommend. House was very cozy and is located in forrest which my family loved , and many rooms for our 8members. Also, there is barbacue grill, so my family had beef BBQ party everyday. So, I recommended this house to everyone. Only complaint from my family was little cold at night for Korean. For other countries' people, I don't think it is problem. Because Korea house has floor heating system, so Korean get used to live with thin clothes on warm floor at wintertime;)
It was an enjoyable experience.

summary: 1BR in SHARED luxury apartment complex in Tung Chung, 10 mins from Airport, Asia World Expo & Disneyland, 10 mins walk (3-5 min bus) to "Citygate outlet w/ subway station & right next to world's famous cable-car to Big Buddha. Complex has swimming pools, modern clubhouse with gym, basketball, badminton, bowling alley, BBQ area, supermarket, Starbucks, bakery, restaurants & 7-11/Circle K. Strictly no smoking (apartment has smoke detector alarm) & comes w/ friendly french bulldog for hugs/cuddles.

name: Apartment For Rent Near Camp Nou
summary: Recently refurbished apartment not too far from Camp Nou and center. The building is located in a quiet area within the busy city center of Barcelona. HUTB-005262
space: Affordable apartment where all 6 occupants can be comfortable because of the large bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. (FOR MONTHLY RENT A MAXIMUM OF 4 PERSONS) It has a bright layout and is located close to Camp Nou. A metro stop at 50 meters allow you to get around easy. Remember that for monthly rental it is essential that we have a proof of the duration of stay, either for studies or medical treatment. Without proof of the duration of stay we can not make a contract and we can not rent the apartment. Extra fee: PLEASE NOTE: late check-in carries the following EXTRA charges:  - EUR 30 after 21:00  - EUR 50 after 00:00 	 A city tax of € 2.48 per person, per night is NOT included. HUTB-005262

host.host_about:
Hi, my name is Pilar. I live in Barcelona.
I love to go to the beach, just relax and read a good book.
Otherwise I like to discover new places in the city. Especially places to go to eat tapas or paella! 



I rent my apartments by Enjoy Apartments, so just to make sure the quality of your stay is everytime perfect, again and again!

reviews.comments: Perfect host, very understanding and helpful!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I think the apartment is good and clean, and the two bathrooms are very convenient for a group of people. The only bad thing is that no elevators are here and it's really hard for you to take the big luggage upstairs.
Pilar's place is quite large and clean. Its close to the metro station, just underfloor. The flat is newly equipped. I would recommend anyone to Pilar's place in Barcelona.

David (celui qui remet les clés)  nous a trés bien accueilli à l'appartement. Il a été très gentil.
Il nous a tout expliqué en détails, les commerces à proximités et tous les endroits à visiter dans la ville.
De plus, il parlait le français, donc cela a facilité l'echange.

Le logement est beaucoup plus petit en vrai que sur les photos..
L'appartement n'était pas au top: vaisselles sales, manque de chaises et de verres pour les six personnes, les chambres mal insonorisés, une salle de bain qui ne se ferme pas à clé et une autre qui se ferme seulement de l'extérieur, pas de ventilateur dans le salon...
Cependant nous avons quand meme passez un bon séjour et c'était satisfaisant dans l'ensemble.

Le quartier est moyen. Le coté positif est qu'il y a une station de metro à 200métres et des commerces à proximité.

The apartment is exactly as described, just perfect for what we needed. The location was great for us, close to public transport and a supermarket. Furthermore, we have a problem with the hired transfer from the airport, Pilar was extremely helpful to solve it, she called the agency in-charged and made sure that we received an explanation and the refund; in the end, we received the transfer to the airport free-of-charge.

Mooi schoon appartement op een fijne  locatie. Om de hoek is de ingang van de metro. Als je met de auto komt kun je die parkeren op de carrer de Sants in een parkeergarage die van 08.00 tot 22.00uur open is. De kosten waren in mei 2016 €10 per 24uur. Een paar minpuntjes van het appartement zijn dat er geen tweepersoons bed is, 1 matras waar de veren bijna uitschieten, en het redelijk gehorig is.

Már visszatérő foglalók vagyunk! Mi Barcelonában élő étteremmel rendelkező házaspár vagyunk akikhez Magyarországról érkezik nagyon sok vendég.Mi nekik szoktunk szállás foglalásban segíteni. Pilarhoz már többedszerre megyünk! Csodás házigazda,csak ajánlani tudjuk mindenkinek aki Barcelonába érkezik.

Appartement agréable pour 6 mais beaucoup plus petit que sur les photos. nous étions 6 adultes donc à l'étroit pour prendre le petit déjeuner.
Quelques équipements sont à  renouveler. le grille pain ne fonctionne plus et une cafetière électrique serait appréciable.
Bon emplacement pour se rendre au Camp Nou à 15 minutes à pied. Métro, bus et parking sont à proximité ainsi que les épiceries.
David parle français, il nous a apporté les informations nécessaires. Pour une première visite à Barcelone nous ne sommes pas déçu !
地理位置还是方便,离市区有点远,附近有超市,有地铁｡

Aunque al final solo pude disfrutar de 1  día en el apartamento de Pilar, todo estaba como en el anuncio. Lo que si debería indicar es que a la llegada hay que pagar la tasa de turista en efectivo. Por lo demás, todo bien!

El piso está muy bien, éramos 4 amigos en un viaje de trabajo. Los fallos que hemos encontrado en este piso son: faltan paños en la cocina, baetas, salvamanteles, cucharas pequeñas, una cafetera nueva, pues la que tenía estaba sin asa. Yo alquilo al menos 5 pisos al año y nunca encontré un piso sin un mínimo de sal, aceite, azúcar, servilleta de papel, papel higiénico al menos un papel higiénico de repuesto en cada baño. Y una de las camas de la 2a HB hace falta cambiar el colchón que está fatal. Lo demás muy bien, ubicación, limpieza y demás servicios un 10. El anfitrión muy educado y atento. Por motivos de trabajo no hemos podido comunicarle estos puntos negativos durante nuestra estada. Saludos.
It's a nice apartment in a typical Barcelona living area. The apartment is as described in pictures and text. The wifi was fine. David gave us a nice welcome and was always available for questions.

Casa sporchissima, con infiltrazioni d'acqua in una camera da letto e in cucina, dove l'intonaco del soffitto, a causa dell'infiltrazione stessa, cadeva nel lavello e sul piano di lavoro della cucina. Forno sporchissimo, come tutte le stoviglie. Passando ai bagni, lo scarico delle due docce era intasato e quindi la doccia si faceva col rischio che l'acqua  trasbordasse dal piatto doccia. I materassi erano sporchi e  con le molle che uscivano. La biancheria vecchia, sporca e strappata. Le foto le ho inviate alla proprietaria subito e sono visibili nella chat. Nessuno ha preso provvedimenti, la biancheria l'ho comprata nuova e in parte ho lavato quella della casa.  Con il poco tempo che avevo per la vacanza, tenuto conto del fatto che ho perso già il pomeriggio del 18 aprile a seguire la cameriera che  ci é stata mandata senza  che nessuno dei proprietari si presentasse, non avevo intenzione di aprire una querelle con Airbnb, che mi avrebbe tolto altro tempo. È chiaro che non userò mai più questo sito, se questo è il livello del servizio
Very convenient location to metro, located in a nice neighborhood. Bedrooms very comfortable. living room is small for four adults but it worked fine.

First thing I would like to note is that I wish there would have been something letting guests know there is a 4 floor walk-up and no elevator. If you are traveling with large suitcases that are heavy, this is not fun going or leaving. 

Overall the apartment was okay. The smell as soon as you enter the building is not good. We soon found out that the building must have a piping problem. We smelled the smell when we first got there to drop off our luggage, but when we came back for actual stay, they cleaned and tried to conceal it. Worked for only a while but smell was there until we left. One night there was a loud noise and when we got up we saw that the plaster from inside the ceiling had fell onto the kitchen counter, right near the pipes. 

We had an issue with the wifi and asked David for help as well as asking him for the sheets to cover the other beds in each room(they only covered one bed in each room). David replied to me hours later stating that the beds were made for 3 people who were the amount of people we paid for and how he will contact someone about the wifi the next morning. I understand that there were 3 people staying there, but if you go to a hotel, how would you feel if one bed was unmade your entire stay? Also, he never checked on the wifi or checked on us to ask was it working properly, I eventually fixed it myself. One thing I did find quite strange was a woman knocking at our door stating she was "a woman from upstairs". When we opened the door she asked us were we with Airbnb and if our wifi wasn't working and how hers wasn't working either. This was quite bizarre and she then let us know she was staying with one of the guys upstairs. Sure. We later believed that she was someone David knew and was checking to see if we had others in the apartment because it was just TOO WEIRD! 

Apartment is very close to transportation and we tried to overlook all of the issues to ensure that our stay was a good one.
Wir haben hier nur mit 6 Personen übernachtet. Die Wohnung ist im 4. Stock, kein Aufzug. 2 Bäder machen den Aufenthalt angenehm. Gerne wieder

The apartment was nicely furnished and conveniently located very close to a metro stop and near the Camp Neu football stadium. It was for the most part very clean, except for some mould on the wall in one room. Overall, it fit our needs as a group of students needing a place to stay for a visit to Barcelona.

I had some difficulty arranging the key pick-up when I first booked the apartment. The rental appears to be through a third party company that requested I fill out an "arrival form," however, there were technical issues with the online form the prevented me from completely it. Eventually, I got in touch with David, who was our host (we never met or heard from Pilar, the host on the airbnb listing). Once we got in contact with David, we arranged for him to meet us at the apartment when we arrived to let us in. We appreciated that he was flexible with us when our flight was delayed and we arrived about an hour later than planned. However, the apartment was not quite ready when we arrived; it was still being cleaned. 

The other issue we experienced was that upon arrival, our host, David, requested that we pay a Barcelona tourism tax. The tax worked out to about 30 euros (for five of us staying three nights) and he wanted us to pay it to him on the spot in cash. We were slightly taken aback, as we had already paid for the airbnb, and did not expect any further expenses.
Easy access to metro and bus network. Clean and light environment. Located on the 3rd floor, no elevator and tiny stairs. In the end, good value for money.

Never met Pilar but was in contact with a man named David. David was extremely helpful but the poor rating is for the lack of a/c. Our trip was in August and we ended up booking a hotel the final 2 nights instead. I had read through previous reviews as well as the description but it was never mentioned. Probably my fault for assuming though. Location isn't the greatest either m

Nice and cozy place and well located. Nice host that were trying to provide us with whatever we may need and also advising for the places to go specially a local bar close to flat for tapas which made one of our best night experience in Barcelona.

All in all, really recommendable and will be my first choice in next trip to Barcelona.
Super miejsce wypadkowe, Camp Nou bardzo blisko co było dla nas bardzo istotne, stacja metra też. Warunki w mieszkaniu w porządku. Polecam
Pilars place was a great find in barca would recommend

Although we didn’t meet Pilar, David was great with getting us checked in. We were caught off guard when he asked to take pictures of all our ID’s with his personal phone, but we complied. We didn’t have enough toilet paper, it was four of us for 9 days and we only had one roll in each bathroom. (There’s multiple stores nearby so it wasn’t much of an incovineice to go buy some but still). Other than that, our stay was great! Really close to the metro, and dining places. Communication was great, and they were flexible with our check out time!
입실시간을 확인 바랍니다.

We had a great trip, wasn’t in the apartment much. However when we were in the apartment we were sweltering without no air con and we were aware that there was no air on before we arrived but it’s just something to consider! Overall we had a great stay and Sol was very nice! There was a nice bakery/cafe just a 2 min walk from the apartment and the Nou Camp was a 10 min walk and easy bus stop location into the city

La ubicación está muy cerca del metro línea 5, es muy cómodo para ir lugares famosos.
En el primer piso hay un bar, por la noche es un poco molestia.
La ventilación de la casa no es muy agradable, comer en el salón ni tiene ventilador hacer bastante calor.

Хорошая уютная квартира, чисто, район тихий, до центра правда дольше ехать чем хотелось бы. Хозяин общительный, несколько раз написала нам, спросила, все ли хорошо и не нужно ли чего нам. Впечатления остались приятные)
Appartement propre, spacieux et lumineux. Ventilateurs efficaces et rendant le climat plus agréable dans les chambres
Aconsejable para pasar unos días en Barcelona entre amigos.
Lovely apartment with 3 double bedrooms. Perfect for a few nights stay in Barcelona. Great central location with nearby metro allowing easy access to all parts of Barcelona.

A nice place to stay, located close to the Metro and Bus Stop. The stairway is wide and has landings at each turn, making it easy to maneuver luggage up. There is a nice Bakery right around the corner.

name: 【福田口岸/香港落马洲】精品舒适一居室
summary: ★	我有故事,你有酒吗? 【旅途路上的小栈】是我在这个城市中的一片静谧之地｡Sam是一位帅气热情的小哥哥｡我们热爱生活,喜欢旅行,享受美食,做自己喜欢的事情,每个人的人生都是多姿多彩的,有付出就有收获,希望每个人都能得到自己想要的,期待遇到有共同兴趣爱好和价值观的朋友,希望大家会喜欢我的房子,很高兴我们即将相遇｡ ★	闪光点 旅途中的家,为了远道而来的你 户型向阳,午后慵懒的躺在阳光里 专业保洁清扫,五星级酒店品质床品,让您住的安心 房屋配置智能密码锁,一客一密码,一客一保洁,出入无需钥匙门卡 专业入住指引,全程自助,给您最安静的享受 ★	最佳位置 房子位于福田口岸附近的金地名津小区,紧邻福田口岸,进出香港非常方便,地铁一到两站到达福田高铁站/会展中心/购物公园等商圈,周边设施完善｡楼下有散步花园､商场超市､电影院,美食､衣食住行便利,休闲娱乐应有尽有,出差生活都是不错的选择｡

name: 3 Persons Room +Private Bathroom ( 3 人家庭房+私人浴室)
summary: 我們位於尖沙咀,鄰近步行3分鍾便可到尖沙咀的地鐵站, 即使步行去海港城也只需10分鍾,鄰近也有大型超級市埸 ,有很多出名的小食店, 有龍城藥房,不同款式的餐廳如翠華等等.......(數之不盡)    這個房源是一間3人房, 即房內有一張雙人床及一張單人床,  而且房間內設有浴室 ｡    房間內有齊基本日常用品 , 如洗頭水, 沐浴露, 浴巾, 一次性的牙膏,牙刷, 拖鞋 等等..... 更有熱水壺 ,空調 , 沐浴的電熱水爐 上網方面, 我們有免費WI FI 清潔方面, 我們的女工會每天來到你的房間做清潔的,  希望為每個客人帶來舒適 及滿意的旅程呢^^
space: We are located in Tsimshatsui, 3 minutes walk to the subway station in Tsim Sha Tsui, 10 minutes walk to Harbour City, there is also a large supermarket near, there are many famous snack shops, there is a Dragon City pharmacy, different styles of restaurants Such as Tsui Wah, etc. ... (never available)     This property is a 3 person room, ie there is a double bed and a single bed in the room. And the room has a bathroom.     There are basic daily necessities in the room, such as shampoo, shower gel, and bath towels. Disposable toothpaste, toothbrush, slippers, etc..... More kettles, air conditioners, bathing electric water heaters For internet access, we have free WI FI In terms of cleaning, our female unions come to your room every day for cleaning. We hope to bring a comfortable and satisfying journey to every guest. ^^

reviews.comments: 开心愉快

预定了之后才知道是重庆大厦｡
房间居住体验还可以,电梯一次只能上五个人,排队时间比较长,电梯对面的水管窗那里味道有点难闻｡
地理位置非常好,周边很方便｡
主要楼下东南亚人有些多,女生单独走动的话有些害怕,地理位置很好,房东虽然没出现,但是清洁工人很好,很热心｡总体还不错｡
虽然我不太喜欢重庆大厦,但是房间真的很好,装修有格调,很干净!
没去过的游客到酒店之前一定要先和房东沟通,房东很好说话,不然去到自己在门口会很尴尬的｡
2个房间建议多1个转换插座
就是房间实在是太小了,其他的都很ok,一个人站在地下都转不开身｡

name: 2-bedroom apartment in the Old Town
summary: The place is perfectly located just 2 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and everything in the Gothic Quarter and the Old Town. The flat is equipped with the most modern furnishings including plasma TVs and elevators that bring you directly to your flat which provide added privacy and security. If you're travelling in a large group it is possible to reserve more than one of the Ramblas flats and stay together.
space: We do our best to make your stay pleasant and comfortable. The apartment is always cleaned before your arrival, and everything is fixed and prepared for your stay. Nevertheless, we do not provide typical hotel services such as breakfast, room service, pick up at the airport service etc. Also please do not expect basic supplies such as coffee, sugar, salt and oil and to be provided. However, you will find a couple of rolls of toilet paper, all cutlery and crockery, a coffee maker, a microwave, bed linen and towels.

host.host_about:
Hola! 

We have been managing over 30 wonderful apartments in Barcelona for many years, and have hosted guests from all over the world. Our properties are maintained in a perfect condition, most of them have been recently renovated. We offer accommodations in the most popular areas of Barcelona (Gothic Quarter, El Born, Barceloneta, Eixample and Gracia) for a reasonable price. Being into the hospitality for such a long time, we know how to make your stay smooth and comfortable. Our team is always there to answer your questions and help you in case you need anything during your stay. 

We'll be glad to welcome you in Barcelona!

name: ★BABU HOUSE ★ Bed in Mixed Dormitory ★ Taksim ★
summary: The 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room is located on the ground floor, this bed in dormitory has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The shared bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries.
space: Our self-serviced accommodation Babu House,  is an oasis of calmness and tranquility amidst the bustling city-center of Istanbul. With its spacious and light-flooded rooms, Babu blossoms with poise, serving as a haven of comfort in the buzzing and most desired district of Taksim, Beyoglu. Babu’s cleanliness, modern simplicity and service-oriented personnel, will offer you a piece of mind and joy to return to, after a long day in the city.

host.host_about: Hi, my name is Madlen and I'm 28 years old. I was born and raised in Munich, Germany and later moved to New York for college. Later, when my family and I visited Istanbul for a short holiday, we realised the need for good quality but affordable holiday apartments. We offer several fully furnished holiday apartments in the heart of Istanbul.
