house_rules: De la limpieza: Se deberá respectar la rotación de limpieza de la casa según el calendario previsto. Se debe guardar silencia a partir de las 22.00 horas. Gastos de servicios: 25 €/mes en verano y 45 € en invierno.

name: Spacious room with private floor in 3 story home
summary: Relish in the charm this beautiful three story terrace home has to offer, situated in a quiet leafy tree lined street in the heart of Rozelle. Meander up the hill to enjoy the many popular pubs, restaurants, fashion and gifts shops. On Saturday's head down to the famous Orange Grove Farmer's Market or enjoy a picnic at the park, at Balmain ferry wharf. Due to its close proximity to the city, Rozelle is an ideal location for professionals.
space: Styled for comfort and relaxation, boasting city skyline views, a comfortable king sized bed, a flowing working area and large living quarters with your own private floor. The common areas are shared and can be enjoyed by our guests. The house offers a private gated courtyard filled with fresh herbs and edibles grown by us! A fully functional kitchen, laundry with washer/dryer facilities, and a large comfortable living and dining area. There is one bathroom with a shower and bathtub, as well as 2 separate toilets on the ground floor and second level. Internet access is available and can be used throughout the duration of your stay. BBQ facilities are also available. We ask that you please clean the area including all utensils and grill plates if you decide to use it. For our guests with cars, unmetered street parking is available. Your room is located on the top floor where there are two flights of stairs. Long term stays are preferred however, it is not a requirement. GETTING AROUND R
description: Relish in the charm this beautiful three story terrace home has to offer, situated in a quiet leafy tree lined street in the heart of Rozelle. Meander up the hill to enjoy the many popular pubs, restaurants, fashion and gifts shops. On Saturday's head down to the famous Orange Grove Farmer's Market or enjoy a picnic at the park, at Balmain ferry wharf. Due to its close proximity to the city, Rozelle is an ideal location for professionals. Styled for comfort and relaxation, boasting city skyline views, a comfortable king sized bed, a flowing working area and large living quarters with your own private floor. The common areas are shared and can be enjoyed by our guests. The house offers a private gated courtyard filled with fresh herbs and edibles grown by us! A fully functional kitchen, laundry with washer/dryer facilities, and a large comfortable living and dining area. There is one bathroom with a shower and bathtub, as well as 2 separate toilets on the ground floor and second level.
neighborhood_overview: Rozelle/Balmain offers a village lifestyle, quality restaurants, curated fashion, gift and antique shops, water views, walking tracks, a boat club, an abundance of pubs, heritage buildings alongside architect-designed multi-level terraces, parks and a very proud dog culture. What's not to enjoy!
notes: We ask that you please use all common areas with respect, and clean up after yourself. This includes cleaning of used dishes, rubbish and the BBQ if you decide to use it. Extra fees may be applied if the house is left unkept. Please do not bring anyone other than yourself, to our home. Parties are strictly forbidden. We are a working home and ask that you respect all partrons by keeping noise at a minimum, from 10pm.
access: You are welcome to access all common areas and of course, your room during the entirety of your stay. Out of courtesy, the two bedrooms located on the second floor are not accessible. A guest book will be kept at the house for you to go through should you have any questions however, please feel free to contact me or speak to your two hosts Jacqueline and Justin who will be present (intermittently), if you are unsure of anything.
interaction: I will be away during your stay so I won't have the pleasure of meeting you, however you will be greeted by two other beautiful hosts, Jacqueline and Justin. If you're lucky enough, Justin might also treat you to a visit and a cuddle by his gorgeous french bulldog, Pebbles (Pebbles does not live on the property).
house_rules: Please respect our home as if it were your own. Please clean up after yourself including washing of any used dishes, removing waste and cleaning the BBQ if you decide to use it. Extra cleaning fees may be applied if the house is left unkept. We are a working home and ask that noise be kept to a minimum, from 10pm. Parties and additional guests not included in the initial  booking are strictly forbidden.

host.host_about: I have a great love of nature and being outdoors. I love food and am always keen for a good shout. Kindness goes a long way. Easy going nature.

reviews.comments:
Naturally the first thing that is most unique about staying at Andy’s place is that you are living in an attic/loft with 2 skylight windows that bring in plenty of sunshine! It’s not everyday you get to wake up with the sun shining down on you which made waking up very pleasant just busking in the morning light. 

Second of all, I don’t think we’ve ever been on a more comfortable bed. Every night we fall asleep so easily and soundly and every morning it takes us ages to get off the bed because it’s really just that comfortable. You have to try it to believe it.

While Andy wasn’t around in the place, her friend Jacque was and she was the warmest person ever. We were late checking in on the first night and she waited for us to get back so she could welcome us in. 

The toilets are also very extremely clean and well fitted, hot water readily available.

Andy also lives in a really nice quiet neighbourhood that isn't too far off from the city too, which is great cos travelling is convenient and you still get to come home to peace and quiet. That being said, there are plenty of great cafe's and eateries around the neighbourhood, so if you feel like avoiding the city hustle, you're covered.

All in all, we can’t recommend Andy’s place enough and we will definitely be back again soon!

Andy’s place was a lovely, bright and sunny room even though it was a bit far from lightrail or bus stops. I stayed for one week and it was a perfect choice for me. It have spacious bed and all the lovely objets, and the view of the city was beautiful.

Andy's place is really lovely, check-in was simple and is a good proximity to Sydney CBD an as well as some lovely bay walks. Housemates are super welcoming and the kitchen is equipped with basic necessities to cook in the kitchen. The room is a little bit warm in the summer due to being on the top floor but Andy has provided a fan. The room was very clean and spacious with comfy pillows and nice bedding. Highly recommend!

name: Bedroom & living room  in the best part of Ipanema
summary: One complete suite, living with a kitchen ent with good WIFI located in the backside of a residential building with the subway station, good restaurants, bars, cafes, bus stops and 2 good supermarkets almost besides. Ipanema beach 3 blocks away
space: One bedroom with living room apartment in the backside of a small residencial building with  elevator and 12/24 hours doorman .   In the living a sofabed, fits 2 persons confortably,  air conditionning, fan ceiling,  LCD  cable TV, high speed internet with wireless (10 MB),  a  telephone line for unlimited incoming calls. The bedroom has also air conditionning,  LCD cableTV,  queen size bed with fresh linen, ceiling fan, a large wardoble with a digital safe box and black out curtains.  A  modern and complete bathroom with hot shower, hygienic shower , hair dryer, good and clean shower and face towels, (not alowed  for the beach).  Kitchen with a cooktop stove, microwave, 2 doors refrigerator, electric coffee machine, electrical sandwich maker, blender, dishes, glasses,  tops, pans, a sort of utensils for the kitchen, a washing machine, iron and  ironing board. Few meters from the subway station General Osório and one block to the bus stops to almost all directions, 30 meters to a compl
description: One complete suite, living with a kitchen ent with good WIFI located in the backside of a residential building with the subway station, good restaurants, bars, cafes, bus stops and 2 good supermarkets almost besides. Ipanema beach 3 blocks away One bedroom with living room apartment in the backside of a small residencial building with  elevator and 12/24 hours doorman .   In the living a sofabed, fits 2 persons confortably,  air conditionning, fan ceiling,  LCD  cable TV, high speed internet with wireless (10 MB),  a  telephone line for unlimited incoming calls. The bedroom has also air conditionning,  LCD cableTV,  queen size bed with fresh linen, ceiling fan, a large wardoble with a digital safe box and black out curtains.  A  modern and complete bathroom with hot shower, hygienic shower , hair dryer, good and clean shower and face towels, (not alowed  for the beach).  Kitchen with a cooktop stove, microwave, 2 doors refrigerator, electric coffee machine, electrical sandwich maker, b
neighborhood_overview: First of all the beach, but the way people live really seduce me a lot, much more than any other place in the World !
notes: Uma cama queen size no quarto para 2 pessoas e um confortável sofá-cama para 2 pessoas.
transit: A half a block to General Osório subway station and just a block to the buses stops, besides many taxis passing right in front of the building.
access: Will know my personal email and cellular number, it has "What is Up", being able to ask me any doubt any time directly, before or during the stay, if necessary. ---------------------------------------------//-------------------------------------------- Saberão meu email pessoal e podendo tirar qualquer duvida a qualquer tempo diretamente, antes ou durante a estadia, se necessário.
interaction: If you'll need any support during the check-in as well as during the checkout I'll be in touch with the guests providing all the necessary tips and giving all the kind of help, if necessary including how to use the public transportations (buses, subway and taxis) .  On the other hand, I can leave you free if you prefer your privacy the entire period.
house_rules: No noise between 10:00 pm to 08;00 am and 24 hours on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.  No parties, no drugs, no smoking inside of the apartment.  The keys will be given in the check-in and shall be returned in the checkout.  Towels are not for the beach and avoid seating with sand . Check-in after 1:00 pm and checkout till 11:00 am, unless won't be other guests arriving or departuring on the same days.  After booking send all complete names, passports numbers or ID's cards (if Brazilians) and the flights schedules to Rio.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I live with my wife Soraia in Copacabana, Rio, where I was born. I love to travel to small towns close to Rio.  I'm a Rio's lover and like to host people from all over the world  in our apartments located in Copacabana and Ipanema, giving all the necessary tips for a nice stay in Rio.
----------------------------//--------------------------------

Eu vivo com minha esposa Soraia em Copacabana, Rio, aonde nasci. Adoro viajar para pequenas cidades perto do Rio. Sou apaixonado pelo Rio e gosto de receber hóspedes de todas as partes do mundo nos nossos apartamentos localizados em Copacabana e Ipanema, dando todas as necessárias dicas para uma boa estadia no Rio.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Отличное место!! Идеальное расположение, в пешей доступности пляжи Ипанемы и Копокабаны, полно кафе и ресторанов, спокойно и безопасно. В квартире есть все необходимое, идеально для пары. Особое спасибо хозяину Levy, который не только предоставляет удобное и недорогое жилье, но и может быть прекрасным гидом с великолепным чувством юмора, который подскажет куда лучше всего пойти и как добраться менее затратным способом!! Огромное Спасибо Levy за организованный отдых и предоставленные советы и всяческую помощь!

We had a good time in Rio, in this apartment that is very well located in Ipanema. Ipanema is a safe area, the apartment is 1 block away the metro station and 2 blocks from the beach.

Levy assisted us when we had a problem with the hot water, and recommended a lot of places to go, including a quick sightseeing around the neighbourood in order to show supermarket, restaurant, bus stations...

Recommended for your stay in Rio

We had the luck and pleasure to spend 4 nights in Levy's amazing apartment at Ipanema. The place has everything one can need: fully equipped kitchen, living room area, very confortable huge bed, big closet and nice bathrooms; everything decorated in a very stylish modern way, with brand new furniture and topped up with flat screen TV's in pretty much every room and AC :)! 
However, the best part of the whole experience was Levy himself, one of the most helpfull and dedicated hosts I have ever met. FIrst of all he really help us out at the time of finding accomodation since we only started looking for it one day before our arrival to Rio. When we did the chek-in at his place he gave us a full master class about Rio, the different areas and things we could do to make the most out of our stay. He filled us up with all kinds of info about buses, metro, prices and so on. Also, he was kind enough to take us out for a walk around the neighbourhood, including a really interesting visit to a nearby favela. 
To anyone thinking about staying at this one or any other of Levy's appartments I would suggest not to hesitate too much and book it at once, before it's too late and somebody else does ;)

Apartment was clean, well equipped and perfectly located for my work-trip-but-I-still-want-know-Rio plans.

However, if you're visiting Rio for the first time, the best reason to get this apartment is the host.

Senhor Levy is extremely nice and helpful, showing around and recommending plans.
O Levy é extremamente atencioso, e o apartamento é muito bem localizado.  recomendo definitivamente!

I travel to Brazil with some frequency and rent apartments there.  If you are going to Rio you should be prepared to receive less for your money than you might expect. 
This apartment is definitely well above average.  The location is excellent in terms of access to the beach, the metro, groceries, and restaurants, bars, etc.  The little park across the street hosts a number of interesting fairs during the week as well. It is in Ipanema proper, not Copa or Arpoador, and should command a higher price. The furnishings are well above average for Brazil.  There is relatively a lot of space, and the bedroom is separate and has a nice AC.  The kitchen/living room is well equipped as well.   This area cannot be cooled well because the windows cannot be closed.  Levy says this is a Brazilian regulation because of the gas water heater and stove, and this sounds about right for Brazil.  There is a washer, and a small clothes drying rack above, and a second toilet.  Everything works well in the kitchen.  All this is very good.
On the downside the sofa is possibly the most uncomfortable I have ever sat in. It is hard and  if you lean back it wants to unfold into a bed.  The TV receives no English channels, although occasionally you might find one show in English.  No sports either.  There is no outside view, but the windows allow good light.
Levy himself is very helpful and ready to provide you with helpful advice and guidance for the area.  He wants you to enjoy your stay.  Believe me, this is a rarity.
I also recommend the BnB structure which allows you to pay by credit card.  Almost all apartment owners in Rio want you to pay in cash in advance with American dollars or Euros.  You have little recourse if you have problems, and the rental agencies will almost always side with the owners because that is how they make money.  Be very careful!  Scams are common.
All in all, I would say this is one of the best values I have received in Rio in my many travels.  I would stay there again, and I recommend this owner highly.  4 stars is a high rating for me.  I don't think I have ever experienced "excellence" in Brazil in terms of lodging, even at much higher prices or in hotels.  This apartment is pretty close to as good as it gets, at least in anything remotely close to this price.

Apartamento ótimo, com móveis novos, cama e sofá cama muito confortaveis e espaçosos, roupa de cama e toalhas limpos e em perfeita condição, banheiro excelente, wifi e TVs muito bons e tudo funcionando. Tivemos pequenos problemas, que foram prontamente resolvidos pelo proprietário (cortina e cheiro de cigarro), que nos apresentou a cidade, deu diversas dicas e respondeu sempre de imediato quando contactado.  O bairro é excelente e o apartamento é muito bem localizado (próximo a mercados, metrô, ponto de táxi, bares, e a 2 quadras da praia). O apartamento fica bastante próximo à entrada da favela do cantagalo, mas como ela está pacificada é muito tranquilo (andamos, inclusive, durante a madrugada). Um problema é que as janelas dos banheiros ficam viradas para dentro da casa, e não para (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficarei no apartamento novamente quando voltar ao Rio.

When we arrived from the airport it was raining cats and dogs in Rio. The landlord was waiting for us and helped us with an umbrella to get our luggage into the house and the appartment which is on the first floor (the house has an elevator).
The appartment has about 40 sqm with a double bed bedroom and another small room with a sofa which can be converted to an additional bed for 1 (exceptionally 2) persons.
There are 2 toilets, a bathroom, a kitchen and a washing machine in the appartment (all seems to be very new).
The airbnb process with the landlord was very friendly and reliable. The price is fair for Rio because the hotels in Rio have a very bad price/service relation. 
Only the view out of the appartment was not very attractive but this is not important if you are out all day long.

---> recommandable

Hi - Levy's place was perfect for what we were looking for - great location in Ipanema, comfortable bed and nice bathrooms. Levy was a wonderful host as well, showing us around the neighborhood and pointing us to a few places we needed to go. We'd definitely stay here again. Thanks, Levy!

Minha sogra esteve hospedada com sua mãe no apartamento do Sr Levy. Primeiramente, o Sr Levy é uma pessoa maravilhosa, muito atencioso e solícito. Não tivemos problema algum com checkin ou checkout. O apartamento é ótimo, conservado, praticamente novo, a internet funciona perfeitamente e tudo estava exatamente como nas fotos! Pertíssimo da praia e bem estruturado, não temos do que reclamar! Obrigada Sr Levy!
The apartment is fantastic, clean, well equiped, with internet, close to the beach, exactly like the pictures showed. Mr Levy is a very nice person and we did'nt have any problem with the check in and check out!

Me and my boyfriend had to stay in Rio for business and the apartment was perfect for that. Wash Machine, Wi-Fi that works perfectly, very comfortable bed.. everything works like in a new house. And the location is so perfect that sometimes we forgot the business and enjoyed the city as tourists. That's also because Levy was such a great host that provided us an incredible list of to do's and to go's list!!

This is a fantastic location in Ipanema. It is safe. It is close to public transport - buses and the metro (when it re-opens after renovations). There are many places to eat nearby - many of them are of good quality. Also, there are 2 super-markets within a stone's throw and 24hr juice and salgado bars. The beach is slightly further away but still an easy walk.

The apartment itself comfortably fit the two of us. There are two toilets which is handy. Having a clothes washing machine is handy for longer stays. You can hear the neighbours talking as the apartments are set closely together but we did not have any troubles sleeping. The place is more utilitarian rather than luxurious but you are saving money compared to the hotels. The plumbing is older so you can't flush toilet paper down the toilet.

Levy was there to check us in and check us out. He has a wealth of information for visitors, bus routes, places to eat and even took us on a mini tour of the local area.

Levy was a wonderful host! He waited to let us in an hour later due to a delayed flight (at 10pm). Upon arrival he gave us a very thorough description of the apartment. The apartment is very well located (2 blocks from the beach, great juice bars on every corner, bars nearby, Starbucks down the street for the occasional guilty pleasure). He was an incredible host and always replied to our questions within 24 hours. Would definitely recommend to others that are looking for an apartment to rent in this area.

Some things to note: make sure to ask for the safe code so that you can put your valuables in it. The closest subway stop is currently under construction and it's a bit inconvenient, but the busses are super cheap and reliable. The outside room doesn't have air conditioning so if you have people staying out there, keep the master room open to get the air flowing.

As the previous reviews have stated the location of this apartment is fantastic, right in the heart of Ipanema and only 2 blocks from the beach. We stayed for 5 nights and found it very easy to get around and loved being so close to so many restaurants, cafes, juice bars and supermarkets. The apartment is a good size for 2 people, with 1.5 bathrooms, but i can imagine it would be a bit tight if you had extra people staying in the living room. The building and apartment feels secure and we did not feel unsafe at all when walking around the area, even at night.

Probably the only downside to the apartment is that since there is only one window (in the bedroom) that opens onto the neighbouring apartment's balcony there is not much natural light in the rest of the apartment. The AC and fans work well but we found it a bit difficult to dry clothes and towels during the day, as we did not want to leave the windows open when we left the apartment.

Levy is an incredibly friendly host who went out of his way to give us a tour when we first arrived and also lots of advice on restaurants, buses, sights and other useful information. This personal touch was really valuable and is one of the reasons we were attracted to this apartment and continue to book through airbnb. Overall we had a great stay and would definitely recommend staying here.

Our flight to Rio arrived 4 hours late but there was no problem, Levy waited for us at the apartment.
The place is super nice and extremely well located. There are 2 supermarkets, a fancy one across the street and another bigger one at the corner.
Restaurants, bars and the most beautiful beach are just a couple  blocks away.
Copacabana is also close-by, you can either walk 20 mins or take public transportation.
The subway is just half a block away but at the moment the Ipanema/osorio station is closed for expansion.
The apartment is fully equipped with everything. You only need to bring soap, shampoo, and food.
I will definitely come back to rio and (hopefully) find this apartment available for rent.
One of the best places to rent in Ipanema !!! Can't say enough about Levy's great service also highly recommended for any of his great apartments !

Great Location in Ipanema !! Once again you can count on Levy, needed a place the same night and I contacted him mid AM, he had the apartment cleaned and ready for check-in late afternoon !! Thanks for all your efforts Levy !! Obrigado

The appartment is nice, clean and comfortable with fast internet.
The location is perfect, close to Ipanema beach.
Mr levy is extremely friendly and provided a lot of useful tips.

The flat is well furnished and well situated and we really enjoyed our stay in Ipanema, two grownups and our baby daughter.  We stayed for five days, very comfortably, enough space, practical layout though the space is quite snug, very nice bathroom, clean surfaces, equiped  kitchenette, good wifi. Very centrally located in Ipanema, Lots of shops and cafes and beach close by. 
And Levy was very helpful, responded very quickly to our enquiry, and helped us around!
Levy Is an Nice guy friendly and informative. The Apartment has been nicely fitted out and is very functional practical and in a perfect location. highly recomended great apartment.

Levy has been an incredibly helpful and friendly host. He was perfectly on time picking us up, explained everything in the flat in great detail and gave us some great sightseeing tips, for example which buses to take to the various attractions, which saved us a lot of money. We originally had some problems with the pillows, which we emailed him about and it took not even an hour for him to call us and replace the pillows the same day. He even walked us and our luggage to the hotel from which we were picked up for our onward trip and offered us to leave our luggage at his private place on our last day which would have been very helpful due to our late night flight departure. 
The flat in Ipanema was very central to everything. Only minor thing to note was that it is in a short one way street, that many taxis don't bother driving into and rather drop you at the corner with the main street. Since there is a favela in the near vicinity that made us a little uncomfortable at night sometimes.

The apt is at a great spot if you like to stay in ipanema. The buses towards downtown (the subway on plaza osorio still under construction), pao azucar, christ statue is 30sec from the door, 2min walking down to the beach, 10min walk to aporador and on the other side copacabana beach. You can even walk to cantagalo metrostation (closest which is running) in 15-20min to take the metro to centre (which with the traffic in rio is suggested).

 Quiet apartment, Leyv answered quickly, no problems with the organisation. GREAT bed!!better then mine at home!clean apartment, but as always smaller than the pictures would suggest.but fitted our family of 2 adults and 2 kids perfect (they slept in a bed for babies we brought and a inflate madress Levy left for us since the kids like to sleep in our room-thank you levy.) otherwise the sofa is possible to make a bed-but the area in the livingroom will then be very cramped if the sofa is folded out-would need to stow it away every day if you want to use the table etc.) never used the TV, but stove, fridge and washmachine worked fine. Small kitchen, but regular as always abroad... Good hot water! The only downside is no balcony (for us parents who would love to soak in the air/athmosphere 'at home' even after the kids gone to sleep)! /märta

La experiencia con Levy fue muy buena.  El departamento esta increiblemente ubicado, y Levy fue muy atento y de mucha ayuda para moverme en rio.  Recomendaría plenamente el departamento.  Un solo punto en contra: por momentos salían olores feos de las alcantarillas del departamento (como si hubiera estado mucho tiempo sin uso).  Mas allá de todo volvería nuevamente al departamento de Levy ya que fue todo muy bueno.---- The experience in Levy's apartment was excellent.  The apartment was incredible located and Levy was there all the time for everything that we need.  I would totally come back to this place, was really clean and comfortable.  The only negative point was that sometimes some weird smell come from the pipes (aparently because the apartment was not in use at the time of our arrival).  Nevertheless I would totally come back to this apartment as the location was amazing, levy was supportive and the apartment was super super beautiful.

muy buen anfitrion ,respondio a todas nuestras preguntas,y que nos ha esperado puntualmente a nuestra llegada, con el apartamento impecable.Nos dio indicaciones sobre el vecindario y mejores lugares para compras. El apartamento es muy comodo, y cumplio con nuestras espectativas , esta hecho a nuevo y cuenta con todas las comodidades para una buena estada.Esta cerca de los mejores bares y restos , como asi de la playa. Muchas gracias y recomendamos al anfitrion, para que Ud. planifique con confianza ,sus vacaciones .

I had a great stay at Levy's apartment. Check-in was very easy and everything was as promised. The location of the apartment was perfect. I would recommend Levy's apartment.
Thanks Levy!

Levy es un excelente anfitrión! Estuvo para recibirnos en el departamento a las 2 de la mañana, nos ayudó a instalarnos y luego nos brindó información de utilidad para disfrutar de Rio. El apartamento cumplió plenamente nuestras expectativas y se encuentra en una excelente ubicación. Cerca de todo!
Si bien el edificio no es nuevo, los baños, la cocina, sábanas, toallas y utensillos de cocina parecían a estrenar.
La relación precio/calidad-comodidad, es inmejorable!
Muchas gracias por todo Levy!!!

Thank you so much for our stay in your wonderful apartment. The location is absolutely brilliant - in the heart of Ipanema less than a 5 minute walk to the beach front. Levy was a wonderful host, making us feel welcome and safe in the bright lights of Rio, even giving us a tour of the local area and supermarkets, making sure we knew where everything was. He gave us advice on where to go / what to do and even book our taxi for the return to the airport.

The apartment was perfect for our use, clean & bright, fantastic location and in a safe neighbourhood, and I would recommend it to any one!

We hope to one day return! Thanks, Neal, Graham & Michael

Levy was a great host! Check in was a breeze and he had some great recommendations for the area. Levy was in constant communication with me before and during the trip. The listing was as advertised; clean and comfortable.

Best Location in Ipanema & one of the best hosts in Rio !! I have stayed in Levy's apartment for many of my business trips and he is truly one of the best hosts in Rio, he is more than willing to assist with any problem or need while in Rio and his the apartment is always spotless & just like the pictures on the listing !! Highly Recommended !!

as the headline says - it's definetly surrounded with everything!

great location, almost next to metro station and general Osrio square. less than 10 min walking to the beach.

a lot of shops, bars, supermarkets, restaurantes.

It's perfect for 2 and vey suitable for up 4 people. very good bed and bathroom.

good wifi.

Levy himself is great host. he was waiting for me about 2 hours after my landing (due to terrible traffic).

He showed everything in the apartment. and then Levy showed to me all places worth to visit at Ipanema and Copacabana. and also helped me to buy local sim-card.

so i definetely recommend this apartment. or ask Levy for another options he has.

looking forward to return back to Rio

Anfitrião amável e disponível. A chegada deixou-nos sugestões sobre locais a visitar transportes segurança. Mostrou-nos o bairro e inclusive alguns locais ode poderíamos comer e fazer compras. Durante estadia contactou por diversas vezes, com sugestões e esteve  sempre disponível para apoiar em qualquer duvida. Apartamento corresponde a descrição limpo e bem equipado. Perto da praia ( 2cruzamentos(3 minutos a pé)).
Foi uma excelente experiencia.

O apartamento está muito bem localizado e muito bem estruturado com ar condicionado, lençol, geladeira, toalhas, tudo muito limpo. Não há uma reclamação que eu poderia fazer. O Levy também é muito cordial e nos deu várias dicas de como aproveitar o Rio.

First off Levy's place was in an ideal location of ipanema. Close to the beach and markets. 
Very safe location

Levy was an excellent host. Very accessible. Showed us around the neighborhood which was very helpful. I would recommend staying here is you plan on visiting Rio.

Levi was a fantastic host and I would highly recommend staying in his apartment if it's your first trip to Rio.  He welcomed us with all the information we needed for the local area and gave us loads of tips that saved us money by being able to use public transport for visiting the major tourist spots.  Great location, lovely clean apartment.
Accurate listing. Close to beach. Clean. Friendly and accommodating host. Would stay here again. Good times during my last week in Ipanema!

Estuvimos alojados por seis noches en el apartamento del Sr. Levy de la calle Teixeira de Melo en Ipanema. Llegamos en el horario previsto y Levy estaba esperándonos en la puerta del edificio. Nos mostró el deparamento y nos dio muchas sugerencias acerca de los lugares que podíamos visitar y cómo llegar a cada uno de ellos. Muy cordial y dispuesto, nos llevó al “Mirante da Paz” que está a 50 mts del departamento, una construcción nueva que provee una vista privilegiada de la zona de Ipanema.

El edificio tiene un encargado (portero) y está ubicado a media cuadra de la Plaza Gral Osorio, que es el nodo de transporte de Ipanema por dónde pasa el 50% de los buses de Rio; además tiene la cabecera de la Línea 1 de metro; y próximamente la de la Línea 4 que irá hasta Barra de Tijuca; lo cual lo pone en una situación privilegiada con respecto al transporte. En cada una de las esquinas hay un supermercado (Zona Sul y Hortifruti) y al estar a 50 mts de Vizconde de Pirayá (el eje comercial de Ipanema) existe una infinita variedad de lugares para comer, asi como comercios en general. La playa de Ipanema está a dos cuadras y  a un máximo de seis cuadras la de Copacabana.

En cuanto al equipamiento, el departamento consta de un dormitorio grande con una cama matrimonial; dos baños; comedor diario y cocina completa. Todos los ambientes con aire acondicionado y ventilador de techo; conexión wifi inalámbrica;  dos Smart TV con cable básico de Sky; vajilla, utensillos y cubiertos en perfecto estado. Todos los electrodomésticos necesarios para una estadía de vacaciones (cafetera, sandwichera, tostadora, microondas, dispenser de agua, etc). la única mejora que haría sería la de agregar sillas de playa y una sombrilla para lelvara  la playa.

La comunicación con Levy fue excelente durante toda la estadía. Un anfitrión para recomendar y volver a visitar nuevamente.

As all other reviews have suggested Levi was a great host. Check in was seamless, he provided helpful information and suggestions for my stay, gave me a brief tour of the neighbourhood on arrival and was easily contactable throughout. The apartment was comfortable and well located. Importantly, the wifi was excellent. Would definitely stay in this apartment again.

We had a great stay in Levys Ipanema apartment. Great location and Levy was an excellent host, welcoming us with a short tour around the local area of Ipanema. We got lots of tips and recommendations and Levy even arranged all our transport. We look forward to our next stay :)
Levy is a very good ed kind host!the apartment is in a perfect position (praça General Osorio), there is a lot of restaurant and bar an supermarket..all that you need! Good!

Sou polonesa e estive pela primeira vez no Brasil no final de agosto. Visitei o Rio no final de semana do feriado de 7 de setembro e tive o prazer de me hospedar no apartamento do Levy! Fui com uma amiga brasileira e tivemos uma excelente impressão do lugar, muito bem localizado, com acesso a metrô e ônibus que passam por vários pontos turísticos da cidade, enfim... Uma experiência e tanto. Me senti segura todo o tempo que estive lá. E o Levy, muito gentil, nos indicou vários restaurantes bacanas, todos bem próximos ao apartamento. Pretendo voltar muito em breve e não tenho dúvidas de onde vou ficar! Recomendo a todos que procuram um local calmo, com excelente localização e um apartamento super confortável, onde se sintam como se estivessem em casa.

Todo mas que perfecto! El barrio y el departamento muy muy lindos.. Y Levy un genio! Te explica de todo y hasta te lleva a conocer rapido restaurantes y supermecados para que todo sea más fácil! También te aconseja sobre que lugares conocer y como manejarse en Rio!! La próxima vuelta a Rio sin dudas serán con Levy!

Levy was a terrific host. He arranged to meet me at the entrance to the apartment and arrived on time. He not only showed me the apartment, but took the additional time to provide a tour of the local area and pointed out some places to eat, where the safe ATMs were located, pointers about the culture, and details on how I could explore the local attractions economically. He also arranged for a taxi to take me to the airport on my return, which was very convenient.
The apartment was quite clean and as described on AirBnb. The pictures are accurate. The shower had plenty of hot water and good pressure, and there is filtered water for drinking as well. The wifi worked great. I felt safe in the neighborhood, and enjoyed feeling like I was a part of the local culture moreso than if I had stayed in a hotel.
For my first time in Rio, this was a great place to stay for an affordable price. I would definitely recommend!

Levy was a great introduction to Rio de Janeiro and Brazil. He had many local tips and suggestions and probably could create a brochure or guide for visitors. The suite was in a secure building on a safe street. It provided everything we needed as guests: a comfortable bed, hot water, refrigerator, dishes, and wifi. The location was nearly perfect. Within two blocks, everything you need is available, including cafes, restaurants, bars, markets, and shopping. Ipanema beach was within a quick and safe three block walk. With the bus and metro one block from the suite, rest of the city was quickly accessible.

Mr. Levy was the perfect host!!! He was willing to let me check in early although I ended up checking much later because my flight was delayed.  However, he was very patient with me and very accomodating.  So much so that he allowed to me do a late check out.

During my stay he advised me where I should eat, where I should go, and where I should stay away from. He even advised me that I should wait to get to Rio before I took out money for my trip because the currency exchange in Rio would be much better. He was so on the money and I am glad I listened to him.

The apartment was perfect!  It was clean and in the perfect location.  It was about 2 blocks away from the beach and very close to restaurants and supermarkets and the bank.  I really enjoyed my stay and will be staying in the apartment again.

Thank you again Mr. Levy for your hospitality!!

Obrigado

Marco

Before booking I sent a message to Levy and he replied quickly with good English. He will give you all the information and he will be waiting for you in front of the apartment. This apartment is on one of the best spots in Rio, surrounded with restaurants/bars and a couple of minutes walkaway to the wonderful Ipanema beach. Levy will give you good tips on where to eat/drink and about transportation as well.

Levy was a great host. Very accommodating of my schedule and sat down with me to point out points of interest on a map, and the best ways to see popular tourist sites.

The apartment was very nice. Aircon and wifi worked a treat. Good location, very close to Ipanema beach and a short walk to Copacabana. Close to the action during Carnavale, but with no noise reaching the room.

Great for a couple, or a few friends who don't mind sharing some space.

There was a little snafu when checking out, but that was on me for not following the house rules closely enough.

Great place, I'd recommend it.
Levy made us very welcome and the area of Ipenema was very safe and lively, with many restaurants and bars.

I stayed in this apartment again because of it's great location to everything.  Mr. Levy, as before, was very helpful in accommodating me.   He ensured that I had a comfortable stay while I was in Rio De Janiero.

I stayed at Levy's apartment just this past weekend and had a great time. Prior to the stay, Levy was very responsive to messages and provided very detailed information about Rio and his apartment in Ipanema. I chose to rent a car and Levy provided great directions to his place and actually got me discounted parking for my stay. Upon arrival, we met Levy at the apartment for a checkin, and he actually took us on a nice walking tour of the immediate area, and provided his advice of things to do in Rio. Apartment location is great - maybe 3 blocks or so in from the water and on the same block as grocery stores, bars, and restaurants. Apartment had all the basic amenities, including filtered water. AC worked wonderfully. Only negative - the walls are pretty thin, so the loud neighbors were a bit annoying at times. Even though there weren't any screens on the Windows, there were no mosquitos at all.

Levy is the ultimate host. He met us at the apartment the morning we arrived, he drew on a map great things to see in Rio and he even took us on a walking tour of the neighborhood, explaining great deals on dining, and where to shop and what events were taking place when we were there. Levy is very concerned with your safety and was very helpful with everything we needed to know.

Levy fue muy amable con nosotros. Siempre facilito la llegada aconsejando como viajar que tener en cuenta de documentos y los cuidados que hay que tener. Estuvo siempre atento a nosotros y a vistes necesidades. Cuando llegamos el
Mismo se tomo su tiempo para organizar nuestos paseos y cual era la mejor forma de realizarlo. Excelente volveremos

As soon as I booked (about 9 months in advance, since it was during the Olympics) Levy began sending me tips for Rio.  

He gave me an option for earlier arrival & on leaving he was prompt for our departure and booked a taxi for us.

The apartment has all the basics needed & even a convenient water filter.

The best is the location.  One half block from the metro station General Osorio and a few blocks from the beach.  Plenty of taxis and busses.

The Ipanema neighborhood was desirable too.  Not crazily loud & conjested like Copacabana.  Surrounded by all the ammentities needed:  banks, supermarkets, restaurants, bars, and shopping.

Thanks Levy for helping to make out stay in Rio during the Olympics so enjoyable.

Karl & Raul

Levy was so nice and helpful and gave us tons of recommendations around the apartment. He was flexible on check-in and out times and even found us cheaper cab fares to the airport! 
The apartment was nice and clean and exactly what we needed for our trip. We honestly didn't spend too much time in the apartment because there is so much to do in Rio. Thank you!

Levy é um excelente anfitrião, não deixando de atender prontamente qualquer solicitação, inclusive durante a madrugada, quando ocorreu uma falha inesperada na rede elétrica do apartamento. Parabéns pela presteza na solução do problema. 
As fotos do apartamento são exatas e a localização é perfeita. Vale a pena se hospedar lá.
Sr. Levy muito atencioso e receptivo, eu e minhas amigas amamos o lugar, a localização! iremos voltar com certeza!

Accueil très chaleureux de Lévy avant même notre arrivée avec plein de conseils pratiques pour notre séjour. La situation de l'appartement est idéale dans un quartier agréable et animé de Ipanema, proche de la plage des restaurants du métro et de tous les commerces. L'appartement est calme très bien équipé, rien ne manque. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Realmente una experiencia maravillosa!  Levy es un anfitrión de lujo, nos asesoró desde antes de llegar a Brasil, desde que bus tomar contemplando el mejor servicio en relación al precio! Fue muy atento en TODO!! Se mantuvo en contacto con nosotras y nos ayudó a evacuar cualquier cantidad de dudas, el apartamento es precioso, super cómodo, limpio y adecuado para cuatro personas adultas! Sin dudas recomiendo pónganse en contacto con Levy, un excelente anfitrión en Ipanema! GRACIAS LEVY

El departamento de levy es genial! Muy bien equipado,  con todas las comodidades, tanto la cama como el sofá cama son super cómodos,  la cocina tiene todo lo necesario para cocinar lo que quieras. Está en una ubicación excelente próximo a ipanema y Copacabana, una zona llena de restaurantes, bares y supermercados! Levy nos recibió muy bien explicándonos todo sobre el lugar y como llegar a los centros turísticos. Sin dudas volveremos
Ottima posizione, vicino la spiaggia di Ipanema e la metro General Osorio.

muy buena ubicación.
Levy muy atento a lo que pueda hacer falta.
muy comodo el departamento y muy silencioso.
Es un departamento muy completo con todo lo necesario para pasar unos buenos días en la ciudad quiero destacar que el anfitrión es muy predispuesto a que los huéspedes se sientan cómodos

Apartamento exatamente igual as fotos, localização perfeita, ao lado do metrô e próximo de tudo, anfitrião super atencioso e deu vairas dicas e sugestões de aproveitar melhor a cidade, recomendo a todos.

Tive necessidade de ir ao Rio para realizar e me recuperar de uma cirurgia. Assim, necessitava de um espaço que me oferecesse conforto, tranquilidade e comodidades.
O atendimento do Levy foi fantástico, pois respondeu a todas as dúvidas e indicou o melhor apartamento que seria adequado ao meu caso.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo a metrô, ponto de táxi, paradas de ônibus, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e bancos. Tudo isso e a dois quarteirões da praia. Entretanto, é muito sossegado, pois fica num trecho de rua sem muito movimento e é de fundos.
A cama é confortável, o banheiro é espaçoso, o apartamento possui Internet de boa velocidade, TV a cabo com os canais principais.  
Durante todo o tempo o Levy esteve disponível por telefone/mensagens e, inclusive, permitiu realizar o checkout tardiamente, para que aguardasse a liberação de outro imóvel.
Certamente voltarei a me hospedar, dessa vez para aproveitar melhor a localização.

Localização perfeita, muito próximo a praia, estação Ipanema/Gal Osório, Supermercado Zona Sul, Starbucks, (Website hidden by Airbnb) elevador, portaria, chuveiro a gás excelente, ar condicionado em dois ambientes, área segura.. enfim, tudo o necessário para ficar numa localização privilegiada, com conforto, gastando um valor justo. O local eh pequeno porém confortável e aconchegante, dá com sobra pra 2 pessoas e acomoda bem até 4. O Levy eh um excelente anfitrião, muito engraçado e organizado, responde rapidamente as mensagens, e tem dicas para todos os aspectos da sua estadia. Recomendo.

L'appartement est situé dans le bon Rio : Ipanema , il Ya tout ce qu'il faut autour à moins de 5 Mn (supermarché, bars , bons restaurants, plage d'ipanema, shopping ). L'appartement est idéal pour visiter Rio.
Very good and well located place. Clean, neat and with all facilities one can need when traveling (wifi, laundry machine, etc).

A very nice place to stay in Ipanema. Well located, close to the metro and beach. The apartment is clean and nice as described. Levy is very kind and friendly and has welcomed us in person with a tour of neighborhood and tips! I definitively recommend this place!

Levy was a very welcoming host : he did not just hand the key and wish us a good stay instead he sat with us and gave us a lot of tips of how to enjoy our stay in Rio. After that he even showed us around in the neighborhood. The apartment is quite nice : a super Italian shower and closets with hangers to store our clothes. The only drawbacks were : the neighbor's AC (that was on litterally 24/7) was a bit noisy and the kitchen + living room part was quite dark even in the middle of the day. The location was perfect : we recommend!!
Espectacular!!!!

Boa tarde,fomos muito bem recebidos,estadia tranquila,com tudo que precisava por perto,bem pertinho da praia ,tudo muito limpo,todas as dicas foram válidas,só mesmo o tempo nublado não cooperou muito pra aproveitarmos mais a cidade,voltaremos ainda,obrigada !
Excelente ubicación, alojamiento, atención y soluciones rápidas por parte del locador. Muy recomendable!

El departamento de Levy es exactamente lo que se puede ver en las fotos: cómodo, bien iluminado, excelente ubicación y todo funciona a la perfección.

Pero además del excelente departamento de Levy, no se puede dejar de resaltar su increíble hospitalidad como anfitrión. Nos ayudó en todo momento desde nuestra llegada hasta nuestra partida. Desde sugerencias sobre qué hacer y dónde ir en Rio hasta darnos una mano con el transporte al aeropuerto.

En conclusion: totalmente recomendable y sin duda volveré a alojarme en alguno de los departamentos de Levy cuando vuelva a Río.

Levy es muy atento. Nos esperó exactamente a la hora para el check-in y check-out. Nos explicó como llegar a los puntos turísticos mas importantes, como manejarnos en colectivo y metro. Nos dió sugerencias para realizar compras, ya sea en ferias, supermercados, etc.
El departamento es exactamente como lo muestra. No hemos tenido inconveniente alguno, todo funcionó perfectamente. Está muy bien ubicado, a 2 cuadras de la playa, a media de la plaza Osorio (donde pasan colectivos, hay una estación de metro y también una parada de taxis, además se hacen ferias).

100% recomendable para una pareja o familia pequeña.

Gracias por todo Levy!
Ótima localização, espaço super completo e organizado. Perto de tudo! Anfitrião extremamente atencioso.

Excelente departamento. Ubicado estratégicamente a la vuelta de la estación de metro y a media cuadra de las paradas de buses, cuestión que hace mucho más fácil manejarse en la ciudad. La playa está sólo a dos cuadras en la hermosa zona de Ipanema. Hay dos supermercados grandes, uno en cada esquina, bien completos y con horario de atención extendido. A media cuadra corre una avenida donde hay muchos lugares para comer y es una zona donde hay movimiento por la noche. El departamento por dentro es cómodo y completo. Levy como anfitrión es Excelente, en todo momento nos asistió y nos dio consejos y sugerencias. Absolutamente recomendable el alojamiento.
Excelente muy lindo el departamento y muy atento y amable el trato de levy, ojalá podamos volver !!!

Departamento cómodo, con todo los necesario para pasar unas buenas vacaciones. La ubicación es excelente, cerca de playa, restaurants, zonas comerciales y transporte hacia cualquier parte de Río. Excelente anfitrión.  Levy estuvo siempre atento a todo, respondiendo rápidamente a cualquier consulta con toda amabilidad. Hospedaje absolutamente recomendable, y con seguridad volveré.

Levy foi muito atencioso conosco em todos os momentos, além de responder prontamente às nossas solicitações.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, correspondendo exatamente às fotos que estão no site.
Recomendo!!!!
Muy lindo departamento, la cocina es muy pequeña pero bien equipada. Es tal cual las fotos, y se encuentra muy bien ubicado. Levy siempre atento y muy predispuesto a guiarnos por Río de Janeiro.

Gostamos da estadia. O ap é funcional , bem localizado, região agradável, perto de supermercado, restaurantes, metro, lojas, praia. O ap estava bem limpo, com cozinha bem equipada, sem barulho. Bom chuveiro, boa cama, boa internet. Anfitrião bem atencioso. Voltarei com certeza. Obg Levy.

El departamento es tal cual como se ve en las fotos. Está en una ubicación excelente, cerca de la playa, la laguna y muchos bares. Además tiene un supermercado en una esquina, el hortifrutti la otra y a una cuadra del subte que comunica con todoas los sectores de la ciudad. Levy es muy hospitalario, y predispuesto a asesorar en todo tipo de consultas turísticas. La cocina está muy bien equipada y algo importante para mi la ducha, es abundante y caliente.
Departamento muy bien conectado con todos los lugares de interés, la seguridad es muy buena, el portero Valdenir siempre servicial. Levy muy atento en todo momento.

Levy's condo is in the perfect location for a Rio getaway, as it's a very quick walk to the beach, restaurants, grocery stores, Metro, and just about anything else you need. Levy was very friendly with helpful local tips and recommendations.

Levy was an outstanding host. Although simple, his place is well organized, clan, and located in the heart of Ipanema neighborhood.
I had a great experience during my stay.
I look forward to staying at Levy's place in the future.

Apto com excelente localização em Ipanema! Super recomendo para turistas e para moradores do Rj até passar um final de semana pela zona sul e curtir praias e bares com tranquilidade. Levy é ótimo e fará de tudo para sua estada ser ótima também! :)

Levy was an amazing host. He made a special effort to suggest the best places to go and gave very thorough tips that were very helpful throughout our stay. The apartment is exactly as advertised in the photos. Comfortable place in a good location less than 10 minutes from the beach on foot. Would definitely stay here again next time!

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, cerca de la playa , restoranes y una zona de fácil acceso a trasporte público y metro.
El departamento cuenta con todo.
Levi es un excelente anfitrión muy preocupado de sus huéspedes , nos dio muchos consejos y datos de lugares para comer y salir.
Completamente recomendable
O apartamento de Levy é muito agradável. Espaço ideal para um casal. Localização muito boa em Ipanema, próxima de tudo. Recomendamos!

Appartement tout à fait conforme à la description. très bien placé près des commerces et des transports. le plus de cet appartement est l accueil exceptionnel de Mr Lévy. Il nous a donné  une carte de Rio et nous a expliqué ce qu il y avait à voir et comment le voir, comment se déplacer dans Rio.
Nous nous sommes sentis pris en charge et bien conseillés pour profiter de notre séjour.
Nous recommandons vivement cette place autant pour le lieu que pour l hôte d une gentillesse rare.
Gilles et Mab
Levy é gente boa demais e o apartamento é ótimo também. Muito limpo e localização perfeita.
Apartamento muito bem localizado e funcional.

Anfitrión, atento a todas las consultas y necesidades, en todo momento. 
    Departamento cuidado y limpio. La habitación es grande y cómoda. Mucho espacio para guardar ropa. El aire acondicionado funciona correctamente. 
El wi fi funciona bien. La cocina es pequeña, muy poco espacio para cocinar, pero con todo lo necesario. Sin horno.  Lavadero muy pequeño también, pero completo. Dos baños, el más grande, completo y amplio. LCD en habitación y comedor, funciona correctamente el servicio de cable. 
Es un dpto interno, por lo tanto, con poca iluminación en el comedor.
La ubicación del dpto es perfecta. 
El subte a media cuadra, al igual que el supermercado. A la noche no es muy seguro salir. Conviene pedir uber en la puerta del edificio. La entrada al edificio es segura. 
Recomendable, volvería.

name: STUDIO FOR RENT 0+1 (1)
summary: amaizing flat and very comfortable place Close to all services You will find everything you need market / mitro
description: amaizing flat and very comfortable place Close to all services You will find everything you need market / mitro

name: Piso muy grande con 6 habitaciones en el centro
summary: SOLO ALQUILERES MENSUALES. Piso muy grande de 6 habitaciones, 2 baños, balcón y terraza privada. Ideal para grupos de amigos o familias numerosas. Se encuentra en un lugar privilegiado, al lado del palau de la música catalana, en el corazón de la ciudad de Barcelona. Al lado del metro, de la catedral y de lugares turísticos.

Se encuentra en un lugar privilegiado, al lado del palau de la música catalana, en el corazón de la ciudad de Barcelona. Al lado del metro, de la catedral y de lugares turísticos.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

name: Sucá Apartments - in the heart of Porto (Apt3)
summary: Located in the heart of the city, in the historical center. Best location of Oporto. Sucá Apartments is a family owned business in a recently renovated typical Oporto building. Our apartments are in the old Jewish neighborhood, and we decided to call them Sucá as it traditionally means a home away from home. And that’s what we offer, 4 carefully decorated apartments, fully equipped with quality materials. We loved to decorate our apartments for you to feel at home.
space: The apartment for 2 people, is a beautiful studio with large areas,  with generous living areas where you can have a wonderful time. With 1 rooms and 1 complete bathroom, we provide high quality Portuguese linen and amenities. The entire apartment is equipped with central heating. The Kitchen is fully equipped and has beautiful Portuguese China.
description: Located in the heart of the city, in the historical center. Best location of Oporto. Sucá Apartments is a family owned business in a recently renovated typical Oporto building. Our apartments are in the old Jewish neighborhood, and we decided to call them Sucá as it traditionally means a home away from home. And that’s what we offer, 4 carefully decorated apartments, fully equipped with quality materials. We loved to decorate our apartments for you to feel at home. The apartment for 2 people, is a beautiful studio with large areas,  with generous living areas where you can have a wonderful time. With 1 rooms and 1 complete bathroom, we provide high quality Portuguese linen and amenities. The entire apartment is equipped with central heating. The Kitchen is fully equipped and has beautiful Portuguese China. We will welcome you in your check in and are fully available to provide you with all necessary information regarding the apartment as well as of Oporto. We were born and raised in th
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of the city: i) 1 minute walking to Rua das Flores (one of the main streets with fancy restaurants and cafés) ii) 3 minutes walking to Torre dos Clerigos; iii) 4 minutes to Livraria Lello; iv) 5 minutes walking to Avenida dos Aliados (main square of the city); v) 5 minutes walking to Estação de São Bento (city train station); vi) 10 minutes walking to Sé do Porto (City’s Cathedral); vii) 10 minutes walking to Ribeira do Porto (area near the river with typical houses).
transit: If you want to park your car, it is easy as you can find a public park in Clérigos, 5 minutes from the apartments.  The subway in located in Estação de São Bento, 5 minutes away.  You can find all the buses connections in Avenida dos Aliados, 5 minutes from the apartment. The airport is 40 minutes away by subway (Estação de São Bento) but we can help you to arrange a transfer if you prefer.
interaction: We will welcome you in your check in and are fully available to provide you with all necessary information regarding the apartment as well as of Oporto. We were born and raised in this special city and want to make sure you have the experience of a lifetime.

host.host_about: My name is Cristina, I was born and raised in Oporto. My main activity is being a Lawyer, but am also managing the Sucá apartments, a family business made with lots of love!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The apartment was completely new, very clean and stylish and had everything we need incl. a washing machine. Location was perfect, right in the center of Porto. Cristina was very friendly, answered immerdiately to our texts and gave us a lot of helpful recommendations. Highly recommended to anyone!

name: Kai 商务现代风小窝Y08~~~~~
summary: 欢迎来到我们的家-悦居铜锣湾站,我们的公寓位于铜锣湾中心区,超值新裝,新家具,地理位置好,交通便利,铜锣湾地铁站步行仅2分钟,附近有SOGO和时代广场等大型购物中心,购物方便,非常适合商务差旅及长租! 1分钟到SOGO 3分钟到宜家家居,皇室堡 3分钟到维多利亚公园 3分钟到Hysan Place 4分钟到时代广场 5分钟到中央图书馆

host.host_about:
Dear guests,

Being a traveler for past few years, I was a fans of home-stay style. Very glad to share with you my properties in Hong Kong!

I am doing short term rental online and offline. Sometimes, the calendar is not very accurate because of too many sources for bookings. Just tell me what you want, we will  have many options for you!

My teams are doing great for check-in arrangement. No worry if you don't know well about Hong Kong!

Thanks

Hi,大家好我是Visnon. 

我们喜欢旅行,爱住当地的老房子,逛当地的市场,喜欢色彩浓郁的国度,探索奇葩的民风! 

我们改造了一些老房子,并加入了有趣的想法｡ 
在分享前我们都会试住几天,确保一切安好,并在细节上做更人性化的调整｡ 

因为是老房子,它有温度又有些局限,希望能体谅它｡Visnon坚持选用五星酒店出身的专业管理团队来打理房间,使用星级酒店的床品,希望我的每个客人都能感受到放心和舒适｡ 

快来香港找我们玩吧! 
Visnon会在能力范围内Do my best for you! 
愿大家都有一个美好的假期回忆~ 

*请大家在预定的时候告诉我入住人数,大概的入住和退房时间,是来旅游还是本地居民,会不会有朋友来玩,是否带宝宝哦!

name: ★LAVANTA HOTEL★ SINGLE ROOM + BREAKFAST in TAKSIM
summary: Offering street views, this air-conditioned room features central heating, 22" LCD TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer, free toiletries and slippers. It also features a single size bunk bed. You will also find a sofa bed.
space: Our hotel Lavanta, Turkish for “Lavender,” is an oasis of calmness and tranquility amidst the bustling city-center of Istanbul. Like the flower itself, Lavanta blossoms with poise, serving as a haven of comfort in the buzzing and most desired district of Taksim, Beyoğlu. Lavanta’s cleanliness, modern simplicity and service-oriented personnel, will offer you a piece of mind and joy to return to, after a long day in the city.

neighborhood_overview: We are located in the hub of Istanbul’s most desired and visited district: Taksim. This is where Istanbul’s heart beats – we’re talking New York’s Times Square, Paris’ Mont-martre and London’s Oxford Street. Where else will you find a street like Taksim’s Istiklal – visited by nearly 3 million people each day. Staying at the Lavanta Hotel means being a part of it all. Located just steps away from Istiklal Street, you will be within walking-distance of everything – shops, cafés, restaurants, bazaars and landmarks – you name it. We will be more than happy to assist you in your choices, and hope to make your visit to Istanbul a memorable one.
notes: Breakfast hours: 08:00-10:30
transit: There is access to all major public transportation within 400m, the closest station being Taksim Square. There is also a taxi stand 100m from the property.
access: Guests will have access to their room, the lobby and the breakfast room during breakfast hours.
interaction: There is a 24/7 front desk.

host.host_about: Hi, my name is Madlen and I'm 28 years old. I was born and raised in Munich, Germany and later moved to New York for college. Later, when my family and I visited Istanbul for a short holiday, we realised the need for good quality but affordable holiday apartments. We offer several fully furnished holiday apartments in the heart of Istanbul.

name: Lovely en-suite bedroom in city center
summary: Our private apt in heart of the Raval, on the most creative street in the neighbourhood.  Surrounded by great cafes, bars, restaurants & boutique stores brimming with local designs. Just a 5 minute walk to Placa Catalunya, Las Ramblas and foodie heaven the Boqueria, you are perfectly located to discover all that Barcelona has to offer on foot.  Fully refurbished with all modern amenities including a prvate lift, you'll enjoy this slice of local life with all the comforts of home.
space: In the heart of Barcelona, in the district of Raval, close to many sightseeing points of the city at walking distance, our appartment can accommodate 2 people, it is fitted out to offer all the possible comfort. The decoration made by an artist will seduce you! Direct access to the accommodation by privative elevator. A completely renovated building. Possibility of arriving late at night without supplement.  A small balcony overhangs the pedestrian street.

neighborhood_overview: The district of Raval in Ciutat Vella has the spirit of a village with all the businesses and necessary restaurants to live there without needing to go out of it. Close to the main centers of interest of BCN (walking distance 10 minutes from Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas, Modern Art Museum, Boqueria). 5 minutes to 2 Subway stations (Universitat on ' red line-L1 ' and San Antoni on ' line purple-L2 '). Very cosmopolitan district by its mixing of cultures, alive but not noisy.
notes: If you arrive before the check-in time  (15h) or if you take a flight back far later than the check-out time, you can deposit your luggage to a locker in a little restaurant called  "Komo en Kasa" Calle Joaquim Costa 3 (Tel : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) It is at 400 mètres from the apart.  They will charge you €5 per bag and per day.  For the guests coming by car to Barcelona, here are the addresses of 2 closest public car parks to the apart :  Aparcaments GAR.VI s.a.  Tel : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Calle Casonova, 16 ou  Ronda Sant Antoni, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) rcelona
transit: From the airport you have the Aerobus ( 5.90€ / pers ) which takes you to the plaza Universitat then it is 5 minutes walk to arrive at the apartment. 2 subway stations (Universitat and San Antoni) are at 5 minutes walk from the apartment. The street is pedestrian and thus there is no possible car park in the street. Taxis can nevertheless drive through the street and drop you in front of the building via the Calle Joaquim Costa. It is necessary to go to Ronda San Antoni (in 300 m) to be able to park in the street if you have a vehicle. A taxi from the airport will cost you approximately 30€
access: 1 bedroom with a bed 140x200cm. 1 sofa bed for (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) cm) 1 washing& drying machine 1 micro-wave oven 1 fridge with deep-freezer compartment 1 stick vitreous ceramic & extractor fan 1 electric oven 1 coffee machine Dolce Gusto 1 Kettle 1 Toaster 1 Safe Internet wifi and  phone for local calls in Spain. 1 balcony Air/Conditioning TV LCD Hair Dryer Iron and ironing board Fan /Ventilator
interaction: We shall not be there to welcome you but we shall either get the keys handed over to you by our housekeeper at an extra charge or we shall explain you how to get them from a lock box. We shall give all the useful information for your stay in our apartment once we have received your booking.

name: Nice Cozy Room in BROOKLYN, NYC, NY, Bushwick
summary: A nice & cozy private room in a house with full bed for 2 to share w/ 2nd Bed avail. It's a 10 min. walk to 3 metro lines M/J/Z/L that go to Manhattan in under 30min. Easy to get to & from La Guardia via taxi & JFK via subway. Welcome to BROOKLYN!! I have 2 listings available so if this listing is unavailable try booking my other room in the same house.
space: The Room is part of a spacious House (not apartment) on the first floor, located in Brooklyn. A second bed is available upon request. The bathroom will be primarily yours. I have a half bathroom in the other room. Other guests will only go in the main bathroom to shower if anything. Use instant book if the dates are free on the calendar. There is no need to message me ahead of time unless you have a question about something in particular. If you need the room for only one night let me know. There is street parking available for free. There is street cleaning. M,T,,Th,F 8:00- 9:30 so park accordingly. You can always drop your bags off if you need to before check in at 3pm, just let me know ahead of time.

neighborhood_overview: Up and Coming Artsy Urban Neighborhood in Brooklyn. Close to local restaurants and bars. The train stops are a 10-12 minute walk. Once on the train it's less than 25 minutes to Manhattan. This is Brooklyn, not Manhattan. There will be some travel time to get to Manhattan, in my opinion, not too much. The neighborhood is safe, but can be a culture shock for some. It's not the upper west side or midtown, keep that in mind. I love my neighborhood!
notes: There is a chinchilla in the living room.  He stays in his cage and you will not be responsible for him.
transit: 3 Subway LINES J/Z/L/M lines just a short walk away and are 24 hours.  Laundry, Pizza, Supermarket and 24hr Deli available 1 Block Away. M Line Knickerbocker to Midtown 35 minutes  J Train to Lower East Side 25 minutes J Train to Brooklyn Bridge 35 minutes L Train or bus to Williamsburg 20 Minutes L Train to Union Square 35 Minutes B52 Bus 2 blocks away, B60 1 block away

interaction: If you need advice or help around the city, let me know.
