host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Living in Brooklyn, NY. Originally from Los Angeles. I love music and I DJ. I currently work in Manhattan. I am a movie fan. I am a big traveler and love Europe! I'm a very laid back person. I mainly use Airbnb when I travel and am constantly trying to become a better host by the help of others.

reviews.comments: Victor was very welcoming, showed me around and was happy to help with directions,  where to get good food and even had some snacks in my room.
Victor is very convinient. We loved Brooklin. Good price.

La casa queda a 10 min de la estación de tren mas cercana. Victor y su esposa son excelentes anfitriones. El barrio es seguro nunca nos paso nada y independiente de la hora. Ademas Victor estuvo pendiente de nosotros cuando nos íbamos para al aeropuerto a las 4 am!!!
Accueil vraiment top. Ils nous ont aider sur des trajet pendant notre séjour. La maison et clean. Les hôtes sont vraiment sympa.
Vic and his wife where very sweet. Vic showed us around the neighbourhood and they even let us use their bikes. All in all I would definetly recommend people to stay there.

Was a short night stay at the room, made the reservation late that day (around 2 pm). Quick reply by the host, and friendly.

We didn't have a chance to meet with the host, was out for work.

The room was very comfortable, with nice decor, huge collections of music, bonus point here. And the room, the house was clean and neat.

One thing to notice was the air con, a little bit too noisy when sleeping, but can be turned down or turned off so not a huge deal.

Parking is only street side parking, might be a little bit hard to find free spot, but manageable.

Overall 4.5 out of 5!
Victor met me at the door-always nice for a first-time guest.

We could not have asked for a better host for our first Air bnb experience!  Victor was a very gracious host...prompt in his responses, gave us directions, and even met us at the train station!  The space is exactly as described (all of the comforts of home).  Victor gave us a tour of the space (even offering snacks), a book with a bunch of things to do during our stay, and some take out menus for some great places nearby.  

We would definitely stay again!

Thank you Victor!

My fiancee and I had a great stay at Victors. We arrived late but he made sure to stick around to make sure we got into the apartment no problem. He gave us a quick tour of his apartment and offered us some snacks if we were hungry. The room was just as described and very comfortable, and he had the AC going so the room was nice when we arrived. The apartment was about a 8-10 minute walk from the J, M line and so was very convenient to get into the city.
Victor's hospitality was perfect to suit our needs. He allowed us to have as much space as we needed but was super helpful for anything we needed to about the city. Would recommend staying here :)

Victor was a fantastic host for my girlfriend and I's first Airbnb experience. He went above and beyond and took time away from his already planned scheduled haircut to meet us near the subway station by his house so he could walk with us through the neighborhood to his home. Additionally, he made flexible arrangements with us to have us check-in immediately when we arrived into New York (which was around noon and way before 3pm as Air bnb suggests). The neighborhood in the daytime is very uplifting and diverse with many markets in the area. The subway station is as Victor described about 10 minutes walking to each station nearby and 20 minute ride into the city. I would suggest walking with a buddy at night though as it does make you feel a bit uneasy when it gets dark to walk there alone, but Victor definitely was good about reassuring that nothing goes wrong even after hours.

Nous avons vu victor seulement à notre arrivée mais il nous a donné toutes les infos nécessaires et l'appart est fonctionnel, conforme au descriptif et assez proche des stations L, M et J (5 à 10 min à pied). Bon rapport qualité/prix.

Victor was a great and accommodating host. He was very kind and the check-in, check-out process went very smooth. 

would definitely stay here again if I come to New York again.

Victor was an awesome host and I had a fantastic stay at his place. Even though he was at work when I arrived, check-in was a breeze. Victor is super-friendly, and his apartment is cool and amazingly clean -- it looks even better in person than in the photos! It's also close to just about everything you could need. I know the area pretty well, and would definitely stay here again without hesitation.
Very clean, comfortable, cozy space.  So nice to have it on instant book, too. Victor was very warm and pleasant.

All was perfect. It is a very nice and clean room, with tv, air conditioner, big bathroom, i really felt very good there.
The place is near the metro so you can move easily to downtown. Also, Víctor is great, he wait for us in the exit of the subway and explained all about the neighborhood, the markets, foods, everything.
it was a really good experience.
Victor was an excellent host, very welcoming and always helpful. I felt very well there. The room is very nice and confortable as the house is. Plus, the neighborhood is great !

Victor wasn't there when me and my girlfriend arrived but he arranged for us to get the apartment keys. We were able to get into the apartment without any problem.

We didn't get the chance to meet with him since our schedules didn't match and we just went to the apartment to sleep. The room is nice and the bed is comfortable. The neighborhood isn't very fancy but we never felt unsafe.

It is near the metro which is really convenient. I would definetly go again to this apartment.

Victor was an amazing host. The flat was really clean and tidy. It was amazing value for the money we paid and he provided us with great suggestions of things to do both in the local area and in Manhattan. I would thoroughly recommend booking your stay here. Thanks Victor!!

Victor was very quick and responsive to all our questions. Even though he was not there when we arrived, getting to the house and into the room was a breeze, thanks to the clear instructions. The room was just as described and we spent a couple of good nights there, resting from all New York has to offer. The metro is about 10 minutes walking to different lines, so that was easy as well.
We had a great experience with Victor's place. He has prepared a second bed for us and he overall was very helpful. We would be glad to stay at his place again
Victor's apartment is spacious and clear. He let keys for us in lock box. Supermarket and Deli is in the street and Manhattan is 20-30 minutes by subway. Everything was OK. Thanks

Victor was a great host. He met us when we got to the apt. which was spacious, very clean and tidy. He was helpful and accommodating. He wasn't around much which wasn't a problem for us as neither were we, only using the room to sleep at night after exploring the city during the days and he was very responsive / communicative whenever we had questions. Place was close to multiple train lines making travel to the city fairly quick and convenient. We had a great first time Airbnb experience staying with victor. Definitely recommended.
a nice Brooklyn neighborhood, easy access to Manhattan, smooth checkin and key exchange, best suited for those who need a landing pad for nyc exploration.
Very nice experience ! Victor was Very nice And helpful ! I'll come back !
Very nice room and great host! Everything was ok, the appartment was clean, 3 subway lines at 5 minutes Walk! We'll definitly Come Back at Victor house :)
Good!
Victor was very polite and helpful, the room, bathroom and other areas of the space were very clean. He bed was very comfortable and the water was always hot!

Victor was an amazing Host for my first time using Airbnb. He was very nice and really friendly, he texted me the day to confirm my arrival and he cleaned up and prepped for my arrival. The room was a lot bigger than what I was expecting and very spacious for me and my friend that came as well.  The first Night victor gave us a tour of the surrounding neighborhood and gave us some tips about bars and restaurants that we would enjoy. Over all staying with victor was very pleasant and I would do it again if i'm back in Brooklyn!

Victor has been very welcoming during our stay and made us feel like home. We really enjoyed his lovely apartment as well as his kindness and availability.
The room and the apartment in its whole fit completely with the description. It is very well located so that it was easy to go to Manhattan and visit the city. The neighborhood is nice too.
In a word, Victor's room is the perfect place to spend a very good time while in NYC!

Victor ist ein sehr netter und bemühter Gastgeber!! die Kommunikation verlief reibungslos und fix. Das Zimmer war wie beschrieben, schlicht und ordentlich. 
Zur nächsten U-bahn mit kleinem Supermarkt ist man super schnell gelaufen. Alles in Allem ein gelungener Aufenthalt! Beste Grüße & Vielen Dank, Romy & Timo

Victor's house was a nice, spacious and clean place. He had to work when we arrived but left the keys in a lock box and we found a kind note when we entered the place. He really gave us the feeling that we should make ourselves at home. The room was big and there was a nice bathroom. Supermarket  is around the corner and train stations are a 10 minute walk (it will take around 25 minutes to get to times square). We had a great time and would defenitely recommend this place!!

This is so cozy and nice. but it is far from Manhattan little bit but it doesn't matter. I miss this room because it made me feel comfortable a lot. Also, it is such a clean house! Their bathroom, kitchen as well as bedroom are so clean so I like it.

Victor's house was nice and clean. The room is comfortable.  The bathroom has a very good shower. Victor is friendly and kind. He is usually at work during the night. Train stations are at 5/10 minutes walk and it takes 30 minutes to reach Times Square. I recommend this place!

I stayed a weekend at Victor's and it was just what I needed. Only a few blocks from the station. What's great about this station in particular is that you have Dunkin Donuts, Burger King, and others where you can grab and go. Victor's private room is as described, clean cozy and very spacious for two people.   It started snowing and getting back to the house was always pleasant, the heater is great! Hot water too. Victor wasn't there to receive us but he left us clear instructions about the keys, we got to meet him later that weekend. Very nice guy and house.

We had a really good time in Victor s home.
The room was clean and it was very easy to go in Manhattan. (10 min walk and 30 min with the train)
Victor was very nice and welcoming. He gave us a lot of tips to enjoy the city.
He s a really good host, we recommend his place.
とても綺麗好きなﾎｽﾄで素敵なお家でした｡駅からも近くﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝへのｱｸｾｽも便利です｡

I stayed at Victor´s house with my boyfriend for couple days. It was totally amazing ! Victor is so nice, willing and helpful ! We also met one evening with him and his friend and talk, they are such  nice people!
Regarding room, it looks much better than on the picture, very clean, big, tv and we could use kitchen too.
It is like 8 minutes from subway and to the center it takes cca 30 minutes, no problem with transport..everything is close.

I highly recommend !!
Thank you so much !
Chambre spacieuse à 5 minute à pied de plusieurs lignes de metro. Victor est un hôte très accueillant, si vous lui posez une question il n'hésitera pas à vous aider.
The host is very nice and friendly. The place looks just like the pictures. I had a really pleasant stay. Would recommend it to everybody that needs to stay in the Brooklyn area.
Victor was a great host! His place is walking distance to the subway and he was extremely hospitable to both myself and my friend. A high recommendation.

Amazing location, great host. 
Highly recommended for some authenticity:-)
Everything perfect! Thank you vic!
Victor was a very good host, he answered all the question I ask and made our stay as pleasant as possible. House was clean, room was spacious. I have nothing bad to say about Victor's place.
Victor is very nice and the house is super good! Everywhere is clean and comfortable. It's also located in a safe and convenient neighborhood. It's my best airbnb experience ever!

We stayed at Victor's place for over a week and it was awesome.
Victor wasn't home when we arrived but he made it very easy to access his place. 
The place is located less than 10 min to the subway, so it's easy to get to Manhattan.
The room was great, spacious and the bed super comfortable, especially after a long day in the city. 
Thanks Victor for everything (especially the pancakes ! ;) )
Will definitely stay there again if we happen to be in NY -

Victor made us feel at home and was very attentive to our needs throughout our stay. The listing was accurate and the neighborhood had the lively feel of bushwick but was also mostly residential, quiet at night, and safe to explore. We would definitely stay here again/recommend it.

This was my first time renting a room from someone that I didn't know.  I really didn't know what to expect and was a little afraid because I had my 9 year old son with me but I had a wonderful and safe experience. It really felt like I rented a house to myself! The room was clean and the bed was firm and comfy so I was extremely happy about that!!  Victor's schedule and mine clashed so I didn't have the opportunity to meet him (which I regret :(   )  but he made everything available to me in the house. Also, when I had a question he was always available through text. The neighborhood is good and felt really safe walking the streets after dark.  The train is about a 7 min walk and literally everything is available to you in that neighborhood. I am planning on coming back in the summer so I will definitely rent this room again if available. Thanks VICTOR!!!!

My mother and I stayed 1 week at Victor's place.
It was clean, the kitchen and fridge were free to use and the second bed available was convenient and comfy.
Close to several subway stations so it was easy to go to Manhattan and from/to JFK airport.
Wifi was quite slow.
Victor is a flexible host and he responded to all our questions very quickly.
All in all, we are very happy with our stay!

I really enjoyed my stay with Victor. The service was good and the place is cozy. It is only 8-minute walk to subway and the neighborhood is not too loud or noisy. I totally recommend this place for those who require privacy and peaceful sleep.

I am one of the lucky few that is able to meet him personally when I was there. As it turned out, he is a very chill and easygoing guy. Definitely will come back there again!
Victor was really nice and relaxed. It was a great place to come for a couple of days with a fantastic location if you want to travel to Manhattan. I will come again if I am ever around Brooklyn.
Nice apartment and great host
Victor was accomodating and helpful, and offered is everything we might need! The house and room were very tidy, and we certainly had fun looking at all the memorabilia! Thanks Victor :)
Victor was great! Very friendly. Very clean areas. Would stay here again in a heart beat.
Victor is a great host, the room felt very private  and it was easy to get to the Manhattan. Would  definitely recommend.

Victor and his place are great. The apartment is clean and comfy, and close to everything-- including food, shopping, and transportation.  And Victor is friendly and helpful with anything you might need. Highly recommended!

Victor is the perfect host. He is a really friendly guy, that helped us with everything we needed. His flat is clean and big and everything was perfectly arranged from the arrival on. He even told us the cheapest way from the Airport to his house.

We didn't have the pleasure to meet Victor, but his house was very nice, exactly as described in the ad. For us the neighborhood needed some getting used to, but it is safe and a welcomed change to overcrowded Manhattan. Public transport connection to Manhattan is also good. We enjoyed our stay at Victor's house and would recommend it.

Très bon rapport qualité prix. Bonne localisation. Hôte accueillant, arrangeant et de très bon conseil. Mise à disposition de beaucoup d'équipements. Baignoire un peu sale et le wifi peu fonctionnel dans la chambre. Merci Victor!!

Llegamos tarde y no hubo ningún problema, nos dejó la llave y entramos, la casa muy ordenada y limpia igual que la habitación, no coincidimos con Víctor.
Estuvimos muy a gusto, muy cerca de líneas d metro que te llevan a Manhattan directamente.

Nice room and cozy house. Public transport is 10 minutes away. 
We would stay here again. Thanks :-)

Although we didn't get a chance to meet Victor, everything went really well.  Place was in a great location, bedroom had all we needed, check-in was smooth and Victor was easy to communicate with.
Very well maintained place. Clean and cozy. Would love to come back here.

Feels like home as soon as you enter the apartment. Warm, cozy, clean-you name it. Got a chance to meet Victor. He's a really down-to-earth and easygoing guy-not to mention a great host! We had a few laughs of our own! 
We really enjoyed our stay here. Will definitely recommend this place to friends and family alike without thinking twice! Thank you so much VIctor!

Victor is a great host. Even though we did not have the pleasure of meeting him in person (due to conflicting schedules) he responded promptly to any messages we sent him and addressed any concerns we had. His place is warm and comfortable with a well-equipped kitchen; he even left some things in the fridge for us. The wifi, although slow, is a nice amenity to have on offer and accessing the house is easy. It is a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station from which you can travel to any part of the city. A really great place that made our trip very enjoyable.
Everything was perfect. I would recommed it everyone.

Victor is a GREAT host! He is very friendly, accommodating, and provides lots of extra perks and amenities! His place is a GREAT value of a deal! Every night I got great rest for the exception of the last night...there were some foot step noises and rain type sounds (eventhough it wasnt raining) the whole night...not quite sure where those were coming from....Anyway, asides from that every other night was peaceful, private and Victor went out of his way to allow me to check in early! Which I'm super thankful for! I would stay again and reccommend to friends!
Great place! And the communication with Victor was excellent

This is a great neighborhood with easy access to Manhattan and anywhere else in New York you want to go. Victor was helpful and made some great local recommendations within walking distance also. If driving, the free parking is a huge plus.
Victor's place is in a great location in Brooklyn. It was very clean and comfortable. No complaints. I would definitely recommend it to those looking to stay in Brooklyn!

I've been lucky enough to stay with Victor several times now. His apartment has everything you could need or want, and it's close to everything that Brooklyn has to offer. And, it's also near the subway if you need to get to Manhattan. If you haven't stayed here yet, what are you waiting for?
Another awesome stay!  I visit the area quite often, and Victor's place is always my first choice. It's so convenient to everything! I'm sure I'll be back soon.
For me it was a great combination of price and quality. A subway station was near and I could easily get into Manhattan every day.
His room is really cozy
Great spot!
Just had a other great stay at my home away from home. Victor's apartment is pretty much perfect for anyone wanting to check out Brooklyn or Manhattan.
Very warm welcome, nice place, well situated. Feels like home. I would definitely go back.
Victor was nice, easy to deal with, easy to reach, etc. His place was perfect for our needs.

Victor's apartment is great. Very comfortable, clean and in an interesting part of Brooklyn. It's off the tourist trail, which is what we were looking for. Some great places to eat nearby and the subway isn't far.

La casa está limpia, la habitación es grande para 2 personas. Tiene conexión con 3 metros a 10 minutos de la casa, barrio muy tranquilo. Víctor ha sido muy amable con nosotras, ha estado muy atento a cualquier consulta que le hemos hecho. Recomendable 100%. Si tuviera que volver a Brooklyn no dudaría en volver a alojarme en casa de Victor.
Victor's place was great, he was very helpful with anything we needed and the apartment was a great distance from the subway!  Thank you Victor!

Victor has a very nice apartment. Really close to transportation.
Nice and quite neighberhood with srveral markets and places to eat.

Very convenient, clean, and cozy with great communication at short notice.
100% satisfied with my quick last minute stay!

Highly reccomend this flat, nice location in an interesting neighborhood. Victor was a very good host, communications were clear, the flat is cozy, everything one would need. Would definitely stay there again if in the city.
Good place, decent area for the price. Great host, should be made clear that he stays in the apartment during the stay though. Kind of noisy at times during the night

Victor's place is awesome, clean, and comfortable. It's also convenient to everything... food, shopping, transportation, etc. Victor works most nights, but if you're lucky, you may even get to meet him during your visit. I wish his place wasn't always booked, because I would stay there even more.

It was my first time airbnb with my boyfriend so I didn't know what to expect but Victor made it welcoming for us. He greeted us at the door when he heard us come up and showed us to our room, the kitchen and bathroom. Victor's place was about 5-7 minute walk to the train, surrounded by local delis and restaurants. The neighbourhood was actually very quiet, we even had our window opened at night to let the breeze in. Overall it was a great stay! Definitely recommend to anyone considering staying at Victor's place.
The place is close to Manhattan and it is all you need for a perfect vacation.
The room is nice and clean. I would recommend it for a short stay, because the trip to Manhattan takes times, almost one hour
Víctor es un excelente anfitrión, ayuda mucho a ubicarse y a poder visitar lugares turísticos de Manhattan y alrededores, además la ubicación de su casa es muy accesible.

We had an amazing time in NY staying at Victors. In a great location close to the subway. Lots of privacy and very comfortable. Victor is an awesome guy who is very chill and welcoming. Would definitely stay here again!

The location is 10 min walk from the closest train station and is in a safe residential neighborhood in Brooklyn. Victor was not at the property in person but was always available via phone and helped us with self check in very efficient manner. The house and the room were ultra clean and seemed really cozy. I will defintely recommend friends to this place and will also surely come back.
Great location and awesome host. No wonder I keep coming back!  Highly recommended.
Quiet and clean Very satisfied

Victor is a great host, easy communication.
Room is spacious, and bathroom is always available.
Neighborhood is safe and it's really close to subway lines J and Z. Great value for money!!

We spent a few days in Victor's house and we didn't had any problem. The house is very clean, the room is very good. Victor is very helpful and gave fast answers to all our questions ! A very good place, I recommend it !
Apartment Victor is located near the metro station, very cozy, it has everything for comfortable staying. Victor is benevolent and friendly. I recommend!

Best value we could find and a perfectly good room with AC, comfortable bed, and clean bathroom. Bushwick is Bushwick but it's not too difficult to get into Manhattan or Williamsburg. We did not actually meet Victor (effectively had the place to ourselves) but he was very responsive to our questions. Thanks Victor!
Great location, comfortable and clean
Highly recommend the place which is very good communicate with Manhattan! Victor is very nice guy and very helpful all the time.

The place was really nice! There was an AC which was a blessing in the summer heat. It was also really close to supermarket/stores, which made it very convenient especially for traveling on a budget. There was both a bus and subway station nearby, which made it easy to travel around within Brooklyn as well as get to Manhattan. Also Victor was really awesome; a very helpful and communicative host. We really enjoyed our time there!

We stayed there a few nights and honestly, it was super great! Free parking right at the front door, kind neighbors, next to every thing someone might need. The house was super clean. We did not have the occasion to meet with the host, which was just fine with us, it felt like we were at home! Thanks a lot Victor for the place and all the tips! Muchas gracias

ictor's place was an amazing place to stay
It was very clean and he was always there to help in any way he could. It was super close to the subway station so making it to Manhattan in under an hour was no problem. I would definitely stay there again.

Victor's place was immaculately clean. He responds very quickly, and check in was easy. The air conditioning was great, and we watched Netflix on his huge TV. The kitchen was nice, filtered water, etc. close to the metro, which is a bonus for us for sure. We will stay there again, though the neighborhood made us a bit nervous, we felt safe!

Victor fue un anfitrión muy majo y acogedor. La habitación doble es perfecta para dos personas y cuenta con aire acondicionado para refrescarse por la noche. El cuarto de baño estaba limpio y la ducha funcionaba bien. El piso está cerca de dos lineas de metro que van directamente a Manhattan. La relación precio calidad es buena. Os recomiendo plenamente el piso de Victor.

Victor's place has become my home away from home... I stay here every time I visit Brooklyn, which is a lot!  This amazingly clean first-floor apartment has everything you need to be comfortable: a fully-stocked kitchen, a semi-private bathroom, internet access, and a large screen TV with Netflix and Amazon Prime. And bonus points for providing a full-length mirror, and an empty closet and dresser in the cozy bedroom! Not many hosts think to do that. 

The location can't be beat. There is a grocery store and laundromat nearby, plus there are bodegas and restaurants on almost every corner. The apartment is also a short walk to the J and M subway lines and not far from the L line, so you can be in Williamsburg or Manhattan in a matter of minutes.
Victors place is a great spot in bushwick! Great communication and his place is clean and cozy.

Estuvimos la pasada semana en el piso de Victor y fué genial, muy bien comunicado ,en metro, con Manhattan. No tuvimos ningún problema en encontrarlo.
No coincidimos con Victor, pero nos atendió muy amablemente por mensajes.
Si volvemos a NYC, que volveremos, no dudaremos en volvernos a alojar en su casa, lo recomendamos 100%
quite good to stay for 2days
Really good apartment tonstaynin NYC. You can reach all good spots with the metro/subway. Everything was clean and just like in the description! We enjoyed it
Victor is a great host, always available and helpfull! The place is clean, confortable and just like it shows in pictures. Near the subway and very easy to go to the city.

Es war eine sehr schöne Zeit bei Victor. Wir haben uns zwar nie gesehen aber per Mail standen wir bei Fragen in Kontakt. Zu Beginn gab es ein paar Probleme mit dem Wlan aber Victor konnte das beheben.
Die Unterkunft ist sauber und ruhig. Es gibt eine seht gute Anbindung  zur Sabway und auch einige Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Restaurants in der Nähe. 
Es hat und sehr gut gefallen. Vielen Dank Gaby und Marlon
Victor fue muy amable, estuvo muy atento en cada consulta que nos surgio. Recomendamos el lugar
Great place to stay and worth the price.
Nice stay, would totally recommend!
Great Brooklyn spot. Easy check in and great communication.
Victor's house is well located and in between 2 metro stations. You can move really easy to downtown, Central Park and all the main atractions of New York
Victor es un anfitrión muy amable y atento. Te brinda información útil y te hace sentir como en casa.
Victor's place is really nice. It is close to subway station. Very quiet area.

One of the better Airbnb’s I’ve stayed at in NYC.  Victor is an excellent host and it feels like you have the place to yourself.  

The place itself is spacious and very homey.  I want to go back!
You definitely want to stay with victor, he has great wifi, hot water, and is extremely friendly and quick to reply!

Very close to the subway station and travel to most places was very convenient including the initial journey from JFK. The space is clean and comfortable and nothing was unexpected. We only got to meet Victor on the last day but he was so nice and friendly! Highly recommend.

Victor has an awesome set up in this cozy Brooklyn neighborhood. He was hospitable and helpful for us newcomer tourists. And a good location that is close to a lot of awesome spots to hit up in the city. Loved this place.
good place
One of the best Airbnb experiences ever!

Sehr empfehlenswerte Unterkunft in Brooklyn! 

Wir hatten eine wundervolle Woche bei Victor. Die Wohnung ist gemütlich und sauber und toll ausgestattet - es ist alles vorhanden, was man benötigt. Besonders hilfreich war das "Guestbook" mit vielen praktischen und wertvollen Tipps für einen New York-Aufenthalt, das Victor für seine Gäste erstellt hat. 

Die Lage von Victors Haus ist super: die U-Bahn ist nur wenige Fußminuten entfernt; Manhattan und der Flughafen JFK sind direkt und relativ schnell zu erreichen. Es gibt viele Supermärkte, Restaurants und Geschäfte in unmittelbarer Nähe. Die Gegend ist sehr sauber und sicher - wir haben uns die ganze Zeit und auch nachts sehr wohl gefühlt.  

Check-In und Check-Out waren absolut problemlos und Victor hat auch hier alles getan, um unseren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu machen. Die Kommunikation war ebenfalls super - unsere wenigen Fragen wurden sehr schnell beantwortet. 

Alles in allem ein absoluter Tipp für New York bei einem wirklich supernetten Gastgeber - so macht AirBnB einfach Spaß. Wir kommen gerne wieder!

Tout s'est très bien passé chez Victor. Bonne communication, arrivée et départ simple, la chambre est comme décrite dans l'annonce. Du peu que nous avons vu Victor, il s'est montré très sympathique et tout a été très simple. Merci :D

La casa de Victor esta genial, tiene dos salidas de metro muy cerquita y tambien paradas de autobus, es una zona muy tranquila. No coincidimos mucho con Victor pero es una persona muy atenta, nos hemos sentido como en casa.

Bon emplacement, 10 min à pied de la station du métro J et Z.
13min pour métro L.
Au tour de la station métro L, y a  KFC, Burger King et McDonald’s ainsi que un pharmacie.
Le hôte est gentil, sympa.
La literie est pas parfaitement propre.
Sinon, tout va bien.
Another fantastic stay... thanks again for everything, Victor!

Muy buena ubicación, pocas calles de dos lineas del metro. Sin problema para ingresar al alojamiento. Lugar cómodo. Tiene todos los servicios. Detalles que ayudan al viaje, mapa, sugerencias, uso de la cocina.

With Victor’s kind heart, you will never be afraid of New York’s worse car parking situation. And he definitely is good at impossible tasks for parking. 
Feel free to contact me if u have chance in China.

Vic and Gabby are super nice and super casual.
The room is as pictured, the bathroom is a little darker.  The room furnishings are for sale, so the room may change.
I really appreciated the large closet with hangers and the empty table to organize my stay.  There was an electrical outlet strip in the room so that I could recharge everything in one place at night.
There is just one window in the room that does open and is protected by bars, but there was a fan and an air conditioner to help with the airflow.  I didn’t try them out but was glad they were there.
Upon request, Vic provided additional towels to the one left in the room.
The neighborhood is as Vic described, the bodegas are available but I found them quite dingy.  The walk is quite straightforward from the subway. People I passed while walking to and from seemed friendly. No one bothered me at all. 
The room is a good value for the price and for NYC.  Vic and Gabby are wonderful.
The house is located in walkable distance from subway station.
한적하고좋아요.

Victors home is neat, clean and in a great neighborhood. Check in was very simple and he was attentive and responded very quickly to all messages. Would definitely choose this place again if I were in the area!

Victor is a very prompt and cool host to have for this trip. Very clear and fast communication between us. He was more than helpful with his knowledge about NYC and the Bushwick neighborhood. And more importantly he was very welcoming. He even allowed me to drop off my bags 2 hours before check-in! 

The place was great and the pictures tell no lies. Clean and homey. Amenities were readily available and there was solid and fast internet. The neighborhood was pretty awesome too with plenty of local shops to buy food and other supplies if needed. 

Thanks again for an amazing NYC experience Victor and I hope to travel back again in the future!

I enjoyed my stay at Victor’s. His apartment is near the metro and is very convenient to get to JFK airport and Manhattan. I didn't get to meet Victor but he is very quick to reply to messages. You’ll be sharing the apartment with other air bnb guests and a very cute chinchilla!
Great location, easy check-in, and an overall nice place.
Very nice place.  I will recommend to everyone.
Excelente opción si quieres quedarte en Brooklyn. Victor tiene todo preparado pasa tu llegada y también responde a tus dudas de manera rápida. Estaba todo limpio y ordenado.
Everything was as I expected it to be, nice place and clean.

This apartment located in Bushwick is quiet, clean, and simple. Labels indicate where to find kitchen items, extra sheets, and bathroom essentials. The room we rented (#2) was a little smaller than we expected, but it served us well. I will say this is not a lavish stay, it is very utilitarian and easy to use. As well, there was a chinchilla in the living room which at first was a little surprising, but is very cute. Transit to other parts of the city was straightforward, but sometimes could take 30 minutes or so. Plan accordingly. Overall, a positive experience.
Nice room in Brooklyn. a the check-in was uncomplicated. Even though we've never met Victor personally he always texted back immediately. Takes about 25 minutes to Manhattan.

Victor is a great landlord, very enthusiastic and patient to introduce to us. There are 2 squirrels in the living room, very cute! The location of the house is also good, with 3 subway lines going straight to Manhattan, very convenient.

Victor was a good host and he answered very quickly to my questions. I didn’t get the chance to see him but he was very easy to rely on and gave me clear instructions to come into his house. It was also pretty easy to park around his place and the subway station is about 10 minutes walk from there. Considering the low price and Victor’s great hospitality, it’s a perfect place to stay if your planning to visit NYC!

You cannot beat the price, location, or hospitality! The neighborhood is great and right next to public transportation. It was a great spot that allowed us to feel much less like tourists. This was our first time in an AirBnB, so we had some questions about how we were supposed to utilize the space; his notes around the house felt a little impersonal and didn’t answer all of those questions for us. After we met him though, we felt much better and definitely welcome! All in all, we had a great experience at Victor’s place and would do it again in a heartbeat.

A neat bedroom and a spacious common room and kitchen, which has everything you need. Charming and quiet chinchilla in the living room. Thanks to the hospitable Victor for the convenience of the keys and the thoughtfulness of all the little things, we felt at home and rested.

El apartamento de Víctor es de lo mejor en relación calidad-precio que se puede encontrar en Nueva York. El apartamento está en Brooklyn a 10 min de la parada de metro con una tienda justo a la entrada del Subway en la que se puede comprar cafe, bocatas y desayunos por un buen precio. La zona no es nada peligrosa y está a unos 45 min de Manhattan. La habitación es amplia y privada. No hemos tenido ningún inconveniente con el baño compartido por lo que fue genial. Víctor es un anfitrión muy amable, atento y que te ayuda en todo lo que necesites. Gracias por todo!

7 días inolvidables que hemos pasado en New York. Recomiendo la casa de Víctor. muy acogedora, cerca de la estación del metro, con todas las comodidades y más de las que te podrías esperar. Gracias Víctor.
Great location, cozy space and a very helpful host!

Victor is a really good host!!!!! Me and my friend arrived at midnight and Victor helped us with the key and lock box stuff!!! We were so moved! And the room is clean! The pet is so cute!!!!!! And there’s fridge and kitchen which is really like home!
Merece la pena. Muy buena atencion y el sitio perfecto

Nice room! The apartment was really nice and cozy. The neighborhood is safe and you can walk within 10 minutes to 3 different subway stations. The subway gets you into the city within 25-30 minutes. If you want to save money and still want to have a great place to stay that's the airbnb to go to.
Victor’s place is a must-stay! Very easy to get/from major attractions and is super quiet and comfortable for a very affordable price
Victor's place is a really good place to choose. Clean, organized, near subway, easy communication with him and easy to find the house.
We had a lovely stay at Victor’s. He was very kind to organize us staying an extra night when we requested it. We spent another night in the other room and it was quite comfortable.
Nice and cosy apartment
Very convenient location (just a 10-minute walk from Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs), cute neighborhood, very quiet space. Absolutely recommended!

Our stay at Victor’s was lovely! He was available everytime we needed and helped with every question we had. His hospitality made us feel at home! The place is really great and close to a lot of subway stops and nice places to eat. Definitely would recommend and stay again!
Super rapport qualité-prix. La maison comporte 2 chambres vous ne serez donc sûrement pas seuls.

The room is basic but perfect for this price. Great location near Subway into Manhattan. The locker system to get the key works fine. Victor and his very cute chinchilla Sir Charles were perfect hosts! We had a great time in NYC.
Удобное расположение, недалеко от метро. Чистые комнаты, ванна и кухня. Много полезной информации для проведения досуга и перемещения по Нью Йорку.
Very comfortable and nice apartment in Brooklyn.

name: Spacious apt with 360-degree view in HK Island
summary: Our place is right in the heart of Hong Kong Island, 5 mins walk to both Sheung Wan and Sai Ying Pun MTR, 1 min walk to all the nice local restaurants, and 1 min to the famous Hollywood street. The place comes with a nice balcony and you will get an astounding view of Hong Kong.
space: We are pretty flexible with check-in/check-out time, and will try my best to accommodate your needs.
description: Our place is right in the heart of Hong Kong Island, 5 mins walk to both Sheung Wan and Sai Ying Pun MTR, 1 min walk to all the nice local restaurants, and 1 min to the famous Hollywood street. The place comes with a nice balcony and you will get an astounding view of Hong Kong. We are pretty flexible with check-in/check-out time, and will try my best to accommodate your needs. We actually live in this place, given we travel frequently, we decide to Airbnb out the apartment when we are out of the town, hence you will find all our personal belongings in there. You will not get the bedroom, however the apartment is very spacious (for HK standard anyway) with a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room that sleeps up to two people. We trust our guests not to be overly curious, and would really appreciate if you could treat this place as if you are staying at a friend's. If you are ok with that, please feel free to contact us for more info. Shueng Wan is famous for its ancient temple, t
neighborhood_overview: Shueng Wan is famous for its ancient temple, traditional Chinese dried food and markets. It is a lively suburb combining the new and old HK.
transit: It is easily accessible both by walking, MTR or tram (Ding Ding) to all the tourist atrractions in Hong Kong.
access: We actually live in this place, given we travel frequently, we decide to Airbnb out the apartment when we are out of the town, hence you will find all our personal belongings in there. You will not get the bedroom, however the apartment is very spacious (for HK standard anyway) with a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room that sleeps up to two people. We trust our guests not to be overly curious, and would really appreciate if you could treat this place as if you are staying at a friend's. If you are ok with that, please feel free to contact us for more info.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house - We live in here and only airbnb out the place when we travel, hence you'll find all our personal belongings here - would appreciate you treat everything in the apartment the way you would prefer your guests to treat your own place. If you have a profile photo and provide a brief note introducing yourself and let me know the reasons brought you to HK, it will make us feel more comfortable approving your request. :)

host.host_about: Taiwanese-kiwi who spent most of my life in Sydney, relocated to Hong Kong two years ago for work and have enjoyed every moment of it. I like to travel, however, am not a big fan of Airbnb as I often find the quality of listing inconsistent. I thought it would be fun to host and to bring a better experience for my guests.

summary: Habitación doble, amplia y con ventana exterior.  Recién reformado y decorado con encanto. Cama de 135cm y sofá cama de 120cm, para una persona extra. Vivo en una de las habitaciones, tengo mi propio baño. Me veréis en ocasiones por la casa, pero no constantemente.  En el apartamento hay otra habitación de alquiler para máximo 2 huéspedes, por lo que solo tendréis que compartir el baño con ellos. Estaré disponible para lo que necesitéis. Tengo servicio de limpieza y está todo muy limpio
space: Piso recién reformado, con decoración vintage/nórdica, gran sofá, comedor, wifi, smartTV... en el corazón de Barcelona, en el Barrio Sant Antoni. El piso está estratégicamente ubicado: a 10 minutos de Plaza Universidad, 15 de Plaza Cataluña. A 10 minutos andando al Raval o a Paralel. A 10 minutos andando de Plaza España.

El piso está estratégicamente ubicado: a 10 minutos de Plaza Universidad, 15 de Plaza Cataluña. A 10 minutos andando al Raval o a Paralel. A 10 minutos andando de Plaza España. Tendréis habitación doble, y compartiréis el baño solo con 2 huéspedes, si la otra habitación está alquilada. Yo tengo baño propio en mi habitación. Los espacios a compartir son salón,
neighborhood_overview: EN EL BARRIO Zona muy céntrica con muchos Bares, Restaurantes. Recomiendo sobre todo la calle Parlament, que está muy de moda para desayunar, tomar algo o cenar unas tapas. Podéis encontrar todo tipo de restaurantes muy cerca de casa, para todos los gustos y presupuestos: tailandesa, española, persa, italiana, pizza al taglio, cafeterías, librerías/cafeterias, mexicano, tapas… Justo debajo de casa hay un supermercado que abre de lunes a domingo hasta las 23h. También hay una farmacia que cierra a las 23h todos los días. QUÉ VISITAR: Cerca se encuentran los principales puntos turísticos como las Ramblas, el museo MACBA, el Raval, el mercado de la Boquería, las fuentes mágicas de Montjuic, la playa... Hay muchos bares y tiendas en los alrededores. Las estaciones de metro más cercanas son Rocafort (L1 - roja), Urgel (L1 - roja), Sant Antoni (L2 - lila) y Poble Sec (L3 - verde). Y un bus directo al aeropuerto que pasa debajo de casa, el Aerobús. A la playa hay un paseo andando de 30 minuto
notes: CHECK IN Y CHECK OUT: - El check-in es muy flexible, hay que informar SIEMPRE con anterioridad de vuestra hora de llegada. Si queréis entrar tarde, a partir de las 22h, no hay problema, siempre que se consulte primero. Si queréis entrar antes de las 16h, avisadme y haré todo lo posible por conseguirlo. Si no se puede, siempre podéis venir a dejar vuestras maletas en mi piso. - Si se quiere hacer un late Check out (salir más tarde) hay que avisar con anterioridad, y dependerá de la disponibilidad. Tal vez se puedan dejar las maletas y venir más tarde a por ellas, pero siempre hay que preguntar primero, si no el check out es como muy tarde a la 13h. NORMAS - Si se ensucian mucho las sabanas o toallas, se descontarán 15€ por cada sabana y 5€ por cada toalla. Si dejas las toallas negras o muy manchadas de maquillaje... se te aplicará este coste extra a través de Airbnb. - Cuida todo como si fuera tuyo.  - Apagar SIEMPRE el Aire Acondicionado y luces al salir. - Cuidado con el ruido en las
transit: TRANSPORTE: Se puede ir andando a gran parte de las atracciones interesantes de la ciudad. Metro y Bus a unos metros. El aerobús para ir al aeropuerto para a 30 metros de casa. La parada de metro más cercana es Rocafort (L1 - roja), Urgel (L1 - roja), Sant Antoni (L2 - lila) y Poble Sec (L3 - verde). Aunque también hay multitud de autobuses cerca como el H-16 etc. Lo más cómodo es usar la aplicación G.Maps, que funciona muy bien para manejarse en la ciudad.
access: Tendréis habitación doble, y compartiréis el baño solo con 2 huéspedes, si la otra habitación está alquilada. Yo tengo baño propio en mi habitación. Los espacios a compartir son salón, comedor y cocina Siempre con respeto, sin molestar a los demás. Se pide silencio a partir de las 22h. Las puertas no son de muy buena calidad y si no se tiene respeto, se puede molestar a los demás, por eso pedimos atención en este sentido. Estoy disponible para lo que necesitéis, información de la ciudad, etc.
interaction: Yo vivo en una habitación, a la entrada de la casa y estoy disponible para cualquier recomendación que necesitéis. Donde ir a comer bien, donde tenéis supermercado, farmacia y tiendas cerca, etc.
house_rules: - Respeta el descanso de los demás, a partir de las 10pm no hagas ruido excesivo.  - Deja las zonas comunes como las has encontrado, limpias y ordenadas. Guarda tus cosas en tu habitación. - Puedes cocinar, pero deberás limpiar la cocina después. - No pongas el aire acondicionado demasiado frío ni la calefacción demasiado alta

host.host_about: Trabajo como guía turístico en diferentes lugares del mundo. Me encanta conocer  gente de diferentes países y poder interactuar con ellos, compartir experiencias. Las puertas de mi casa están abiertas para ti, ¡bienvenido/a!

name: A warm clean cozy room 乾淨有愛 @Temple Street 廟街 單人床
summary: 油麻地地鐵站步行2分鐘 2 mins walk from Yau Ma Tei  MTR Station *** 您將入住一個溫馨､整潔的房間｡ This is a clean cozy room. 一個有靠枕的飄窗, A bay window with cushion. 一張溫暖親切的床, A genial bed. 明亮的書桌和舒適的椅子, A bright desk and a comfortable chair. 音樂､書本､香薰,一應俱全｡ Music, books and aroma. *** 您的房東也是室友, Your host is also your roommate, 或許在一些方面比你多了解香港一點點, who might know more about Hong Kong than you, 會盡量提供您所需的幫助｡ will try her best to provide any help you need. *** 希望這是您來香港感受到的第一縷溫暖｡ I hope it's the first sunshine you get in Hong Kong.
space: 客廳亦是茶室, The living room is also a tea room. 屋主三不五時會砌上一泡茶, The host makes Chinese tea sometimes, 可免費或付費品上一杯｡ so that you can know more about the culture. 西湖龍井的甘冽, Longjing from Hangzhou, 台灣烏龍的清甜, Wulong from Taiwan, 武夷岩茶的醇香, Rock tea from Mount Wuyi, 版納普洱的豐富口感, Puer from Xishuangbanna. 裊裊不絕,餘香繞梁｡  Please try, and you will not forget the taste. *** 早餐､午餐､晚餐均有償提供, Breakfast, lunch and dinner are offered  at a reasonable price, 您可提前一天預訂第二日的用餐｡ please let me know your preference in advance. 中式､西式､日式,任君挑選｡ Different styles for your selection. 亦歡迎大廚饕客,前來切磋品鑒｡ Chef and gourmet are warmly welcomed.

Yau Ma Tei Police Station (Grade III historic buildings in Hong Kong) 2. Tin Hau Temple (Grade II historic buildings in Hong Kong) 3. Temple Street (Famous night market) 4. Please ask me for more details

reviews.comments: 很干净,装修格调小清新 可爱小物

一次非常舒适的体验!

住宿环境:
1. 整体环境干净整洁且空气清新｡
2. 卧室稍微偏小,但功能齐全,很温暖｡
3. 地理位置在尖沙咀交通便利且安全｡靠近庙街,非常适合去逛夜市和摄影｡
 
房东是一位非常友善且乐于助人的小姐姐,非常感激这几日的照顾｡由于第一天人身地不熟犯下了未知的错误,感到非常抱歉,但也能得到小姐姐的谅解,十分感激!

建议:加强门禁管理说明,建议在租客须知里加入一条,带朋友出入宿舍楼需提前说明事项及意图,确保双方可知且安全｡

A very comfortable experience!

Accommodation environment:
1. The overall environment is clean and tidy with fresh air.
2. The bedroom is a littlt bit small but functional and warm.
3. The hotel is in Tsim Sha Tsui, whose transportation is convenient and safe. It is closed to the Temple Street, perfect for night markets and photography.

The landlord is a very friendly and helpful cute girl, I really appreciate your care these days. I am very sorry for the mistake I made on the first day, but I got the understanding from the landlord. Thanks very much!

Suggestion:
Strengthen the management of entrance guard. 
It is suggested to add the notice that the tenants need to explain the matters and intentions in advance if they want to take their friends to the dormitory for the safety of both parties.
下楼就是地铁站,房子很温馨,小姐姐和男朋友特别nice,推荐给大家!
地理位置很好,油麻地的地铁站到哪里都很方便｡房东非常好,主动提供了很多帮助｡房间很整洁,面积不大但布置很用心｡厨卫设施也很齐全,住得非常舒适安心｡这次住了3晚,以后有机会来还会选这里~
感谢濼合小仙女的招待~房子太满意了~很有格调很棒~房东精通茶道,还招待我喝茶非常适合一个人来旅行~~真的非常棒,相聊甚欢!差点误了飞机~五星推荐~

summary: O objectivo é proporcionar uma experiência única e personalizada, por forma a que os hóspedes desfrutem da sua estadia com total conforto, mas com respeito pela história singular e genuína de um edifício burguês que remonta ao século XVIII.

Os hóspedes têm acesso à escadaria central e às duas saídas existentes. Estamos sempre disponíveis por telemóvel, (Hidden by Airbnb) , e-mail para qualquer eventualidade ou informação. O B28 Apartments está no coração do Porto na zona histórica, miolo da antiga Muralha Fernandina ! Estamos perto de tudo, temos uma entrada pelas Escadas da Vitória e outra pela Rua de Belomonte, estamos junto ao Largo São Domingos, Rua das Flores, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja de São Francisco, Mercado Ferreira Borges, Ponte D. neighborhood_overview: O B28 Apartments está no coração do Porto na zona histórica, miolo da antiga Muralha Fernandina ! Estamos perto de tudo, temos uma entrada pelas Escadas da Vitória e outra pela Rua de Belomonte, estamos junto ao Largo São Domingos, Rua das Flores, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja de São Francisco, Mercado Ferreira Borges, Ponte D. Luís, Igreja do Clérigos, Cadeia da Relação, Mosteiro São Bento da Vitória, Miradouro de São Bento da Vitória mesmo em cima do nosso prédio, entre outros.
notes: O pequeno-almoço é confecionado pelos hóspedes com os produtos essencialmente orgânicos selecionados por nós. Deixamos café, chá, compotas, manteiga, iogurtes, queijo, pão artesanal e fruta sazonal. Tudo escolhido com muito carinho ! Temos limpeza diária excepto domingos e feriados. Existe possibilidade de lavandaria mediante custo adicional e disponibilidade.
transit: Para quem vem de avião tem duas hipóteses, metro ou carro ( táxi/Uber). Não é necessário alugar carro para andar no Porto (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Vindo de metro a estação mais próxima é São Bento, depois é descer a Rua das Flores e virar à direita no Largo de São Domingos ( ter atenção que o Largo de São Domingos só termina nas Escadas da Vitória), a Rua de Belomonte é logo depois das Escadas. Nós estamos no nr.28 ( porta grande verde, temos uma placa junto ao intercomunicador com o nosso logotipo) mesmo ao lado da Escovaria de Belomonte. É muito fácil de encontrar é preciso estar atento aos nrs das portas porque o (Hidden by Airbnb) normal indica mais acima. Vindo de carro, existem vários parques nas proximidades. Parque do Tribunal, Parque dos Clérigos, Parque das Cardosas, Parque Mercado Ferreira Borges ou Parque da Alfândega do Porto ( talvez o mais barato). Podem sempre tentar no Largo das Taipas ou na Rua da Vitória que não se paga pelo que nem sempre é muito fácil de arranja

neighborhood_overview: Barrio moderno y tranquilo a 2 minutos a pie de la Universitat Pompeu Fabra, a 8 minutos de la playa y justo en frente del parque de la Ciutadella donde podrás disfrutar de un buen paseo o hacer deporte. Se trata de un barrio residencial de clase acomodada en una importante zona universitaria. Al ser un barrio limitado por el mar, dispone de equipamientos náuticos (puerto deportivo y escuela de vela). Muy bien comunicado con transporte público con varias estaciones de metro (Marina, Arc de Triomf, Bogatell, Ciutadella Vila Olímpica...) y numerosas paradas de bus que te llevarán a cualquier parte de Barcelona en pocos minutos.  ---- Quiet and modern neighborhood 2 minutes walking from the Universitat Pompeu Fabra, 8 minutes walking from the beach and right in front of the Ciutadella park where you can enjoy a good walk or practice sports. This is a residential neighbourhood in an important university area. It is an area limited by the sea, and that's why it has nautical facilities (mari
transit: Muy bien comunicado por las estaciones de Metro de Marina (L1 Roja), Arc del Triomf (L1 Roja), Bogatell (L4 Amarilla) y Ciutadella Vila Olímpica (L4 Amarilla), la estación de Tranvía (Wellington) y numerosas paradas de bus en las calles (Passeig Pujades (el H16 te lleva a Plaza Catalunya que es el centro de Barcelona), Sardenya y Marina). ------ Very well connected by the Metro stations of Marina (L1 Red), Arc de Triomf (L1 Red), Bogatell (L4 Yellow) and Ciutadella Vila Olímpica (L4 Yellow), Tram station (Wellington) and numerous bus stops in the streets (Passeig Pujades, Sardenya and Marina).
access: Nuestro apartamento consta de varias zonas comunes, como la cocina, los baños, el balcón y el salón comedor. Los inquilinos tienen libre acceso a todas ellas, disponiendo además de espacios privados de almacenaje en la nevera y en los armarios de la cocina. ------- Our apartment consists of several common areas, such as the kitchen, the bathrooms, the balcony and the dining room. The tenants have free access to all of them, also having private storage spaces in the refrigerator and in the kitchen cupboards.
house_rules: - Los inquilinos deberán cuidar los bienes de la vivienda, respetar a los compañeros de piso, a los empleados y trabajadores de la empresa gestora y a los vecinos. Queda estrictamente prohibido el consumo, el uso o la mera tenencia de drogas o sustancias ilegales en la vivienda o la finca en la que esta se ubica. name: The Getaway Van - DEEP SEA
summary: We are a campervan rental service located in the North of Portugal. With our vans, travelers explore at their own pace, with the freedom of having no ties and the assurance of a great service. Our mission is to provide the adventure of a lifetime! We´re based in Porto, which is well served with flights (many of them low cost) from major European destinations. It offers a great starting point to explore the country, and specially the North. You can also travel through Europe (unlimited miles).
space: This is a practical and economical solution for your adventure holidays. It allows you to travel independently, with privacy and without pre-defined travelling packs. Whether you want to visit the countryside, the mountains, the city or the beach, it´s your choice. Our campervans are Ford Transits with economical Diesel engines and, in paid highways, they will pay smaller fees than a regular auto-caravan. The same vehicle that works as a way of transportation can be easily transformed into accommodation, depending on your needs. They are truly mobile houses!  They come equipped with two queen size beds that can be used by up to 4 people to rest by night and to travel without restrictions by day.

The same vehicle that works as a way of transportation can be easily transformed into accommo
neighborhood_overview: Experience the feeling of living in a house on wheels and visit Portugal from top to bottom. Stop wherever you want to, whenever you want, make your meals and sleep when and where you feel like. The choice is always yours! You can have your breakfast by the sea, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have dinner outside with a view over the city, and fall asleep under the starry sky. The choice is yours! You can be in contact with nature, in the company of friends, family and your pets. It is simple and uncomplicated. You don’t have to book hotels, there are no arrival schedules to limit you, no prepaid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use. Start your journey and discover and enjoy the unique adventure that is Portugal!
notes: Extras: 4G Wi-fi router - FREE GPS - FREE Awning - FREE Outdoor table + 2 chairs - FREE Extra outdoor chair (5€/rental) Chemical toilet (10€/rental) Barbecue (20€/rental) Power inverter (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) €/rental) Bicycle rack for 2 (10€/rental) Extra bed linen and towels (15€/person) Extra pillow (5€/rental) Extra towel (5€/rental) Baby car seat - FREE Booster seat - FREE Camping tent (10€/rental) Sleeping bag (5€/rental) Mountain hiking kit (10€/rental) Sunshade + wind block - FREE Beach towel (5€/rental) Kids beach kit - FREE Beach racquets - FREE Small cooler - FREE Snow chains / straps (20€/rental) Bicycle (Under quota) Mini safe for keys (10€/rental) Wetsuite & shoes (Under quota) Surfboard (Under quota) Bodyboard kit (Under quota) SUP kit (Under quota)
transit: Portugal's roads and sights make a fantastic destination for road trips. And to make it even more awesome, we've developed the Getaway Cards, which give you have access to a network of partners that offer you discounts. Surf Card Great for surf roadtrips that favor contact with water sports! Now surfing or paddle surfing has never been easier! No need to transport the heavy boards, wetsuits and other accessories! For those who want to take surf or paddle classes this is also the ideal solution. By choosing this card you will have access to a list of surf schools and surf paddle schools around the country where you will be able to enjoy unique discounts on rentals and services. Checkout our list of partners at (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Camping Card Stopping at a campsite is also an option for the getaway campervans. For that rested night and with access to many amenities, this card offers numerous discounts on camping parks. To use the Getaway Camping Card you only need to submit it i

Only valid in Portugal - GPS - Alert button for Assistance Basic equipment: - 2 Double beds (sleep up to 4 people – L190 x W113 and L190 x W20) - Living / dining area with inside table (L100 x W90 x H177) - Kitchen area (dishwasher, drinking water faucet, gas stove and thermal box / fridge) - Indoor and outdoor LED lighting - Multiple 12V and 220V power outlets (if connected to mains) - Solar panel - 75-80 liter drinking water tank - Outdoor Shower - Hot water (sink and shower) - A/C - Independent central heating (for when campervan is off) - Luggage storage (also for surfboards) - Skylight with fan - Blackout Blinds - Thermal insulation panels for front and side windows - MP3 cable and USB charger - Digital sa
interaction: Guests are always welcome to have coffee and cake at our cozy headquarters, before departure and upon arrival from their adventures.
house_rules: Insurance: The leased vehicle is covered by the compulsory insurance of civil liability of fifty million euros, under Portuguese law and insurance that covers own damage. There are 3 security deposit options: Option A - I'm a gambler A deposit of 1500€ is needed and you won´t have to pay any other daily rate.   Option B - Trust your instinct You may reduce the security deposit to 1000€ by paying 10€/day. Option C - Play it safe You may reduce the security deposit to 800€ by paying 15€/day. All the 3 options cover: Windshield Cover Additional Driver Passenger Cover Driving Outside Portugal Unlimited Kilometres Drivers under the age of 25 years old are required to pay an extra fee of 3.00€ / per day Pick-ups & Deliveries Our vans can be collected and delivered directly on our Porto facilities (Leça do Balio) or anywhere in the country. If this location is in Porto area (airport, bus or train station, or an accommodation address), delivery is free. For other places, there is an additional

host.host_about:
I've been a camper from the age of 6! I used to go camping with my parents on a scooter. Every summer, me and my family used to go travelling through Europe on a caravan. Recently I upgraded to a campervan as it is a more sustainable option and is easier to drive and park. I love the freedom it provides for a touring holiday or escaping into Nature and my mission is to share this experience with fellow travellers. 

Our campervans provide freedom on wheels. So guests can travel with no restrictions and no ties. With no need to book hotels, no arrival schedules to limit you, no pre-paid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use to explore or relax.

You can get closer to Nature. Fall asleep under the starry sky, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have breakfast by the sea. The perfect companion for outdoor activities surrounded by Nature. Pick up your gear and go explore!

We are locals with a passion for travel and gastronomy keen on giving advice and proud of their travel library! We can suggest travel itineraries. We are specially keen on the North of Portugal region as its varied landscapes, heritage and people make it a fabulous destination that all travellers love!

Looking forward to providing you with the adventure of a lifetime!

Graça Ferreira
Manager

reviews.comments: Jaime y su esposa fueron muy amables con nosotros, y todo fue como acordamos, sin ningún tipo de problemas. El condominio está muy bien ubicado, en una zona muy linda, cuenta con seguridad y servicios y es muy completo. El departamento está en excelente estado y es muy cómodo. Es recomendable.

Se existe uma pessoa que representa o sentido da palavra "Anfitrião" certamente essa pessoa é o Jaime perdigão! Nossa estadia foi ótima, a recepção perfeita (com direito a tour pelo condomínio e tudo mais), enfim, uma experiência gratificante quando cruzamos com pessoas bacanas em nossa vida. O apto é muito bem cuidado com tudo o que vc precisa para se sentir em casa. Indico, recomendo e vou voltar! Obrigado Jaime! até a próxima!

Fui muito bem recebido pela esposa do Jaime, que se mostrou muito acolhedora e como era a minha primeira vez no rio ela me ajudou bastante respondeu um monte de coisa! Sobre o apartamento é igual ao descritivo, não tivemos nenhum problema e tudo foi melhor do esperávamos. A localização é ótima, e o condomínio tem lazer e uma lanchonete que oferece café da manhã, almoço e janta. No dia de ir embora conheci o Jaime, uma excelente pessoa que me tratou muito bem! Viajei com minha família para ver a etapa de surf, e a escolha do apartamento do Jaime fez essa viagem ainda melhor!

Jaime se preocupó de que tuviéramos una llegada al departamento muy agradable y nos aclaró dudas importantes para un buena estadía. El departamento es acogedor, muy tranquilo y coincide con lo señalado en el aviso. Increíble ubicación y muy bien equipado. El sector de Barra de Tijuca es muy agradable y bonito. Totalmente recomendable.

Barra; un encanto! El departamento completo, como la descripción, con pileta, muy importante cuando hace tanto calor, utensilios para cocinar! Fresco, hermoso balcón y muy amable Jaime y su señora. Volvería.
Jaime foi muito atencioso e nos deixou muito a vontade, inclusive deixou algumas bebidas na geladeira. A descrição corresponde exatamente ao apartamento.
Anfitrião acolhedor, apartamento tal qual descrito no anuncio. Muito bem localizado. Gostamos muito da estadia
Jaime me ha atendido de maravilla  en su depto totalmente amueblado y equipado para una estadia (Website hidden by Airbnb) ubicacion es barbara.muy recomendable
Tudo perfeito! Muito obrigada! Até a próxima!
Todo excelente!

El departamento es muy bonito, ubicado en un condominio frente a la playa lo que lo hace muy cómodo. En el edificio hay además piscina, bar, peluquería, sala de estar y gimnasio, aunque estuvo cerrado. En la planta baja hay un restaurante también. Está ubicado algo lejos del ruidoso centro que, en mi caso, era lo que buscaba. Eso no es un problema ya que enfrente tiene dos pequeños bares, farmacia, kiosco y en la otra cuadra, el excelente restaurante Picanha. A tres cuadras hay un supermercado que tiene todo lo necesario, y a seis otro mercado de frutas muy bueno. Los buses pasan por la esquina y el metro, a unas diez cuadras. Muy bien comunicado y zona muy linda y elegante. El departamento en sí es mejor que en fotos, cama cómoda y aire en el dormitorio y sala. Tiene una pequeña cocina con todo lo necesario para cocinar, y un bonito balcón donde se puede comer. El personal del condominio es muy amable y servicial, la seguridad además está siempre controlada. El anfitrión y su esposa son muy amables, muy buena comunicación y nos dejaron bebidas,café y productos de ducha muy útiles. También hay toallas y sábanas limpias a disposición. Muy buena estancia.

Hermoso lugar. Llegamos tarde por problemas aerolineas y nos dejaron refrigerios y alimentos para nuesra llegada. Lugar muy seguro. Limpio. Todo lo que uno necesita. Para 3 o 4 personas amplip depto con balcon. Utensilios para cocinar. El predio seguro y con hospitalidad. Sin dudas barra hermoso y seguro. Volveria.
Ótima localização na Barra, apartamento completo, de acordo com a sua descrição no site. Ideal para casal com até 2 filhos pequenos. Esperamos voltar em breve ;)
Anfitriones muy amables muy atentos, siempre estuvimos en comunicación, el apartamento impecable, limpio, con todo lo necesario. Muy conforme

Local extremamente bem localizado, muito limpo, bem conservado, o Jaime Perdigao é um excelente anfitrião, tudo que ele escreveu está dentro do combinado, nos deu ótimo suporte e pôde nos deixar chegar antes e sair depois do exigido, mostrando ótima flexibilidade! Retornaremos assim que pudermos. Valeu muito a pena.

summary: Gorgeous 4 bedroom condo. It is very spacious and was fully renovated in August 2018. It can welcome up to 10 persons. It is ideally located downtown, close to many shops, cafés, bars, restaurants, and steps from Papineau metro station, the most important station in Montreal.
space: The apartment is located in the heart of Montreal and is close to everything. It is huge and features 4 bedrooms. All the bedrooms are spacious, features double beds, blankets, pillows, sheets, dressers, desks, chairs. All the bedrooms have a window. The apartment is in a half basement.  The living room has a great HD TV with a few free channels and Netflix, perfect if you want to relax after a day outside. A crib can be provided for the stay if requested upon booking the apartment.

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is incredible. You will be close to everything : the Old Montreal which is the historic neighbourhood of the city, the Quartier des Spectacles where you can see all the festival during the summer, the Plateau which is Montreal trendiest area, the Botanical garden, the Mount-Royal Park, and many restaurants, bars and clubs.
notes: PARKING If you think you will use your car while in Montreal, you can still park it on the commercial streets during the following hours (max 3 hours each time, 3$ per hour): Monday to Friday 9am to 9pm  Saturday 9am to 6pm  Sunday 1pm to 6pm You can also find free street parking (not a lot though) in the residential streets (I will send you the info once the place is booked). CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT When there is someone before or after you :  Check-in is at 3pm and Check-out is at 11pm.  Please contact me if you want to have an early checkin, or late checkout (I can't guarantee it, except if I say it's okay).
transit: A few steps from the condo, you will find the Papineau metro station, which will make your rides way easier : you will be minutes from everything. There are also a lot of bus, but the metro or a walk should be enough.
access: You will have full access of the apartment, as no one will be there except you and your group.
interaction: I can be reached almost 24/7, via Airbnb.
house_rules: NO PARTIES ALLOWED - You are responsible of any disturbance coming from the unit during your stay.  - A 500$ fine per night for any party or disturbance reported by neighbours. - Please act as you are at your own place and do govern yourself accordingly. - If you use the kitchen please do not leave any dirty dishes or glasses when you leave. A dishwasher is provided. - There is no smoking in the apartment, you can smoke outside, If the smoke detector turns positive after your departure a smoking penalty will be charged of 150$ on your security deposit. - Late check out penalty Fee is 50$ (without notice). Please advise me if you want to enjoy late checkout. In the event where it's possible, there is no charge, otherwise please respect the 11:00am checkout since cleaning crew must prep the place for the next guests.

name: Share in NYC's trendy East Village
summary: Fully furnished, private bedroom in the East Village ideally situated near Union Square subway station. The East Village is the food mecca of the universe, with many restaurants, cafes and pubs scattered throughout. Just over a block from Trader Joe's and minutes from Whole Foods and the popular Union Square Farmers Market. Tourist destinations such as the Empire State Building, Times Square, Broadway, Central Park, the World Trade Center and Williamsburg (Brooklyn) all are easily accessible.
space: Fully furnished bedroom/office available in prewar building located on a quiet block off of 3rd Avenue in Manhattan’s famed East Village. The apartment is roughly 750 square feet and includes a bedroom/office (the main bedroom where guests sleep), a converted bedroom, living room, eat-in kitchen and bathroom. Note: This is a shared apartment listing. This is a converted two-bedroom apartment, which means there are two, separate, private sleeping areas. The main bedroom is the one that is available for guests. The second one is used by me. The apartment is a 5th-floor walk-up (no elevator) and the following is included with the fee: - High-speed Wifi throughout apartment  - Shared bathroom (includes bathtub and shower) - Fully equipped, clean kitchen (microwave, toaster, oven, coffee machine)  -Gas, electric, heat and hot water The larger, fully-furnished main bedroom includes: -A full-sized loft bed (that means it's elevated from the floor) -Large windows and a lot of sunlight (the roo

The East Village is the food mecca of the universe, with many restaurants, cafes and pubs scattered throughout. Just over a block from Trader Joe's and minutes from Whole Foods and the popular Union Square Farmers Market. Tourist destinations such as the Empire State Building, Times Square, Broadway, Central Park, the World Trade Center and Williamsburg (Brooklyn) all are easily accessible.
