neighborhood_overview: About the Neighborhood - East Village  There are many restaurants, shops, a playhouse, live music, and laundromats in the nearby vicinity. I believe that the East Village is the best neighborhood in New York City and I created a blog to provide guests with info on restaurants, pubs, local attractions, etc. There is so much to do in this neighborhood. I can't imagine living anywhere else. Once you book, I will send you a link to my neighborhood blog. Local Points of Interest: Union Square Park/Farmers Market (East 14th Street) East River Park (FDR) Little Tokyo (East 9th Street) Little India (East 6th Street) McSorley's Old Ale House (East 7th Street) Whole Foods Market (East 14th Street) Union Square Cafe (East 16th Street)
notes: 1. Make sure to bring a copy of a valid US driver’s license or your local passport when you check in so that you are able to confirm your identity. 2. You will be asked to complete a short form when you arrive that includes: your home address, identification and emergency contact information. 3. You understand that by booking through this service you will only stay for the duration for which you requested/paid. You agree that additional nights will not be granted unless they are booked separately and confirmed via Airbnb. 4. You are liable for any injuries that you may sustain due to your own personal negligence. 5. If you need to receive mail delivered to this address, you'll need to discuss it with me beforehand or it will not be accepted upon delivery.
transit: Transportation:  The apartment is easily accessible to the bus and subway. Just over a block from the "L" train (located on East 14th Street and 3rd Avenue) and a short walk to Union Square Park / Station where stops can be found for the 4, 5, 6, "L", "N", "R" and "Q" trains. Nearby Tourist Attractions: NYU/Washington Square Park -- 15 min walk Little Italy -- 25 min walk Chinatown -- 25 min walk SOHO -- 25 min walk Lower East Side -- 20 min walk Shake Shack/Madison Square Park -- 10 min via subway Empire State Building -- 15 min via subway Midtown -- 20 min via train World Trade Center -- 20 min via subway Financial District/Wall Street -- 15 min via subway Madison Square Garden -- 15 min via subway Central Park -- 20 min via subway Radio City Music Hall -- 20 min via subway Rockefeller Center -- 20 min via subway Statue of Liberty -- 30 min via subway Broadway Theatres -- 20 min via subway Times Square -- 20 min via subway Williamsburg (Brooklyn) -- 20 min via subway Century 21 -- 15
access: Guests basically have free run of the apartment, with the exception of my bedroom. Many of the items available for guests to use during their stay have been listed under "The Space." There are some limitations such as certain kitchen appliances (which may difficult to operate and/or clean). My house manual details the specifics.
interaction: About Me:  I am active, clean, considerate, enjoy sports, walking/hiking, movies, travel, craft beer, food and good conversations. I worked for a non-profit in the sustainable agriculture / environmental field for many years and am now a professional certified coach. I do enjoy meeting new people from around the world. The amount of interaction I have with guests varies. I am a live-in host so our paths will definitely cross every now and again. Many guests choose to do their own thing and there are others who I've gotten to know a little bit. We've gone out for drinks and/or dinner and I have given some of them a little tour of the neighborhood and surrounding area. I've traveled quite a bit myself, so I realize that many guests have busy touring schedules or business meetings that will keep them occupied and all visitors should feel comfortable doing their own thing. I do work from home quite often, so there will be times during a guest's stay when I may be here but won't be availabl
house_rules: 1. Please be respectful of the neighbors. 2. No smoking, illegal drugs or pets. 3. Do not engage in any illegal activity anywhere on the property. 4. Make absolutely sure to lock the apartment door as you come and go. 5. Make sure all windows in the room are closed (and/or locked) when you go out. 6. You are responsible for your own food and refreshments. 7. Please leave things as you found them and, most importantly, clean up after yourself. Discard any pick-up/delivery cartons (i.e. pizza boxes, Chinese food tins and boxes) quickly after eating to avoid attracting pests. 8. This is a shoes-free home. Please remove your shoes upon entering. 9. No parties, outside visitors or overnight guests without being approved by me in advance. 10. Turn off TV, lights, fan etc. before you leave the apartment. 11. Please use a door hook or towel rack to hang dirty and/or wet towels and clothes. Do not hang towels on anything made of wood (i.e. chairs, loft bed, posts) or use the Papasan chair as a

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I have been home-sharing for about 10 years now and have met many interesting people. I view visitors more as short-term roommates than I do as guests.

Home-sharing truly has been a blessing for me. It's helped me to pay the rent and still given me the flexibility to have the place all to my own when I'd like to do so. That's a huge benefit!

As a guest, I have used Airbnb to travel to Tokyo and spent a few weekends staying at a farmhouse outside New York City. We watched films on the side of a barnhouse. Very cool!

I am a relatively easy-going guy. I drink socially and do not smoke or use drugs. I definitely like to have fun, especially if it involves doing something new and it doesn't cost a ton of money. I love deals!

While I tend to be easy-going, I do have my pet-peeves. For example, a shoes-free home means just that. With that said, I ask that you please review the house "rules" before you book with me.

Either as a host or a guest, I'd be up for hanging out some time. I like to meet new people and explore the city together. If you'd like to hang out during your visit, then let me know in advance. My work schedule is pretty unpredictable and I often do work from home. I can get pretty busy, but if you give me some advance notice I'll make sure we have time to spend together. Otherwise, I generally assume that guests want independence.

If you prefer to do your own thing, then that's totally fine too. Don't worry I won't be offended. I can certainly appreciate that you may have a pretty full itinerary when you come to NYC.

I'm a former journalist, PR guy and worked for a non-profit in the sustainable agriculture / environmental field for many years. I started my own coaching/consulting business a few years ago and would be interested to find out more about what's going on in your life. Perhaps I can help you out in some way?

My guests have included a combination of tourists and business travelers. Whichever category you fall under, you're welcome to stay with me. I have an extra room and I'd be happy to provide you with an opportunity to step into the shoes of a New York City resident for a while. Who knows? Maybe you'll like the East Village so much that you'll want to find your own apartment and never want to leave.

I host singles and couples, but you should note that there is an added fee of $30 per night for all additional guests over one person.

The most common things I hear from guests are:

"The room is so much bigger than I thought based on the photos in your listing,"

"This is a really cool room/place!"

"I love the natural light that comes into this room!"

"It's such a comfy atmosphere in here that I really hate to leave!"

Guests really love the location! location! location!

On the flip side, I sometimes hear people remark that walking up five flights is "telling them that they need to get into better shape."

If nothing else, I hope that you'll find your visit with me to be enlightening (that's a joke because the bedroom is well-lit and I am a life coach ;)

Look forward to meeting you!

reviews.comments: Good place to stay and Chris is easy to get along with. I recommend

This was an excellent place with a most exceptional host. A great area with plenty to do. It's quiet and cozy. I had everything I needed for my first week in the city. Christopher was more than willing to help me with anything I might have needed. It was a pleasure staying with him! I highly reccomend it!

Had a great time staying with Chris. He's a great host, very helpful, very accomodating, and quite flexible.  His place was perfect, neat, clean, and very centrally located. I would stay with Chris again.

The place was very easy to find, just a few blocks from Union Square.  Incredibly convenient.  There are plenty of places to eat and shop right nearby.  I found the space to actually be a little larger than I imagined from the photos.  It's very neat and clean.

Chris was great.  We didn't really get to spend much time talking because I was on the move most of my time but he was there when I arrived and seemed like a great guy.

I would definitely recommend Chris' place to anyone else travelling solo.  I don't know if Chris makes it available to couples but the bed might be a little tight with two.
Chris was very flexible and a perfectly pleasant host.

the description of the apartment is clean and real,luminous ( The sun illuminates the room very well)   and easy access by metro. the bed is very comfortable. 
this is my first experience with AirB&B and I have good experience

I liked the location of the apartment,2 block of Union Square, the neighborhood is very alive, there are good restaurants, bars and shopping. 

Chris was very quiet and he take careof my needs and answer to all my questions. 
definitely I recommend Chris's apartment 
I spent very little time in the apartment, I spent my day outside visited the city :-))
it was perfekt for what i wanted: a friendly, clean, good located place in manhattan

Had a great - but short - stay in NYC.  Christopher’s apartment was the ideal location for my 24 hours in New York.  Dropped off my bag at 8 in the morning and didn’t return until 12 hours later.  Christopher directed me to a pizza place near his house (Patsy’s) and I had one of the best pizzas ever! His apartment is located in the East Village so you’re in the middle of things.  A short walk from Union Square and the subway (and Milk Bar just down the street for great desserts).  It was the ideal place to crash for the night.  Christopher was a great host and very accommodating, although we only spoke probably a total of 45 minutes.  A great way to experience NYC.
Chris is a kind and upbeat host. The room is spacious and well-furnished and the entire apartment is clean and maintained. Great place to stay, hassle free arrangement. Highly recommended.
I had a great stay at Christopher's place. He is a fantastic host. His place is clean and convenient.

Chris is very cool.  I had a surprise overnight in the city and he helped me in a pinch.  Moreover, a very chill, welcoming guy.  

Worth noting: Flyers fan!  -smile.

Chris is a very nice guy who made everything very easy and confortable during my stay. The house is great, clean and in a great location, and the room is very spacious and confortable. If I ever go back to NY, I would like to stay here again.

The place is just as expected...the room itself probably nicer than I expected. I had several changes of plans around when I was available to "check in" and Chris was really patient and understanding although I suspect he had plenty of other things to do - so if this place looks like what you are after, go for it. Thanks Chris!
It was a clean, well-lighted place in an awesome neighborhood, and Chris was very nice and helpful! Perfect for someone who sports eco-lifestyle as well!
Chris was very friendly and helpful.   He was very clear about all of the parameters of his apartment.   I found everything about my stay satisfactory in every way.
great location, spacious room with a nifty loft bed, and best of all - a gracious host! I definitely recommend staying here if the room is available

Chris was super friendly and easygoing. An airbnb pro he was organized, helpful and easy to communicate with. I only spent one night but it went as smooth as can be. The apartment itself is in one of the best areas of New York and the sunny and spacious room is like having your own little studio.

Chris responded quickly to any questions I had before and during my visit and was able to accomadate my slightly late arrival-and i could leave my bags for a slightly late departure.  He was welcoming and helpful. With the fan and the window the room was cool, whereas it was a very hot, humid day. The location is superb. It's a great neighborhood. The room was comfortable and practical.

I stayed here for 3 nights and I really liked it. The room is bigger than expected and you find everything you might need in the appartment (so I don't need that much cause I am more out in the city). Chris is a very nice guy and he tries to make a lot possible for guest to check in and out. Thanks for that. And he knows a really good cafe just around the corner to hang around and watching people sitting at the sidewalk.  Go for that. East Village is a nice area to stay during day and night with a lot of small shops, cafes, restaurants and bars.

Chris was being very helpful and answered all my questions (million of them). He pointed to me where I could go for sightseeing, meals, getting thretre tickets, etc. 

He was also very nice and allowing flexible check in and check out time (of course after agreeing from both sides). 

He was very organised and clean as well. He even made a handbook for the room!

I would recommend people to stay there if they travel to NYC.
Chris is a great guy. His place is very clean, comfortable, and welcoming. I'll look to him again on my next visit to NY.

Chris is the best host a traveller can ask for. He took me for a long walk right after I arrived, had beer and dinner with me. He was very helpful and willing to answer all my questions regarding NYC.
The appartment despite the small size was comfortable, perfectly clean and of the best location. 
I definitively recommend Chris and his appartment!

Staying at Chris´s place was a really wonderful experience, the apartment is sunny, cozy and absolutely neat. Chris is very friendly, he provides all kind of helpful information either for going out ( restaurants brochures, subway map) or to make your stay comfortable with a detailed manual of house rules and info on how everything works, which becomes very handy. He even helped arrange a shuttle to JFK airport using his own computer and phone, as mine wasn't working well. I definitely recommend Chris as a host, he is open to chat and very respectful about privacy.

Chris was a wonderful person to stay with. An accommodating host with a comfortable place in the perfect neighborhood. I couldn't have asked for better conversations with someone who knows a lot of the history of the location and the best places to go explore. 

I would definitely recommend him to anyone staying in NYC and if I go back, I wouldn't even bother trying to find a different place. 

Highly recommended!

I had a wonderful stay at Chris' place. He was so helpful and flexible despite my flight getting delayed and my very early wake up times. He even helped me carry my heavy suitcase, a real gentleman!
His flat was clean, nicely decorated and the room much bigger than I expected.
The only downside was that I stayed there during a very harsh heat wave and had trouble sleeping, but this didn't keep me from really enjoying my stay. I would undoubtedly stay there again.

Chris' place is great !!! Ideally situated to discover New York, with Union Sq. subway lines and its central position. Also the lively East village is a great neigborhood to stay. The room is comfortable and the host very nice and helpful if you need it.
Highly recommended !

Première expérience avec airbnb suite a des recommandation d'un ami. En fait j'ai ete agréablement surprise par le process de vérification au moment de la transaction. C'est en même temps rassurant et on s y sent accompagné. 
Le séjour très court (1 nuit) chez Christopher s est très bien passe. Le quartier est très sympa et animé. Au premier abord  l immeuble semble un peu glauque. Immense couloir bleu clair, tres (Website hidden by Airbnb) fait un peu coupe gorge. Mais arrivant a 17h je n etais pas trop inquiete. Apres avoir grimpe 4 etages avec ma valise je suis arrivee dans un apprtement petit mais tres sympa et Christopher m a tres bien accueillie. Il m a montre la chambre , la cuisine, la salle de bains  et les modalites de fonctionnement des differents appareils dont je serai potentiellement amenée à utiliser, qq conseils pour les Resto autour et le jogging du lendemain. La chambre est privee, le lit en mezzanine . Ce nest pas bruyant, prevoir des lunettes de nuit si vous etes sensibles a la lumiere du jour car aux US il est rare que les rideaux soient occultants et encore plus rare qu il y ait des volets !!!! Christopher dort ds le même appart  dans une autre pièce dans un espace délimite par des paravents, ce qui permet d aller à la cuisine et à la salle de bains sans se déranger mutuellement. Salle de bains étroite mais on est à NY !!!!!!! Christopher a même eu la gentillesse de m offrir une place de croisière sur la Hudson river dont il avait bénéficié lui même ! Sympa !  Je recommande vivement ce logement, surtout si vous êtes seul (e). A deux c'est jouable aussi. L appart de Christopher et le quartier tout autour font vite oublier l'entrée et le couloir un peu glauques de l entrée de l immeuble !!!
Chris was a fantastic host and I cannot recommend him highly enough. The room was spacious, comfortable and in a fantastic part of Manhattan. I would certainly stay here again without hesitation.

The apartment is very nice, convenient and very well located. Christopher gave me some good restaurant addresses. He was always free to discuss and to inform me. We shared some excellent dinners and our discussions were very interesting. Actually Christopher is more than a host: he is a roommate, which can be discrete, but available if you propose/ask something. I definitely recommend this place.

The reason I am not giving this stay a very high mark has to do with the Internet service. I had stayed at Chris's place for a month, and at the reservation time had one requirement - that the Internet service be reliable and fast. Chris confirmed it but the reality was different. I was getting constantly kicked off of the Internet (loosing the signal). This was after the Sandy storm so it is possible that things changed due to the storm. However it did not seem to me that Chris was doing much in spite of my complaints. He finally called the provider two weeks into my stay. Also the smaller room in which he sleeps is on the way to the room in which you will stay, so you will always have to go through his room in order to enter yours. I only realized that once I was there. Other aspects of my stay were fine.

I liked a lot staying at Chris's apartment. He's not only a great host but also a great person, very kind, polite and helpful. He keeps the apartment very neat and cozy, and with me everything worked properly. I thought the location is very good too, since it's a block away from a subway station, that I used to use everytime. Concluding, I thought it was a very good choice, and I recommend it. If I come back to New York City, I'm sure I'll look for Chris again.

Chris was a great host! The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. It is also located in a great area that was walking distance to good shopping and restaurants. The apartment is close to a train station as well, so it was very convenient.

Chris has a lovely place in a wonderful part of New York, the East Village.  It's also very close to Union Square which is a major hub.  The room is very spacious and comfy.
The whole apartment has a lovely, calm vibe to it, which is nice to come home to after a day out and about.  Chris himself is a great guy, very genuine and has an awesome life philosophy.  He is well set up to receive guests and has a good welcome book and guide.

Chris really was the perfect host.   He was always responsive, always helpful, always easy-going and attentive, but definitely let me have my privacy.  


The room was very clean and welcoming.  There's a desk and a TV and a bed and a table.

The room is very spacious with high ceilings.  The current photos really don't do it justice.  There *is* a bedroom door and it does close (it's hard to ascertain this from the photos) and it's very private.  It has a nice view of this East Village street and the neighborhood is awesome and central to everything, incredibly easy to get to.  

I stayed here for an entire week during a workshop and interviews for grad school and honestly, if I hadn't had this safe haven in the country's biggest city, I'm not sure how I would have otherwise fared.  But I had a great week.  

Ask Chris anything.  He answers promptly and thorougly.  And really is just a terrific person.  It can be a nerve-racking thing to hurl yourself across the country and book an apartment, but with Chris, you're in great hands.

Chris was a generous host and he was helpful as much as he can his apartment was so clean and comfortable and my room was very clean and i liked the decoration of the room  .the Internet was perfect  the also the neighborhood was amazing it was just 15 min by subway to time square and 5 min to union square...
Defiantly I will come back there nex time

Viva Chrisss ;)

Amin elshazly

Christopher was a great host. Very nice and helpful. He offered me a lot of help to get to know NYC.

The room was great, just as advertised (I don't think the pictures do it justice tough, it's larger than what appears in the photos).

Chris is a great guy and a good host.  The apartment is a fifth floor walk-up, which Chris will clarify with you before coming, but it's in the coolest hood in town and the room is huge and comfortable.

I definitely plan on staying with Chris again.

I stayed with Chris when I was visiting my daughter at NYU.  The location in East Village is only steps away from NYU as well as close to the MTA and the all amenities the East Village has to offer.  Chris is a very gracious host (even helped me lug a huge bag for daughter down 5 flights of stairs to the cab) and I felt like I was staying with a friend as opposed to renting a room.  WiFi worked perfectly and the guest room also has a large flat screen TV.  I'll stay with Chris the next time I visit my daughter at NYU.

Chris is a really great host! He was always easy-going, very accomodating, and quite flexible.  I stayed 7 days in his very well placed (close to Union square), clean and comfortable appartment, The space seems to be a little larger than I imagined from the photos. I would stay with Chris again for sure. I recommend staying here!!

I needed a place for couple of days on my way to NC wanted to stop in NYC for 3 days. Did not wanted to be on taxi for every place I wanted to go and wanted to be in walking distance from anything I needed such as bars, clubs, restaurants etc. Great location.

The apartment is very well placed. My host was friendly and helpful
which made my stay pleasant.
Chris' apartment was so convenient to Union Square and an excellent place to stay. Comfortable bed and private space and Chris is a great host and an excellent communicator.
Great location and very kind and helpful host. The bed was very comfortable as well.

Chris was a very welcoming host. His apartment was nice and clean, and the room I stayed in was well-furnished. It was my first time in NYC, and as a tourist, it was a convenient location because it's close by to the subway. Also, East Village is an awesome neighborhood with many places to eat/drink.

Chris was a great host and provided for all my needs, including subway directions. The room is very private and comfortable, although it was quite hot the days of my stay as there was only a small AC unit in another room and a small floor fan in the guest room.
My stay with Chris was awesome, his place is in a great location and I quickly learned how to get around the city from the apartment.
Chris is one of the nicest guys I have ever met! He is such an incredible host and his place is fantastic!

Chris is an outstanding host! The room is well kept plus it is bright and sunny during the day. The location could not be better with access to the subways just a block or two away. I would definitely recommend contacting Chris to book your stay in NY.
Great location, very clean and spacious room and surprisingly quite for NY. Chris is great host and was very accommodating.

Chris was an incredible host during all the time. He gave me very good advices, take the time to search answers at every questions you can have, and he's worried of your comfort.
For the apartment, he's has a perfect situation in the city, between Low Manhattan and Central park, with the Union Square metro, you can go in all directions and quickly reach the famous monuments of NYC. 
The bed is clean and comfortable, bedroom is big and enough, there are all informations in a ring binder (foods, clothes, monuments, transport). 
In short, I definitely recommand this apartment, you won't be disapointed.
Fantastic helpful host! Felt very welcomed! Perfect location! Thank you Chris!
Very good location, and Chirs is so nice, thank for your help, I'll be back soon~

I stayed with Chris for 4 nights on a holiday trip.
His appartment is very easy to reach and located right in the heart of Manhattan. The room was well furnished and everything needed was there, even a TV to come home to after a long day eploring the city! 
Chris is a very welcoming, helpful person and made my stay a pleasant experience, with lots of tips and hints on where to go.
I would like to stay at his place again another day.

The apartment is just like advertised, everything was clean and in order, the location is great, all what you want is available in the area, Subway, Laundary, Grocery ... etc.
Chris was amazing, I particularly appreciate the fully detailed information and tips he provided. we rarely saw each other, but he always offered help and advice about where to go and what to do.
definitely recommend Chris's place to other Airbnb users.
The location is great, the room is a nice size, and I slept well. Chris is really organized, friendly, and helpful. I enjoyed my visit, and hope to stay at his place again!
Chris is a fantastic host. He is very conscientious and will work to make sure your stay is comfortable. Plus, his space (while cozy) is charming and in a super location in the Village. Recommended.

Chris was great.  The room was large and airy.  Chris was so helpful with giving me directions from the airport and to get me started with the subway system to see New York.  The place was clean and in a great neighborhood. Thanks Chris!

Chris was super nice and informative. He made sure I felt at home right off the bat. The apartment was very clean and the room was bigger than expected. This apartment is also in a great neighborhood. I would definitely stay here again.

I had never stayed or even visited East Village...Talk about location!   Tons to do in the immediate area with a good selection of restaurants, bars, etc.  Chris' place is exactly as shown in pics.  The living space is quite small so I kept mainly to my room.  He is warm and welcoming and was flexible on my check-in as my flight ran a little late.  He's quick to answer via text and communicated quite clearly.  I absolutely loved the spacious room and how tidy the apt is.  He has a guidebook that was helpful, take a peak, it's worth it!  You won't care about the 5 flights of stairs once you settle in.  Chris, I'm so grateful for the true New York experience.  Thx again and I look forward to booking with you when I return to visit my son in the future!

It was my first airbnb experience and Chris was very accommodating and helpful. The location was perfect; close to everything and anything New York has to offer.  The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. I thoroughly enjoyed my 2 weeks over Winter and would definitely recommend it to anybody. Thanks Chris!
I have stayed here before and it is always a great place to crash. Chris is a pleasure to deal with and the apartment is clean with everything you need. Great value.

My stay at Chris's apartment suited me very well. Chris was available if needed, clear about expectations and did not infringe upon my space. The apartment was clean and the room was surprisingly quiet for the location. I would gladly stay here again and have no concerns about recommending it to anyone else.

My stay with Chris was very delightful and comfortable. The room is definitely bigger than in the photos! Chris was very accommodating and helped resolve a problem with my schedule. He definitely gave me a great first impression of New York! Thanks Chris! See you soon hopefully.
This is my usual spot when I stay in NY. Always clean and comfortable. Perfect location and a breeze to deal with.

The room is really excellent, and larger than expected from the pictures. It is very quiet, and located perfectly for exploring Manhattan, close to Union Square subway (lines going both east-west and north-south). I love the neighborhood in the East Village!

Chris is a very helpful person and an excellent host, and I've no problems recommending his room to other travellers. I'll come back to Chris appartment next time I visit New York.

Chris is a good host. He was there to deliver the key, and gave me short and clear guidance to the apartment and the neighborhood of NY. 
The location is excellent (<5 min walk to Union square). Lots of good coffee places in the street.
Easy going, very accommodating in a really nice location.  Highly recommended!
I really enjoyed staying there! Chris' place was spacious, welcoming, and clean. Confirmed our stay right away and made the whole process easy! Thanks Chris!
Chris was very accomodating for my situation. The place was very nicely decorated and clean!

My stay was comfortable. The place is clean and organize. Chris is friendly and professional.

The bathroom is a bit small but manageable.

Overall, good value for short stay in NY.
Listing was accurate and neighborhood was perfect.
Great host and cozy room! Everything was very smooth and simple, Chris is a very nice guy and my stay at his place was very pleasant. Recommended!

Excellent host, fair price for the accommodations. Overall it was good stay for my first AirBnB experience. The last time I was in NYC I stayed at Affinia Shelburne which cost me $200+ a night and I hardly stayed in my room so if you do the math it's not really a good bang for your buck. The room was cozy and I had enough space to relax after a day of walking around the city. There were minor caveats but they were not a deal breakers for me - but it might be for someone reviewing this. First the building is old and there's no elevator so if you have knee/physical problems walking up & down 5 flights of stairs several times a day could pose a problem. Second there's no central air conditioning, there's a fan in the room that kept me cool enough but if you're from a colder climate and like to sleep at a cold temperature this could be an issue for you. Chris was a very helpful host he answered all my concerns and gave good advice on subway traffic. I would recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the area.
It's a really nice to live in NYC! Chris is a nice guy who will answer all the questions! The room is bigger and better than the picture!

It was great! Chris was such a nice man and very accommodating. He helped me with my luggage up 5 flights of stairs and was so easy to get a hold of. He communicated a lot and the location was safe! His plan was clean and a lot of space!!!

Chris was a excellent host. Perfect location in the east village and the room was bigger then it seemed in the photos. Made my first Airbnb experience like I was right at home. Definitely recommend this booking
Chris is a very nice and friendly host,The house is in a good location near the Union Square,very clean and quite,I like the room! I will miss the period lived in there!

This was my first airbnb experience and it was great. Chris was very nice and hospitable. 
The location is great and the room is very comfortable. 
It is worth mentioning that the bathroom is quite small but it was not a big issue for me. 
I would happily stay with Chris again next time I'm in Manhattan.
This was my second time staying with Chris. Great location, clean, big room for NY, and most importantly he is a genuinely nice guy. Recommended!

Chris is a very easy going and helpful person. I arrived extremely late on a Wednesday and he was still very welcoming. Made my stay very comfortable. Chris was also very helpful with the questions I had and went out of the way to help me with directions. The room I stayed in was very spacious and well furnished. A great experience for my first trip to New York.

Casa accogliente e camera soddisfacente, forse il bagno un po' meno . Posizione ottima per visitare Manhattan, vicino a Union Square e linee della metropolitana. 
Chris è una persona molto disponibile, è stato un soggiorno tranquillo senza nessun problema, check-in e check-out perfetti.
Consiglio casa di Chris anche se l'appartamento è al 5° piano senza ascensore.

Chris was an excellent host. Very nice, hospitable and helpful with the questions. He helped me with my luggage up 5 floors. The room is very comfortable, clean and big for Nyc. The apartment is in super location in the east village. I love the neighborhood. I enjoyed my 4 weeks and definitely recommended it to anybody. Thanks Chris!!!

My host, at whose place I have already stayed, was helpful
and friendly. The place is very well located and reasonably comfortable. I thank Chris for his hospitality and wish him well.

Chris was a great host- he was very accomodating and great at communicating. His apartment was centrally located and the room was spacious and light-filled. We had a fantastic time in New York and we would happily stay here again.

Chris has been one of the warmest Airbnb hosts I have ever stayed with. Besides the apartment being located in probably one of the best neighborhoods in Manhattan (East Village), you get a really comfortable spacious room with a desk. Chris is also super responsive and makes sure you have a good time there. He has extensive instructions to help you have a smooth experience getting there as well as good informative tour guides for first time visitors. Would definitely love to come back and stay here again.

Chris' room was just as expected, providing an excellent stay.  The space was clean and Chris provided all the information necessary to make the best of my stay.  Chris is a fantastic host, he gave me great advice on the area and was very helpful with checkin and checkout.  The area of the East Village he is in is also nice, plenty of places to eat and walking distance to a lot of the sites.

Chris is a great host and very respectful of your privacy whilst in his home. The location of his apartment is fantastic on 13th Street - 14th St is a major street and contains a major subway station - lots of cafes/restaurants in the area. The down side for me was the heat, unfortunately I was there at the hottest time in summer and the apartment is very warm. Also I knew the apartment was on the 5th floor and even though Chris was fantastic and carried my heavy suitcase up/down, I'd probably look for an apartment on a lower floor next time.
Chris was an excellent host. I would recommend this place to anyone!

I had a great stay at Chris's apartment in East Village!  Location was excellent and very convenient - a few blocks from the Union Square train station and lots of grocery stores and food/restaurant options.  Chris was very friendly and responsive to messages - he let me check-in early because the room was ready and let me store my backpack at his place during the day of my departure (much appreciated).  The place was clean and looked like what the pictures indicated.  The guest room itself is pretty large - almost an apartment within an apartment!  The listing does indicate that there is no air conditioning, so just something to keep in mind for those who are traveling in the warm summer months.  There is a fan in the room and AC in the living room which helps cool the place down - both of those were very helpful.  Overall, I made an excellent choice staying here and would recommend it to others who want to stay in a cute, trendy neighborhood away from all the tourists.
Chris was so help and easy going. I would stay over there again. Union Center is a good location and close to everything.

Chris was an amazing host - very warm, welcoming and accessible. His place is in a great neighborhood and within walking distance from a LOT of things. The listing is accurate and a very comfortable living space. I loved that he was so approachable and happy to sit down for a chat regardless of the time of the day. One of my best experiences so far...I'd definitely come back!!
Good experience staying in Chris' place. Good location for transportations and also hang out.
Quarto espaçoso e localização perfeita. Fácil acesso a lojas e supermercados, além de estação de metrô.

Chris greeted us upon arrival and did a very thorough walk through of the apartment and review of how things worked, where things were, etc. We did our own thing for the days we were there, but Chris was always available, friendly, and helpful. Great location, classic NYC pre-war walk-up type building, very much enjoyed our stay.

Chris' place was perfect for our stay - it's close to the subway, restaurants, & shopping. He was a great host and had tips and helpful information on some great local places.  We'd certainly stay with him again!

Chris was very welcoming and accommodating. We were there during the work week and didn't see him much but the space was just as depicted. The East village was awesome! If you are visiting for the food scene this is the place to be! Overall a great experience.
We had a great stay. Thanks a lot Chris!

Chris made me feel right at home as soon as I came in the door! He is very professional and courteous, and as a solo woman traveler I felt very comfortable in his home. The place is exactly as described, clean, and organized. The location was fabulous, it is very close to the train station, Union Square, and there are many great local spots in East Village. My main reason for travel was to live like a local, with no set plan, and wander the neighborhood. I was able to see most of New York City's charm from this location and felt safe walking to his place at night. I would highly recommend Chris' place!

Chris was a wonderful host! He had everything prepared and labeled. If we had any questions he was quick to answer us. He was also extremely understanding and flexible with check in time! We were very fortunate to stay with him and recommend him!
Great location and great rooms! The host is really nice. Chris' place is definitely a good choice if you wanna explore Manhattan.

I stayed at Chris' apartment for a few days during a business trip to New York, the place is great, 5 minute walk to subway station, bars and restaurants, it is located on a very safe and cool area of the city. Chris is one of the best Airbnb hosts I've met, he's super friendly and has the apartment in a very neat condition. I will recommend him to friends coming to NY and I will definitely look for this apt next time I'm in the city.

Awesome place to stay in the East Village! Chris was very welcoming and nice, very accommodating, and very helpful always. The location was excellent for getting to anywhere else in the city, and is right near Union Square. And despite it being in a busy area, it had a lot of quiet moments. The apartment itself is definitely cozy, but the room where one stays is a big comfortable size. Thank you Chris for a great stay, looking forward to coming back when I'm in the city again!
I had a wonderful time! The location is very good and Chris is very nice
Great stay for a great price!

Chris' house was perfect place for NY traveler.
It was easy to access union square subway station. And east village was quiet but full of cafe, restaurants, and bars.
Furthemore, room was cosy and fully equipped.
The host was kind and always ready to help me.
If I have a chance to visit NY again, i will have a reservation this house.

I appreciated being able to stay near where I needed to be, and found Chris to be well-organized, neat, and generous in providing the largest room in his place for guests to stay. He provided a lot of written information for guests, and was open to allowing use of the kitchen. Chris was proactive in offering an iron and ironing board, and experienced in hosting people from different time zones. I appreciated that he checked about coordinating when I expected to be up in case I needed to be somewhere at a particular time. He answered questions about neighborhood resources or transportation when asked. Despite a heat spell, I was able to sleep well in the loft bed, and appreciated that it had a shelf where I could keep my phone to check time in the morning. On arrival, I was a little daunted about bringing my bags up to the fifth floor, but neither the building access nor the neighborhood environment seemed challenging. To reach the guest room, you pass through a sitting area where his sleeping space is walled off by a ceiling-high partition. The lodging is presented as a share, and the written materials do encourage guests to lend a hand by watering plants in their room and stripping the bed upon departure. On the first day, I was a little distracted and accidentally forgot to wash up my coffee-making equipment, but texted him an apology, and when I mentioned it later, he responded graciously.
Zentrale Lage, ein bisschen lsut, mir hat es gefallen
Chris was a good and respectful host, the location of the place is perfect! Thank you Chris!

This place is super-conveniently located in the East Village, only a few minutes walking to great bars, restaurants and Union Square. 

Chris' place is small, but that isn't news for anyone living in New York. The bedroom that I stayed in, however, is relatively spacious and bright. 

Chris is a very good communicator before and throughout my stay. 

If you're coming to New York to explore the city, this place is a good choice. If, however, you're coming to New York and would also like to use your apartment as a place to relax throughout the day, I personally wouldn't recommend it, as it is rather tiny.

As described - good location, clean, well taken care of... But some issues:
• No elevator to the apartment on the fifth floor is inconvenient
• No power socket near the bed (because bed is elevated)
• No air conditioning in the room, and a fan that doesn't reach / aim at the bed. It gets VERY hot (and this was in mid-Sep so summer would be unbearable) and opening the window lets in heaps of mosquitoes that munch you (contra Chris's communication to me that mosquitoes weren't a problem)
• More 'House Rules' than one can remember, and Chris seems to be at home a lot, leading to constant tiptoeing around (without shoes, of course, as per rule 34)

Staying at Chris' place was great. Smooth check in, with great communication up to that point. The room is much bigger than it looks in the photos too. Central, with some good breakfast joints and bars nearby. Chris was a real nice guy too, very professional and friendly at the same time. Couldn't have asked for more.
Great place, host and location :)

Chris' place is in a great location, close to the subway and a lot of pubs, restaurants and supermarkets. Chris welcomed us on our first night. For the rest of our stay, communication was mainly through (Hidden by Airbnb) for practical matters (timing for using kitchen and bathroom, checking out,...). So we saw Chris only a few times and for a few minutes, so we can't say a lot about him as a host. The room is big enough for two persons and the kitchen and bathroom are well-equipped.
Very nice place
Chris is a really great guy!! He responds quickly too. I was in a bit of a situation with nowhere to stay and he really helped me out. Excellent location. 10/10 would come again.

This place is a steal for the location, and Chris is a great AirBnB host - quiet, but around if you need him. He gave me an extra blanket because I was cold. I'd a great stay, and thought that the apartment was safe, nice and a great weekend halt.
Perfect place.

Thanks Chris - very much appreciated being able to stay at your pad in the East Village. Really enjoyed Little Poland  just around the corner - True New York diner with great Polish food at a good price.
Location is in a vibrant area with plenty of cafes and bars. 3 minutes walk from Union Square subway means you can get anywhere in Manhattan very quickly.
A great place to stay and see NY!
Thanks Again,
Ian
Fantastic location & Chris was a terrific host.
Great stay in a nice apartment with a kind host. Will definitely try to stay here again next time I come to Manhattan.
Quirky fun space in the East Village in the middle of everything ongoing in New York. Walk, Bike or Subway to almost anything you want to do at almost any time of day or night
Really lovely room - super clean and great location. Thanks so much Chris :-)
Really nice location! And so cozy room. Chris is really kind host.thank you for everything
Chris was a great host. His apartment is very comfortable and is in a great location for exploring Manhattan, highly recommended.
Chris is a warm host, and his apartment is fantastically located.

name: the best location in taksim. hotel apt. 3rd floor
house_rules: We give you a clean place and take back it clean

host.host_about: Hi, my name is Iman, i will be happy to be your host for your trip in istanbul

name: GENIAL APARTAMENTO EN SANTS (BHM2-3564)
summary: Luminoso apartamento cuyas 2 acogedoras y soleadas habitaciones hacen que sea el lugar perfecto para una corta o larga estancia en Barcelona. Este apartamento está totalmente amueblado, contando con una cocina independiente donde podrás cocinar tus platos favoritos sin molestar a tus compañeros. En la sala de estar encontrarás un amplio y cómodo sofá donde pasar varias tardes tranquilas y relajadas.
space: Las 2 habitaciones están decoradas con muebles de madera y tonalidades blancas, lo cual aporta un toque extra de luminosidad y crea un ambiente hogareño. Ambos dormitorios están equipados con un gran armario, incluso uno de ellos cuenta con un escritorio, ideal para estudiantes.
description: Luminoso apartamento cuyas 2 acogedoras y soleadas habitaciones hacen que sea el lugar perfecto para una corta o larga estancia en Barcelona. Este apartamento está totalmente amueblado, contando con una cocina independiente donde podrás cocinar tus platos favoritos sin molestar a tus compañeros. En la sala de estar encontrarás un amplio y cómodo sofá donde pasar varias tardes tranquilas y relajadas. Las 2 habitaciones están decoradas con muebles de madera y tonalidades blancas, lo cual aporta un toque extra de luminosidad y crea un ambiente hogareño. Ambos dormitorios están equipados con un gran armario, incluso uno de ellos cuenta con un escritorio, ideal para estudiantes. Está situado en Sants, a pocos minutos de Plaça d'Espanya, desde donde podrás llegar a cualquier parte de la ciudad. La estación de metro más cercana es Santa Eulalia (L1). En el barrio hay un gran número de restaurantes, bares y parques que seguro disfrutarás. Además, a sólo unos minutos a pie, se encuentra la Fuen
neighborhood_overview: Está situado en Sants, a pocos minutos de Plaça d'Espanya, desde donde podrás llegar a cualquier parte de la ciudad. La estación de metro más cercana es Santa Eulalia (L1). En el barrio hay un gran número de restaurantes, bares y parques que seguro disfrutarás. Además, a sólo unos minutos a pie, se encuentra la Fuente Mágica de Montjuïc, donde podrás disfrutar de tus tardes con un espectáculo musical.

host.host_about:
Hola! 

Barcelona-Home is a small business that started in 2006. We provide beautiful tourist accommodations for families and friends from all over the city and beyond. As we are a very small team -either Alba, Simone or Javi will personally attend you- we are able to pay particularly close attention to the needs of all our clients. We also offer a range of other activities to make your trip to Barcelona a memorable one. 

Send us a message if you have any questions!

name: Quarto p estudante
summary: Próximo metrô Siqueira Campos . Entrada independente. TV de led. Freegobar. WiFi  Filtro agua gelada MicroWeve cama de solteiro armário aéreo. Tanque p lavar roupa . banheiro privativo com chuveiro a gás. Opcional roupa de cama. Lava e seca e vaga de carro.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O apartamento está bem localizado e muito perto de praia. Theacla é muito utíl é agradável. Más o apartamento é muito pequeno é muito quente, porque não existe uma ventilador ou ar condicionado. Fica difícil dormir quando é muito quente. O apartamento está um pouco suja quando eu cheguei e a internet não funciona que escrito na descrição.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Küçük sakin temiz ve tatlı bir yer Bekleriz )
house_rules: Misafirler kendi bulaşıklarını yıkar

reviews.comments: Mehmet Bey, sorunlara anında çözüm bulan, nazik ve misafirperver bir ev sahibi. Ev ise otel rahatlığında. Ayrıca konumu itibariyle tavsiye edilir bir ev.
Very good location to discover the old Istanbul ! Nice host, you can easily talk with him by (Hidden by Airbnb) for example.

name: kitinete na Praça da Bandeira. Perto de tudo!
summary: Kitinete simples na Praça da Bandeira. Localização central e perto de tudo:  do Centro da Cidade, Lapa, Barra , Copacabana, Ipanema,Botafogo e Flamengo (metrô e ônibus) e pode ir andando para Maracanã e Sambódromo.
space: Próximo do Estádio do Maracanã.  Acesso fácil a vários bairros da cidade.  O conjugado é aconchegante e equipado com tudo necessário para o hóspede dormir  e aproveitar sua estadia. Porteiro 24h Proximidades Trem e Metrô.
description: Kitinete simples na Praça da Bandeira. Localização central e perto de tudo:  do Centro da Cidade, Lapa, Barra , Copacabana, Ipanema,Botafogo e Flamengo (metrô e ônibus) e pode ir andando para Maracanã e Sambódromo. Próximo do Estádio do Maracanã.  Acesso fácil a vários bairros da cidade.  O conjugado é aconchegante e equipado com tudo necessário para o hóspede dormir  e aproveitar sua estadia. Porteiro 24h Proximidades Trem e Metrô. Porteiros 24h Apenas na entrega  e devolução das chaves e se necessitar. O imóvel fica na Praça da Bandeira, ponto central da cidade do Rio de Janeiro, local seguro com comércio e bancos diversos, transporte público para todos os pontos da cidade, a 850 metros do metrô Afonso Pena, a 2 km (15 minutos caminhando) do Maracanã.  Nas redondezas você tem facilidade com todos os bancos, restaurantes bons na rua de trás, inclusive o Aconchego Carioca, famoso por seus deliciosos bolinhos de feijoada e carta de cervejas do mundo todo... também recomendamos o restaur
neighborhood_overview: O imóvel fica na Praça da Bandeira, ponto central da cidade do Rio de Janeiro, local seguro com comércio e bancos diversos, transporte público para todos os pontos da cidade, a 850 metros do metrô Afonso Pena, a 2 km (15 minutos caminhando) do Maracanã.  Nas redondezas você tem facilidade com todos os bancos, restaurantes bons na rua de trás, inclusive o Aconchego Carioca, famoso por seus deliciosos bolinhos de feijoada e carta de cervejas do mundo todo... também recomendamos o restaurante Bandeiras para almoçar diariamente, o menu é caseiro, variado, delicioso e bem acessível ao bolso. Um pouco mais adiante na rua tem o Galeto Bandeira que fica aberto até às três horas da manhã.
notes: A quitinete comporta bem duas pessoas, mas há um colchão para convidado adicional. Possui um sofá cama ,  armários, ar-condicionado, microondas e frigobar . Não possui wi-fi, fogão e máquina de lavar. O apartamento é entregue limpo, mas não há, durante a estadia, serviço de limpeza.
transit: Transporte público para todos os pontos da cidade (centro, Copacabana, Leblon, Flamengo, etc.). Ponto de ônibus em frente ao prédio. Três estações de metrô (São Cristóvão, Estácio e Afonso Pena )
access: Porteiros 24h
interaction: Apenas na entrega  e devolução das chaves e se necessitar.
house_rules: Com higiene, cuidados com os utensílios domésticos e respeitar as leis do condomínio.

Llegar desde el aeropuerto es muy fácil, ya que se encuentra cerca de todos los medios de transporte. Asimismo, proveemos de toallas, sábanas, y el apartamento se encuentra equipado con wifi de alta velocidad, televisión, aire acondicionado central.
space: El apartamento es muy grande, se encuentra equipado con muebles y decoraciones de primera calidad, que hacen de la armonía del lugar y a su vez, poder disrutar de vuestra casa.

host.host_about:
Sou   vovó de  duas  lindas meninas,   trabalho  na  maior  parte  dos dias trabalho  meio expediente  ou desenvolvo  o trabalho  em  casa  , sou paciente  tranquila  adoro um  filminho além  de  ler  muito. Gosto  da  casa  limpa  mas aceito bem  as
coisa  fora do lugar desde  que  esteja  tudo limpo, Cozinho  por  prazer mas não todos os dias.Ja  viajei  muito conheço quase  todo o Brasil , Argentina Urugua,estive
por  6 vezes conhecendo Usa, ( Florida , Georgea, Chicago, Texas), ainda programo após  aposentar viajar pela  Europa paises ecandinavos e  se possivel
Africa do Sul  e Australia , 
Sei  que  o Rio  é  lindissimo ainda  mais  quando visitado sem seguir agenda turisca sabe lugares que  só  moradores conhecem, gostaria  de mostrar aos  meus  hospedes  este  Rio  que  turistas  não conseguem descobrir.
Então  basicamente  sou  simples  trabalho  com  projetos o  que  já  é  muito  desgatante por  outro lado  tenho  que  ser  muito  tranquila  para viver  a  vida

name: AMAZING PENTHOUSE IN BARCELONA
summary: BEAUTIFUL PENTHOUSE WITH PRIVAT TERRACE! The apartment has been newly remodeled, it is all equipped  and rooms are nice and fresh.  It has a beautiful terrace with beautiful views to Barcelona.This cozy new apartment is placed right in Barcelona Business Center. Located in one of the most exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona.  65m2 apartament in the heart of Barcelona. It is distributed in 2 big bedrooms. Capacity for 3 people. There is a large dressing room placed in another room.
space: 65m2 apartament in the heart of Barcelona. It is distributed in 2 big bedrooms, one with queen size double bed and another individual bedroom with individual bed. Capacity for 3 people. There is a large dressing room placed in another room. 1 big confortable bathroom newly renovated with a confortable shower.  It has a large and bright living room with views to the city, and large windows that provide a great light to the apartment.  Fully equipped kitchen. furniture is new and designed with good taste. The apartment is equipped with air conditioning and heating, washing machine, oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, wifi, tv in living room and in main bedroom.

transit: Transportation is fantastic as you have a Metro and bus stations right by the apartment.  .You have all types of shopping at your door with malls, supermarkets, pharmacy and anything you could need right by your door.

name: İstanbul'un Merkezinde Sessiz ve Güvenli Eviniz
summary: 1 Oda 1 Salon olan dairemiz, komple yenilenerek, son moda mobilya ve teknolojik aletlerle dekore edilmiştir. Dairemiz lokasyon olarak merkezi konumu ile metro ve otobüs duraklarına bir kaç adım mesafede olup, istanbul'un her köşesine toplu ulaşım sayesinde kolayca seyahat edebilirsiniz.
space: Eğer ki gece hayatı ilginizi çekiyorsa Gümüşsuyu bölgesi tam aradığınız lokasyondur, uyumayan şehir olarak adlandırılan İstiklal caddesi ve geleneksel İstanbul eğlence ve Türk zengin mutfağının eşsiz lezzet örneğini sunan Nevizade bölgesi sadece bir kaç adım mesafededir.

Dairemiz lokasyon olarak merkezi konumu ile metro ve otobüs duraklarına bir kaç adım mesafede olup, istanbul'un her köşesine toplu ulaşım sayesinde kolayca seyahat edebilirsiniz. Eğer ki gece hayatı ilginizi çekiyorsa Gümüşsuyu bölgesi tam aradığınız lokasyondur, uyumayan şehir olarak adlandırılan İstiklal caddesi ve geleneksel İstanbul eğlence ve Türk zengin mutfağının eşsiz lezzet örneğini sunan Nevizade bölgesi sadece bir kaç adım mesafededir. İstanbulda uzun yıllar turizm ve konaklama tecrübesine sahip olan ben ve ekibim bir telefon ile her zaman yardıma hazırız. İstanbul seyahatinizi unutulmaz kılacak olan gece hayatı ve eğlence bölgesi sadece bir kaç adım mesafede olup, Galata Kulesi, Galata Köprüsü ve Eşsiz İstanbul boğazına yürüyerek 10 dakikada ulaşabilirsiniz. Zengin ve eşsiz lezzetiyle büyüleyen Türk mutfağının tüm örneklerini veya lüks dünya mutfaklarından örnekler t
neighborhood_overview: İstanbul seyahatinizi unutulmaz kılacak olan gece hayatı ve eğlence bölgesi sadece bir kaç adım mesafede olup, Galata Kulesi, Galata Köprüsü ve Eşsiz İstanbul boğazına yürüyerek 10 dakikada ulaşabilirsiniz. Zengin ve eşsiz lezzetiyle büyüleyen Türk mutfağının tüm örneklerini veya lüks dünya mutfaklarından örnekler taşıyan restoranlara bir kaç adımla ulaşabilirsiniz.
transit: İstanbul'da zaman kazanmanın en kolay yolu metro ile seyahattir Metro istasyonu 50 metre mesafede olup, İstanbul'un her noktasına hareket eden Otobüs durakları tam 25 metre uzaklıktadır. İsterseniz 10 dakikalık yürüme ile boğaz iskelesine ulaşıp, her iki kıtayı birleştiren İstanbul boğazını tekne ile bir uçtan diğer ucuna gezebilirsiniz.
interaction: İstanbulda uzun yıllar turizm ve konaklama tecrübesine sahip olan ben ve ekibim bir telefon ile her zaman yardıma hazırız.

name: Center - Apartment
summary: During New Year's Eve, a minimum of 5 days Located in the center of the city. Great location, close to restaurants, bars, banks, drugstores, the subway, Arcos da Lapa, Aterro do Flamengo and Santos Dumont airport. Ideal for those who come for tourism or to work.
space: Accommodates up to 4 people.
description: During New Year's Eve, a minimum of 5 days Located in the center of the city. Great location, close to restaurants, bars, banks, drugstores, the subway, Arcos da Lapa, Aterro do Flamengo and Santos Dumont airport. Ideal for those who come for tourism or to work. Accommodates up to 4 people. Located in the city center, the apartment is 2 minutes away from the municipal theater, 2 minutes away from Arcos da Lapa, 2 minutes away from the subway with easy access to the Maracanã, Copacabana and Ipanema beaches and 2 km away from Santos Dumont airport. Safe place with bars, restaurants and banks around. You will also be near the best city museums of the city and you can go walking. Public means of transport that can take you anywhere in the city. Rio de Janeiro subway and Cinelândia (2 minutes away walking) buses and taxis pass by the corner of the street. Quiet and secure building with 24-hour concierge.

Safe place with bars, restaurants and banks around. You will also be near the best city museums of the city and you can go walking.
notes: Quiet and secure building with 24-hour concierge.
transit: Public means of transport that can take you anywhere in the city. Rio de Janeiro subway and Cinelândia (2 minutes away walking) buses and taxis pass by the corner of the street.
house_rules: Não é permitido fumar ou animais no local.

host.host_about: Viajar é o maior prazer da vida !

reviews.comments: Wow the place is brand new! New everything and a really great place, great location next to the metro station and minutes from the amazing party's in lapa, I'd recommend this place as great value and very clean comfortable apartment. I payed double for another place nearby and it wasn't half as good as this place, I only wish I found this place before! Not one thing to complain about I'd say this place is perfect.

Luiz was an excellent host! As soon as I booked the apartment, he contacted me and scheduled the arrangement. We had a minor set back due to the previous guest who had a late check out so I couldn't check in on time but Luiz communicated with me the information with time. I had no problem with the late check in and I hope that if I needed the late check out, it could be offered. He is flexible and I appreciate that as a traveler. His apartment was so clean and so central to everything! The Cinelandia metro station was close by and there are numerous buses that pass by. You have the national theater, the national library and other museums near by. You also have the Feira Uruguaiana close by to shop for all the things you want to take back home. It is a safe location and very close to Lapa (the night life). It is a great central point to branch out and see so many different things in Rio. When I was leaving, Luiz was kind enough to help me find a cab to take me to the airport. Super friendly and helpful. I would totally stay there again!

i couldnt meet with Luiz but the flat was very nice,safe and at good location (lapa, near nighlife spot). it is also very close to metro statiton and lots of places to visit. flat was perfectly clean and has no problem. i can highly recommend. thanks Luiz

Expérience très positive ! Appartement refait à neuf, très propre et très bien situé dans un immeuble très sécurisé! mis à part les problèmes de température de l'eau qui peuvent être résolus je l'espère, tout était parfait!

Luiz's apartment has THE perfect location for discovering the city and I'd recommend it whoeheartedly to individuals as well as couples. In its vicinity you will find good places to eat as well as ATMs, public transport and others. I have not met Luiz in person due to rather busy schedule but he made sure that everything was ready for my arrival and was also available during my stay.

Foi tudo perfeito. Não encontrei com o Luiz pessoalmente, mas entrei em contato com ele antes mesmo de reservar, pois foi a primeira vez que utilizei esse site e tinha alguma dúvidas, ele foi muito atencioso sempre.
O apartamento é como esta na foto, muito limpo, confortável e tudo funciona bem.
A localização é ótima, fui a pé para Santa Teresa, Lapa, Centro... a estação de metrô é muito perto, tem uma estação de bicicleta muito perto também, no qual levei 40 minutos pedalando até a praia vermelha...
Gostei muito e recomendo.

The apartment was exactly as pictured and described.  Luiz, our host, was very responsive and accommodating.  For those who are not familiar with Rio they may find the surrounding area to be intimidating as its the downtown core, but there really is nothing to fear.  One block away is the state assembly, municipal theatre, national library, and many dazzling examples of architecture for which Rio was once famously called "Paris of South America".  There are several nice restaurants where you can enjoy a wonderful evening sipping cold beer and people watching.  
For me the most convenient aspect of this apartment was its proximity to the US Consulate...the reason for my visit.  If you have anything to do in the downtown area this apartment is well located and convenient...including a short taxi ride from the local municipal airport - Santos Dumont.  
Also just one block away is the metro station where you can easily go to the famous beaches of Rio/Copacabana/Ipanema for only R$3.5 per person.  
The apartment was completely renovated and in excellent condition...something you do not find very often in Brasil.  The bed was comfortable and stocked with extra blankets & pillows.  Because we were traveling in winter we didn't need to use the a/c...being on the 18th floor we were up high enough to get a nice refreshing breeze.

O apartamento é ótimo! A localização é perfeita, perto de vários pontos turisticos (ou de metrôs) e é relativamente segura. A qualidade dos móveis condiz com as fotos e tudo estava limpo e em perfeitas condições. O anfitrião foi atencioso ao responder minhas dúvidas e seguiu com o combinado.

Apartamento limpo, muito organizado e do tamanho certo. Bem localizado próximo ao centro do Rio, com fácil acesso ao metrô (Cinelândia), bairro da Lapa e Consulado Americano. Não estranhem, mas o apartamento fica em um prédio com salas comerciais, mas isso não atrapalha a estadia. O anfitrião Luiz foi sempre atencioso e respondia rapidamente nossas mensagens. Alguns restaurantes próximos fecham à noite antes das 21h, somente os bares ficam abertos até mais tarde.

The apartment is clean, organized and has the right size. Well located at Rio's downtown, you have easy access to the subway (Cinelândia station), Lapa neighborhood and the North American Consulate. The apartment is also located inside a building with commercial spaces, but this is not a problem. Luiz always quickly replied our messages and was kind to answer our doubts. Some near restaurants close around 9pm, so do not plan to have dinner too late. Only bars stay open later.

O apartamento é agradável, compacto e funcional. Está perfeitamente descrito através das fotos e informações! A localização central também é bastante conveniente. O Luiz Augusto sanou minhas dúvidas de maneira atenciosa e rápida. Considero uma excelente opção de acomodação para duas pessoas.

Le logement est idéalement situé. Métro , bus, restaurant et bar à proximité. Concierge à l'entrée de l'immeuble disponible 24/24. Appartement propre. Nous le reprendrons sans hésiter lors de notre prochain séjour.

Não consegui conhecer pessoalmente a Luiz durante meu viagem, mais ele fico muito atento pela minha chegada e estadia no apartamento, foi muito bom. As fotos e a descrição são corretas. Espaço amplo, comodo, arrelhado e tranquilo. Tem Prédios para tomar café da manhã a 50 metros, do edifício, e o aceso a transporte público (ônibus, metro, táxi)  foi ótimo também.  Pensei que de noite seria difícil a chegada, mais também foi muito tranquilo. muito recomendado.
Toujours aussi bien. Nous reviendrons sans hésiter.

Excelente localização no centro do Rio de Janeiro muito próximo do metro cinelândia ( do qual da para chegar a qualquer lugar no Rio). O apartamento é perto da Lapa, o lugar é incrível. O apartamento é uma graça, limpo, bem decorado e atende a todas as necessidades caso você precise ficar por um bom tempo. O preço também é justo. Não encontrei pessoalmente com o Luiz, mas ele foi super atencioso a minhas necessidades. Ocorreu tudo como combinado previamente, a todo momento me passava  as instruções necessárias. Recomendo o lugar, recomendo o Rio!
Parfait, comme toujours
O contato e recepcao foi bom
Tudo conforme o descrito no anúncio. Localização perfeita pra quem vai à trabalho pro Rio. Recomendo

A estadia foi fantástica. O apartamento é exatamente como anunciado e ilustrado pelas fotos. Fica localizado em prédio comercial, porém é extremamente tranquilo. A localização no Centro é muito boa, próximo a diversos pontos turísticos que podem ser explorados a pé. Estações de metrô e paradas de ônibus muito próximas também ajudam no deslocamento pela cidade. Apesar de não ter encontrado pessoalmente o Luiz Augusto, a comunicação por telefone foi bastante eficiente. Além disso, o valor cobrado é super justo e vale muito a pena. Tudo funcionou bem durante os cinco dias e não tenho absolutamente nenhuma crítica negativa. Certamente quando voltar ao RJ vou procurar o apartamento do Luiz novamente.

Uma ótima experiência! O Guto nos recebeu muito bem. Chegou antes para nos receber e ainda nos mostrou os principais pontos do centro. Apartamento todo reformado e novo. E no meio da estada, trouxe toalhas novas. Manteve-se sempre à disposição para o que fosse necessário. Recomendo muito! Obrigado por tudo, Guto.

Excellent hôte.  Très sympathique. Petit problème d'internet résolu en 1h. 5 ème fois que je viens chez lui, toujours autant satisfait. L'emplacement de l'appartement est idéal pour profiter de tout Rio.

Excellent host. Very kind. Small Internet problem solved in 1h. 5th time I come on his apartment, always so satisfied. The localisation  of the apartment is ideal for enjoying all Rio.

O apartamento do Luiz foi uma ótima escolha para minha estadia. Como ponto positivo principal, cito a localização. Conheço bem o Rio, pois morei 4 anos na cidade, portanto, e posso dizer que o local é de fácil acesso tanto para turistas quanto para quem vai a trabalho. Além disso o apartamento é muito funcional e aconchegante. 
gostaria de destacar, contudo, que trata-se de prédio comercial, mas não tive problemas com esse fato.

O apartamento é ótimo e estava muito limpo e arrumado quando me instalei nele. Foi reformado com bom gosto e visando à funcionalidade. Está bem localizado, com diversos pontos turísticos à distância de uma rápida caminhada (Lapa, Catedral Metropolitana, Theatro Municipal, Real Gabinete Português de Leitura, Escadaria Selaron). Há boas opções de alimentação nas redondezas, e a estação Cinelândia do metrô fica logo ao lado. É difícil estacionar na região, mas há um estacionamento Estapar 24 horas a dois quarteirões. Não me encontrei pessoalmente com o Luiz, mas a comunicação antes e durante a estadia foi muito boa, e ele demonstrou ser um anfitrião bastante atencioso. Enfim, tive uma experiência agradável e recomendo este Airbnb!

Tudo perfeito! Nada, absolutamente nada como ponto negativo, só tenho a agradecer ao Luiz Augusto por toda a atenção e rapidez nas várias formas de contato.

Local aconchegante, bem localizado, facilidade extrema para ir a qualquer ponto do RJ, seja com qual meio de transporte for. Tudo à mão e vários pontos turísticos culturais, gastronômicos e boêmios a poucas quadras dali. 

A região tem segurança razoável, não houve problema algum, mesmo a voltar tarde da noite.

O apartamento é muito bonito e em uma ótima localizaçao. Tudo muito bem arrumado. Isso sem falar que o Luiz é muito atencioso e prestativo. Quando voltar ao Rio, com certeza ficarei no apartamento do Luiz.
Great location, clean and safe. Nothing to complain about

Fiquei no apto de Luiz Gustavo por quase um mês e posso dizer que é exatamente como nos fotos: decorado clean, iluminado, limpo, com cozinha e banheiro novos.
 Fica 3 quarteirões da estação Cinelândia do metrô, na mesma rua do Teatro Municipal e em frente a um quartel de policia. É um prédio comercial, o que garante portaria 24 horas e 3 elevadores grandes e modernos.   
É muito bem localizado tanto para quem  vai trabalhar no centro ou conhecer aos sambas da Lapa! 
Luiz Augusto respondeu rapidamente a todo contato meu e foi extremamente honesto e correto. Obrigada, Luiz!
Recomendo o apartamento, sem nenhuma ressalva!

The apartment is really neat, and was spotless when we arrived. Luiz even arranged so that we could check-in a couple of hours before the initially arranged time, which was really nice from him. There are many possibilities to eat around the place, albeit most of them only open during weekdays. The apartment is really close to the Santos Dumont airport, only a ~R$12 taxi ride away (approximately US$3 as of today's conversion rate), so really convenient. I do, however, recommend being careful in the neighborhood, and spartan in what you bring with you, to avoid mishaps. All in all, it was an excellent stay, and whenever I had a question about the best way to do something, Luiz would promptly respond via (Hidden by Airbnb) .

Desde o primeiro contato o anfitrião Guto foi super atencioso, respondendo prontamente todas as dúvidas. Além disso, mostrou-se super flexível com relação aos horários de check in e check out, o que ajudou bastante. Sou carioca e aluguei o apartamento por 10 dias pois moro distante dos principais pontos turísticos e estava recebendo a visita do meu namorado alemão. Portanto, posso afirmar com propriedade que ao levar em conta a localização, custo-benefício e conforto não existe melhor opção do que esse apartamento. O imóvel é exatamente como nas fotos!!! A cozinha é muito bem equipada, o cooktop funciona perfeitamente e você encontra todos os utensílios necessários para cozinhar. O box do banheiro é super espaçoso, com blindex e um chuveiro elétrico muito bom! Você também irá encontrar suportes super funcionais dentro do box para estender a sua roupa molhada. A ventilação do apartamento é ótima, fato que nos levou a usar o ar-condicionado apenas uma vez. O mesmo atende maravilhosamente todo o espaço e não é barulhento. O frigobar é mais espaçoso do que aparenta a foto, e tanto o sofá-cama como o colchão da cama principal são super confortáveis! Recebemos o apto limpo com toalhas e roupa de cama. Havia toalhas, roupa de cama e dois travesseiros extras à disposição. O wi-fi funcionou bem durante toda a nossa estadia. O fato do prédio ser comercial é um plus super positivo, pois há porteiros 24h além de circuito interno de câmeras em todos os andares e nos elevadores, que são modernos e espaçosos. O prédio também é muito silencioso, não tivemos nenhum problema com relação a isso. Ao redor do prédio você encontra várias opções de bares, restaurantes, padarias, bancos, e lojas em geral. Depois de visitar todos os pontos turísticos que o Centro da Cidade oferece, você poderá explorar facilmente os demais bairros como Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon, Lagoa, Jardim Botânico e adjacências através do metrô que fica a uma quadra de distância. Já o bairro da Lapa e Santa Teresa são facilmente acessados a pé. Pegamos táxi apenas 2 vezes por uma questão de comodidade e utilizamos um aplicativo. Ambos chegaram em menos de 5 min. Mas na porta do prédio também é possível pegar facilmente um táxi a qualquer hora. Até mesmo ao enfrentar uma frente fria no Rio, fomos surpreendidos com um guarda-chuva à nossa disposição dentro do armário de produtos de limpeza na cozinha, ou seja, não faltou nada mesmo!!! Com certeza foi a melhor experiência que tive através do site! Super indico e fica aqui mais uma vez meu agradecimento ao anfitrião Guto que foi nota 1000!!!

My first stay with air bnb and a good one indeed. The apartment is located a 2 min walk from the famous Lapa Bridge and there was alot going on around this area which I enjoyed. Police station across the road so your quiet safe. The apartment itself is nice and clean and of course spacious. The air con works wonders and the bathroom and shower is a good size. You can see a bit of the ocean from the window. Yes I would stay here again and Luiz was available to contact if I had any questions. Thank you Luiz for having me.

Increíble.. Una semana perfecta juntos a mis amigos... 
Fiestas,playas,paisajes, etc 
Además de ser cerca de Lapa. En dónde está toda la

A descrição do que contido no anúncio correspondeu com a realidade encontrada.
Fiquei muito satisfeito. A localização muito boa.
Encontrei o Apartamento 100% limpo. E mais, tem todos os utensílios necessários para quem quer uma boa temporada. Permanecei no Ap durante 12 dias. A internet tem boa velocidade.
Duas vezes precisei contatar com o Luiz e ele de pronto me atendeu.
Recomendo como uma boa opção, tanto pelo preço, pela boa acomodação, pelo local(centro) e etc.
Cesar Augusto Guimarães (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Luiz is a very friendly, helpful guy.  He let me check in a little early since I had an early flight in, and check out late afternoon since I had an evening flight out and the apartment wasn't rented that day.  He also promptly fixed the shower when there was no hot water and when the toilet wouldn't stop flushing.

The apartment is well located in Centro, just 400 meters from the Cinelandia Metro station and the Municipal Theater, and lots of nearby restaurants, although most of them are closed on the weekends.  The apartment is fairly small but comfortable enough for one or two people; the bed is very comfortable, and the small refrigerator is adequate.  The kitchen is very small but sufficient to heat up something on the stove or in the microwave.  The bathroom is fine, with a good shower, and some racks to dry any washing you may have done.

There are three issues with the apartment, which could range from just irritating to a serious negative, depending on how important they are to a prospective renter:
1) The apartment is on, and the window faces, Rua Evaristo da Veiga, a very busy, noisy street, with lots of bus and car traffic.  Even though the apartment is on the 18th floor, you can hear some noise, even with the window shutter closed, at all hours, although the air conditioner drowns out most of it when it is on;
2) The TV is old and there are no international channels, only local Brazilian channels, half of which cannot be seen because of bad reception and none of which are of any interest to a non-Brazilian, so you will not be watching much TV if you are a foreigner;
3) Given the TV situation, good Wi-Fi is even more important; however, the W-Fi in the apartment, while good when it is working, shuts down and restores itself at random, which was frustrating, and sometimes the router had to be manually turned off and back on again when the Wi-Fi didn't restore itself.  Luiz is aware of the problem but apparently nothing can be done about it.

Given the location, the apartment features, and the price, I would definitely stay here again and can recommend staying here if the issues described above are not important to a potential renter.
Tudo Ok, aproveitamos bem nossa estadia. Muito obrigado Luiz Augusto!
Excelente opção de hospedagem. Bastante seguro, região central com fácil acesso ao metro do RJ. Ao lado da Lapa, com excelente opções de vida noturna. Sem duvida me hospedaria novamente!

O apto é ótimo! Fica no 18º andar e está todo reformado, acomodando 2 a 3 pessoas tranquilamente. O Luiz foi um anfitrião excelente! Atendeu a todas as minhas solicitações anteriores a chegada e não houve ocorrências durante a minha estadia. O apto fica a dois minutos da estação de metrô (Cinelândia), com  vários restaurantes, bares e um mercado por perto. Um único porém, que não chega a ser um incômodo muito grande, é que há um barulho constante nos arredores, visto que o centro do Rio é uma região bem movimentada. Voltaria e recomendaria a todos, com certeza.
