house_rules: -Para a comodidade dos hóspedes, os horários do Check In e out são flexíveis desde que combinados previamente com o anfitrião e viável para ambos. Preferencialmente os check in e out devem ser entre 10 e 16 h mas podem  depender da disponibilidade.   -Como desejo que o hóspede tenha uma estadia bem sucedida que, com certeza, o levará a voltar a fazer turismo no Rio e se hospedar no meu apartamento, ofereço o benefício de um desconto nas diárias no seu retorno. -Uma vez reservada a estadia, será fornecido o meu email e telefone para nos comunicarmos mais facilmente. -Para evitar transtornos com os demais moradores do prédio, não será permitido reuniões ou quaisquer eventos que emitam ruídos ou sonoridades em nível de decibéis superiores ao permitido em lei, devendo ainda serem encerrados impreterivelmente às 22:00 horas. Será considerada falta grave com imediata rescisão do da locação sem direito a nenhum reembolso, o uso do apartamento para a utilização em seu interior de qualquer drog

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sejam bem vindos amigos. Sou carioca da gema. Nasci, cresci e vivi toda a minha vida no Rio de Janeiro. Adoro esta cidade. Já estou aqui neste site como anfitrião há muitos anos. Durante esse tempo, conheci muitas pessoas e culturas diferentes. Já aluguei esse apartamento para pequenos ou grandes grupos que vem passear ou trabalhar aqui, e pelo que pude constatar todos gostam muito do lugar pelas facilidades que encontram: metrô, transportes variados, supermercados, hortifruti, comércio de todo tipo, praia no melhor trecho do bairro entre os postos 3 e 4, diversões, surffing, bodyboarding, kite surf, games, enfim, tudo muito pertinho numa rua tranquila e segura. O apartamento como constatam e todos podem confirmar nos comentários dos hóspedes, além de confortável, espaçoso, bem ventillado, contém todos os eletrodomésticos, internet, tv a cabo, wi fi, cozinha completa e todos os cômodos de sala e quartos tem ar condicionado. Além disso, ele é disponível totalmente para o uso e a privacidade completa dos meus hóspedes. Saibam que não tenho nenhuma restrição e preferências por cor, raça ou gênero e recebo com prazer todos aqueles que venham em paz e desejosos de se sentirem verdadeiros cariocas nesta famosa cidade chamada Maravilhosa. Venham se hospedar no meu apartamento e com certeza vão querer voltar sempre. Um grande abraço e boa viagem.

Welcome friends. I'm from Rio de Janeiro. I was born, raised and lived all my life in Rio de Janeiro. I love this city. I've been here on this site as a host for many years. During this time, I met many different people and cultures. I have already rented this apartment for small or large groups that come to stroll or work here, and from what I could tell, everyone is very fond of the place for the facilities they find: subway, various transport, supermarkets, hortifruti, commerce of all kinds, beach in the best part of the neighborhood between stations 3 and 4, amusements, surffing, bodyboarding, kite surf, games, at least, everything very close and in a quiet and safe street. The apartment as you can see and everyone can confirm in the guest comments, in addition to comfortable, spacious, well ventillated, contains all appliances, internet, cable tv, wi fi, full kitchen and all rooms and living room contains air conditioning. In addition, it is fully available for the full use and privacy of my guests. Plus, know that I have no restrictions and preferences by color, race or gender and I welcome with pleasure all those who come in peace and desirous of feeling true Cariocas in this famous city called Maravilhosa. Come and stay in my apartment and you will definitely want to come back again and again. A big hug and a good trip.

Sean bienvenidos amigos. Soy carioca de la gema. Nací, crecí y viví toda mi vida en Río de Janeiro. Me encanta esta ciudad. Ya estoy aquí en este sitio como anfitrión desde hace muchos años. Durante ese tiempo, conocí a muchas personas y culturas diferentes. Ya alquilé ese apartamento para pequeños o grandes grupos que vienen a pasear o trabajar aquí, y por lo que pude constatar a todos les gusta mucho del lugar por las facilidades que encuentran: metro, transportes variados, supermercados, hortifruti, comercio de todo tipo, playa en el mejor tramo del barrio entre los puestos 3 y 4, diversiones, surffing, bodyboarding, kite surf, juegos, en fin, todo muy cerca, en una calle tranquila y segura. El apartamento como constatan y todos pueden confirmar en los comentarios de los huéspedes, además de cómodo, espacioso, bien ventillado, contiene todos los electrodomésticos, internet, televisión por cable, wi fi, cocina completa y todas las habitaciones tienen aire acondicionado. Además, está disponible totalmente para el uso y la privacidad completa de mis huéspedes. Sepan que no tengo ninguna restricción y preferencias por color, raza o género y recibo con placer a todos aquellos que vengan en paz y deseosos de sentirse verdaderos cariocas en esta famosa ciudad llamada Maravillosa. Viene a alojarse en mi apartamento y seguramente van a querer volver siempre. Un gran abrazo y buen viaje.

name: Artsy Co-living 共住空間 (Double雙人) E 油麻地 Yau Ma Tei
summary: Artsy urban loft. It couldn’t be better located. Walk out of the flat and you will find yourself in the heart of Yau Tsim Mong District, which is full of high end boutique shops, shopping malls, massage spas and artistic galleries. Loads of highly recommended restaurants and super cool bars are just next to the building. Feel the vibe and lively city life in Hong Kong Urban Shadow 佔據著最好的地理位置,當你走出公寓,你会发现自己位于油尖旺區的中心地带,那里有许多高端精品店,购物商场,按摩水疗馆和艺术画廊｡ 强烈推荐的餐厅和超酷酒吧旁边就是大楼｡ 感受香港的氛围和生动的城市生活
space: In the traditional Chinese building, the simplicity and modernized design of Urban Shadow allows you to sit back and relax in the hustle and bustle yet lively city. The studio is freshly furnished. Couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers, who are tired of plain hotels, would find Urban Shadow fascinating! 在中国传统建筑中,Urban Shadow的简约和现代化设计让您在熙熙攘攘的热闹城市中放松身心｡ 这间一室公寓新鲜陈设｡ 厌倦普通酒店的夫妇,独自的冒险家和商务旅客会发现Urban Shadow迷人!

name: LEBLON 1 BED FLAT BEST LOCATION
summary: The apartment is well plan and there is 3 ambients in the leaving room that is really good and large bedroom with a massive build in wardrobe and big window with the view for the Christ on top of the Mountain is beautiful. Leblon is the best neighbourhood in Rio as it is the only one without a chance town and has beautiful and expencive houses it became the nest one from Rio. This flat in Leblon has a privileged location as it is near the beach and the Lagoon also the Botanic Garden .

Brand new, modern 1 bedroom Flat with a Large room, double and single bed, Computer desk side table, spot light, fun on the celling, Air conditioner , massive cupboard , Video, TV with 80 Cable Channels and internet wifi.   Modern bathroom, glass box with a power shower, gas boiler, easy and practical to keep clean. reviews.comments: O apartamento da Paula está localizado numa região nobre do Rio de Janeiro, no bairro do Leblon, próximo de vários restaurantes e bistrôs muito charmosos (Av. Ataufo de Paiva e suas transversais), inclusive perto do Shopping Leblon e do Rio Design. Também está muito próximo do Hotel Marina Pálace, da orla do Leblon e de Ipanema, que se pode ir caminhando pelo calçadão e desfrutando da linda paisagem da orla carioca. O apartamento é muito amplo, limpo, organizado. O ar condicionado funciona muito bem. Além de tudo isso, a Paula foi super atenciosa durante a fase de reserva do apartamento, respondendo aos emails de forma rápida e sempre prestativa. Em resumo, mais uma vez minha estadia no Rio foi perfeita. Recomendo este apartamento a qualquer viajante que queira desfrutar um pouco da Cidade Maravilhosa!

Fantastic apartment, lovely and clean in the perfect location. Paula and her mother were extremely accomodating with information  beforehand and her mother was nearby if we had any problems - which we didn't. Would definitely come back and stay here again.

The house was very dirty, we took picture of it and send to her, and asked her to clean. But  she never contact us and later on she refused to come over and to clean. So we had to stay in a very dirty house.
When we left she told airbnb that we made her apartment dirty and broke things, but luckily we had  the pictures with the dates on it and we had the email that we wrote her saying that their are things broken.
So we proved her wrong and we got our deposit back. so don't stay at her place!

Location was great, short walk to the beach, we felt safe and there is a lot of ships, cafes etc close to the flat. all the communication before the trip was great too. However..... The wifi did not work and there was no hot/worm water in the shower. I emailed Paula during our stay and never heard form her. Aside from that everything was as described. Also, you have pick up the keys from her moms apt. And drop them off there after your stay so it's not very convenient as you have to take a cab there. Too far too walk.
Paula was great and the location was awesome, only ten minutes walk to the beach and within blocks of some fun restaurants and bars.

Nice apartment in a good area.Close to the lake and quite close to Leblon beach. A lot of buses and taxi but the metro station are quite far by foot. It will change soon because they are constructing one metro station in front of the apartment. The white decoration is nice and you have everything that you need in the apartment

Paula and Marilia were very quick to respond to an urgent request and to prepare the place with an extremly short notice.

The appartment is very nice and close to everything we needed. I recommend the place.
The apartment was just as described and in a perfect location. Paula was quick and responsive with communication. Definitely recommended.
This was a very nice place. Great location, beautiful view. I would certainly recommend.
Sim. Apto pequeno mas confortavel. Quarto amplo, tv e wifi bons. Localizacao boa por estar perto so metro e da lagoa em ora nao tao perto da praia.
Excelente localização. Muito atenciosa, sempre que necessário respondendo as perguntas. Recomendo!

Loud music and parties in the apartments are strictly forbidden in order not to disturb the neighbors. In case of a neighbor complaint, it will be registered by the police and you will be immediately required to leave the apartment. If you suffer from your neighbor's noise between 22:00 and 10:00 please call inmediatelly our Technical support. Check in time: Check-in time at the apartments is from 15:00. host.host_about:
English: 
We are a young, enthusiastic and happy team! 
We are passionate about Barcelona: its people, food, shops, museums, buildings, beaches, markets, shows... We want you to come to Barcelona and enjoy your experience to the fullest. Therefore, we will be happy to guide you, recommend you our favorite spots and help you in whatever you need.  We're waiting for you :)!

Español: 
¡Somos un equipo joven, entusiasta y feliz! 
Barcelona nos apasiona: su gente, gastronomía, tiendas, museos, edificios, playas, mercados, espectáculos... Queremos que vengas a Barcelona y disfrutes tu experiencia al máximo. Por ello, estaremos encantados de orientarte, recomendarte nuestros rincones favoritos y ayudarte en lo que necesites. ¡Te estamos esperando:)!

name: Private Garden “Pi House Villa Garden” in Cihangir
summary: O my god! These are words after you stay in that villa. Unique, secret, private, but in the city center. There are history, art, entertainment, peace, all will be with you during stay in Pi House Villa. There is no any other place which you can find all in one. Old town view with Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque in your balcony, Bosphorus and Sea on your windows, peace in your private garden, entertainment is just few steps out from you. Taksim is 9 min, Tophane Tram is 6 min, by foot
space: This is renovated wooden Ottoman House, with precious architecture. The house has 3 floors (2 apartment) with private garden and sea view.  First floor is a garden floor with private entrance and has one living room with kitchen, one bed room with one bath and a toilet. The windows open to garden with jasmine, roses and orange trees.  Second, and third floor is duplex apartment with private entrance and has 2 bed rooms, one living room, one kitchen, one bath and 2 toilet. There are breathtaking sea and old town view on windows. name: *PARKING* Classy, Comfy and Clean Apt near Dtown!
summary: Located in one of the best areas in Montreal close to absolutely everything! Near restaurants, bars, clubs, shopping centers, grocery stores, the subway/metro, UQAM and Downtown! Perfect for families, business trips and couples travelling together!
space: Choose from a variety of fine cuisine to late night pig out restaurants all within a 10 minute walk! Coming in town to watch a hockey game or see a concert? We've got you covered too. The Bell Centre is within an 12 minute cab/uber ride! Are you a student? The apartment is perfectly situated only a 15 minute bus ride to UQAM and 20-25 mins by metro to both Concordia and Mcgill Univeristy! Looking to enjoy Montreal's famous nightlife? Only a 10 minute drive from all of Montreal's hottest supper clubs and bars! A 5 minute walk from Ste Catherine St and not to mention only 12 minutes away from Montreal's Old Port! Visiting for a music festival? Only an 11 minute drive to Parc Jean Drapeau! No matter what your reason for visiting Montreal, I can guarantee you a pleasant and comfortable stay!

name: Room “Elegance” in Barcelona centrum.
summary: Preciosa habitación privada y equipada en mi bonito apartamento, acogedor y elegante en la quinta planta de un edificio con ascensor en el conocido y vivo barrio de l’Eixample de Barcelona.  Cama doble, con un colchón y almohadas de alta gama de viscolatex, decorada al detalle, tiene 2 ventanas que dan al interior del edificio, pero silencio garantizado.  Estaré encantada de recibirles con los brazos abiertos, sólo pido que sean personas serias y respetuosas y que cuiden de mi casa.
space: Mi apartamento está situado en el barrio de L’Eixample, uno de los barrios más céntricos y conocidos de la cuidad, famoso por su movimiento constante de gente, sus restaurantes, bares, tiendas, y todo lo que todo el mundo necesita tener siempre cerca o a mano.  En mi apartamento solo vivo yo, por lo que no tendrás que compartir baño o cocina con más gente que conmigo. La habitación es preciosa, muy acogedora y decorada al detalle para que tú estancia en la cuidad sea inolvidable. Te ofreceré sábanas, toallas, perchas, mesita en la habitación, wifi, baño compartido conmigo, gel, champú, lavadora, cocina, utensilios, desayuno, wifi y estaré a tu disposición para lo que necesites, siempre y cuando esté a mi alcance.  La habitación es muy fresca en verano, el apartamento dispone de aire acondicionado, en invierno con el edredón es suficiente.

reviews.comments:
Ayca was a gracious and generous host, she offers airport pickup for a small fee which was most convenient. 

The room is spacious with a large queen sized room, plenty of closet space, and lovely lighting.

You have your own bathroom (!) and overall the house meets the description very well.

She is an amazing woman, their daughter is lovely, they have a calm and cute (non-shedding) white dog. The house is kept very clean and Ayca even offered me breakfast on both days.

Overall, it was a wonderful experience. Almost more like traveling to a good friend's home with warm hospitality and kindness. We became great friends and will be sure to keep in touch. 

As a single woman I was very pleased with the safety of the neighborhood not to mention to West Island area is beautiful and there is a bus connection to downtown as well. 

Highly recommend!

Great neighborhood to live, work and have fun, with good restaurants in Rua Barão do Flamengo, Churrascaria Majórica in Senator Vergueiro. On Marquês de Abrantes, there are galleries with local shops, supermarkets, pharmacies, bakeries, bars, traditional restaurants such as Café Lamas, the friendly Japanese restaurant Mitsuo. There are cultural centers in the surroundings such as Oi Futuro, with coffee shop, free exhibitions and the beautiful Castelinho do Flamengo, Catete Museum. 900m away its located the Aterro do Flamengo, one of largest Latin America's urban parks, green and on the edge of Guanabara Bay, providing physical activities like hiking, cycling, among many other leisure opt

host.host_about:
Living  in Rio since 2008.  Graduated in Physichal Education, studying Nutrition nowadays. I speak spanish, english and portuguese, I risk French sometimes.  I care about security, cleanliness and privacy as any visitor in this  city. In the past I worked at Sheraton Hotel as a trainer.  I have a Lot of accomodations nearby  the beach. Hope enjoy your stay in Rio!

 Morando no Rio desde 2008. Sou formado em Educação Física, cursando Nutrição atualmente na UFRJ, mas não dispenso uma cerveja bem gelada! Meu estilo de anfitrião é super descontraído, sem descuidar privacidade e um padrão de qualidade.  Gosto de hospedes independentes e que entendam o conceito de economia compartilhada .

name: CASA DA CORUJA
summary: Casa 1ª locação. Tudo novo. Eletrodomésticos. Tudo de cozinha. O lugar é calmo, bem arejado! Temos mercados, farmácias, banco, hortifruti, tudo perto. Fica 300m da praia. Perto de Barra de São João, Rido das Ostras. Casa totalmente independente! Garagem para 3 carros.
space: Próximo da praia. Dá para ir a pé. Próximo de Barra de São João, Rio das Ostras. Estacionamento privativo para até 3 carros.  Estamos fazendo uma cisterna. O preço é por hóspede e não por dia!!! O preço para os feriados também mudam!!!

neighborhood_overview: Lugar calmo, arejado, perto de tudo. Pode caminhar na orla da praia.
notes: Rua tranquila. Descansar do dia a dia da cidade. Tem banco, Supermercados e farmácias próximas. O preço é por hóspede e não por dia!!! O preço para os feriados também mudam!!!
transit: Para Rio das Ostras, carro, ônibus ou lotada. Barra de São João, dá para ir a pé. . Para Búzios, São Pedro da Aldeia e Centro e praias de Cabo Frio, carro, ônibus.
access: Totalmente independente.
interaction: Moro na casa da frente e sempre estarei disponível para os hóspedes. Posso fornecer café da manhã e almoço. Mediante pagamento extra. Imagina, chegar da praia e encontrar almoço pronto! Posso fornecer cardápio.
house_rules: A casa fica inteiramente para os hóspedes. Devendo deixar tudo conforme encontrar. Limpeza e objetos. O preço é por diária é por hóspede!

host.host_location: Cabo Frio, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou alegre, comunicativa.
Gosto de conversar, escutar e aprender.
Não gosto de mentiras e falta de educação.
Sou tranquila e as vezes gosto de ficar na minha, quietinha.
Rua tranquila, com moradores e não veranistas.
Comércio farto.
Farmácias, supermercado, Salao de beleza, lojas que você encontra de tudo.
Lanches Ronald’s, o melhor da região.
